vaiśvānara | nābhiḥ | asi | kṣitīnām | sthūṇā-iva | janān | upa-mit | yayantha |
mūrdhā | divaḥ | nābhiḥ | agniḥ | pṛthivyāḥ | atha | abhavat | aratiḥ | rodasyoḥ |
tam | tvā | devāsaḥ | ajanayanta | devam | vaiśvānara | jyotiḥ | it | āryāya |
ā | sūrye | na | raśmayaḥ | dhruvāsaḥ | vaiśvānare | dadhire | agnā | vasūni |
yā | parvateṣu | oṣadhīṣu | ap-su | yā | mānuṣeṣu | asi | tasya | rājā |
bṛhatī iveti bṛhatī-iva | sūnave | rodasī iti | giraḥ | hotā | manuṣyaḥ | na | dakṣaḥ |
svaḥ-vate | satya-śuṣmāya | pūrvīḥ | vaiśvānarāya | nṛ-tamāya | yahvīḥ |
divaḥ | cit | te | bṛhataḥ | jāta-vedaḥ | vaiśvānara | pra | ririce | mahi-tvam |
rājā | kṛṣṭīnām | asi | mānuṣīṇām | yudhā | devebhyaḥ | varivaḥ | cakartha |
pra | nu | mahi-tvam | vṛṣabhasya | vocam | yam | pūravaḥ | vṛtra-hanam | sacante |
vaiśvānaraḥ | dasyum | agniḥ | jaghanvān | adhūnot | kāṣṭhāḥ | ava | śambaram | bhet |
vaiśvānaraḥ | mahimnā | viśva-kṛṣṭiḥ | bharat-vājeṣu | yajataḥ | vibhā-vā |
śāta-vaneye | śatinībhiḥ | agniḥ | puru-nīthe | jarate | sūnṛtā-vān |
vahnim | yaśasam | vidathasya | ketum | supra-avyam | dūtam | sadyaḥ-artham |
dvi-janmānam | rayim-iva | pra-śastam | rātim | bharat | bhṛgave | mātariśvā |
asya | śāsuḥ | ubhayāsaḥ | sacante | haviṣmantaḥ | uśijaḥ | ye | ca | martāḥ |
divaḥ | cit | pūrvaḥ | ni | asādi | hotā | ā-pṛcchyaḥ | viśpatiḥ | vikṣu | vedhāḥ |
tam | navyasī | hṛdaḥ | ā | jāyamānam | asmat | su-kīrtiḥ | madhu-jihvam | aśyāḥ |
yam | ṛtvijaḥ | vṛjane | mānuṣāsaḥ | prayasvantaḥ | āyavaḥ | jījananta |
uśik | pāvakaḥ | vasuḥ | mānuṣeṣu | vareṇyaḥ | hotā | adhāyi | vikṣu |
damūnāḥ | gṛha-patiḥ | dame | ā | agniḥ | bhuvat | rayi-patiḥ | rayīṇām |
tam | tvā | vayam | patim | agne | rayīṇām | pra | śaṁsāmaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | gotamāsaḥ |
āśum | na | vājam-bharam | marjayantaḥ | prātaḥ | makṣu | dhiyā-vasuḥ | jagamyāt |
asmai | it | ūm̐ iti | pra | tavase | turāya | prayaḥ | na | harmi | stomam | māhināya |
ṛcīṣamāya | adhri-gave | oham | indrāya | brahmāṇi | rāta-tamā |
asmai | it | ūm̐ iti | prayaḥ-iva | pra | yaṁsi | bharāmi | āṅgūṣam | bādhe | su-vṛkti |
indrāya | hṛdā | manasā | manīṣā | pratnāya | patye | dhiyaḥ | marjayanta |
asmai | it | ūm̐ iti | tyam | upa-mam | svaḥ-sām | bharāmi | āṅgūṣam | āsyena |
maṁhiṣṭham | acchokti-bhiḥ | matīnām | suvṛkti-bhiḥ | sūrim | vavṛdhadhyai |
asmai | it | ūm̐ iti | stomam | sam | hinomi | ratham | na | taṣṭā-iva | tat-sināya |
giraḥ | ca | girvāhase | su-vṛkti | indrāya | viśvam-invam | medhirāya |
asmai | it | ūm̐ iti | saptim-iva | śravasyā | indrāya | arkam | juhvā | sam | añje |
vīram | dāna-okasam | vandadhyai | purām | gūrta-śravasam | darmāṇam |
asmai | it | ūm̐ iti | tvaṣṭā | takṣat | vajram | svapaḥ-tamam | svaryam | raṇāya |
vṛtrasya | cit | vidat | yena | marma | tujan | īśānaḥ | tujatā | kiyedhāḥ |
asya | it | ūm̐ iti | mātuḥ | savaneṣu | sadyaḥ | mahaḥ | pitum | papi-vān | cāru | annā |
muṣāyat | viṣṇuḥ | pacatam | sahīyān | vidhyat | varāham | tiraḥ | adrim | astā |
asmai | it | ūm̐ iti | gnāḥ | cit | deva-patnīḥ | indrāya | arkam | ahi-hatye | ūvurityūvuḥ |
pari | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | jabhre | urvī iti | na | asya | te iti | mahimānam | pari | sta iti staḥ |
asya | it | eva | pra | ririce | mahi-tvam | divaḥ | pṛthivyāḥ | pari | antarikṣāt |
sva-rāṭ | indraḥ | dame | ā | viśva-gūrtaḥ | su-ariḥ | amatraḥ | vavakṣe | raṇāya |
asya | it | eva | śavasā | śuṣantam | vi | vṛścat | vajreṇa | vṛtram | indraḥ |
gāḥ | na | vrāṇāḥ | avanīḥ | amuñcat | abhi | śravaḥ | dāvane | sa-cetāḥ |
asya | it | ūm̐ iti | tveṣasā | ranta | sindhavaḥ | pari | yat | vajreṇa | sīm | ayacchat |
īśāna-kṛt | dāśuṣe | daśasyan | turvītaye | gādham | turvaṇiḥ | kariti kaḥ |
asmai | it | ūm̐ iti | pra | bhara | tūtujānaḥ | vṛtrāya | vajram | īśānaḥ | kiyedhāḥ |
goḥ | na | parva | vi | rada | tiraścā | iṣyan | arṇāṁsi | apām | caradhyai |
asya | it | ūm̐ iti | pra | brūhi | pūrvyāṇi | turasya | karmāṇi | navyaḥ | ukthaiḥ |
yudhe | yat | iṣṇānaḥ | āyudhāni | ṛghāyamāṇaḥ | ni-riṇāti | śatrūn |
asya | it | ūm̐ iti | bhiyā | girayaḥ | ca | dṛḻhāḥ | dyāvā | ca | bhūma | januṣaḥ | tujete iti |
upo iti | venasya | joguvānaḥ | oṇim | sadyaḥ | bhuvat | vīryāya | nodhāḥ |
asmai | it | ūm̐ iti | tyat | anu | dāyi | eṣām | ekaḥ | yat | vavne | bhūreḥ | īśānaḥ |
pra | etaśam | sūrye | paspṛdhānam | sauvaśvye | susvim | āvat | indraḥ |
eva | te | hāri-yojana | su-vṛkti | indra | brahmāṇi | gotamāsaḥ | akran |
ā | eṣu | viśva-peśasam | dhiyam | dhāḥ | prātaḥ | makṣu | dhiyā-vasuḥ | jagamyāt |
pra | manmahe | śavasānāya | śūṣam | āṅgūṣam | girvaṇase | aṅgirasvat |
suvṛkti-bhiḥ | stuvate | ṛgmiyāya | arcāma | arkam | nare | vi-śrutāya |
pra | vaḥ | mahe | mahi | namaḥ | bharadhvam | āṅgūṣyam | śavasānāya | sāma |
yena | naḥ | pūrve | pitaraḥ | pada-jñāḥ | arcantaḥ | aṅgirasaḥ | gāḥ | avindan |
indrasya | aṅgirasām | ca | iṣṭau | vidat | saramā | tanayāya | dhāsim |
bṛhaspatiḥ | bhinat | adrim | vidat | gāḥ | sam | usriyābhiḥ | vāvaśanta | naraḥ |
saḥ | su-stubhā | saḥ | stubhā | sapta | vipraiḥ | svareṇa | adrim | svaryaḥ | nava-gvaiḥ |
saraṇyu-bhiḥ | phali-gam | indra | śakra | valam | raveṇa | darayaḥ | daśa-gvaiḥ |
gṛṇānaḥ | aṅgiraḥ-bhiḥ | dasma | vi | vaḥ | uṣasā | sūryeṇa | gobhiḥ | andhaḥ |
vi | bhūmyāḥ | aprathayaḥ | indra | sānu | divaḥ | rajaḥ | uparam | astabhāyaḥ |
tat | ūm̐ iti | prayakṣa-tamam | asya | karma | dasmasya | cāru-tamam | asti | daṁsaḥ |
upa-hvare | yat | uparāḥ | apinvat | madhu-arṇasaḥ | nadyaḥ | catasraḥ |
dvitā | vi | vavre | sa-najā | sanīḻe iti sa-nīḻe | ayāsyaḥ | stavamānebhiḥ | arkaiḥ |
bhagaḥ | na | mene iti | parame | vi-oman | adhārayat | rodasī iti | su-daṁsāḥ |
sanāt | divam | pari | bhūma | virūpe iti vi-rūpe | punaḥ-bhuvā | yuvatī iti | svebhiḥ | evaiḥ |
kṛṣṇebhiḥ | aktā | uṣāḥ | ruśat-bhiḥ | vapuḥ-bhiḥ | ā | carataḥ | anyā-anyā |
sanemi | sakhyam | su-apasyamānaḥ | sūnuḥ | dādhāra | śavasā | su-daṁsāḥ |
āmāsu | cit | dadhiṣe | pakvam | antariti | payaḥ | kṛṣṇāsu | ruśat | rohiṇīṣu |
sanāt | sa-nīḻāḥ | avanīḥ | avātāḥ | vratā | rakṣante | amṛtāḥ | sahaḥ-bhiḥ |
puru | sahasrā | janayaḥ | na | patnīḥ | duvasyanti | svasāraḥ | ahrayāṇam |
sanā-yuvaḥ | namasā | navyaḥ | arkaiḥ | vasu-yavaḥ | matayaḥ | dasma | dadruḥ |
patim | na | patnīḥ | uśatīḥ | uśantam | spṛśanti | tvā | śavasā-van | manīṣāḥ |
sanāt | eva | tava | rāyaḥ | gabhastau | na | kṣīyante | na | upa | dasyanti | dasma |
dyu-mān | asi | kratu-mān | indra | dhīraḥ | śikṣa | śacī-vaḥ | tava | naḥ | śacībhiḥ |
sanā-yate | gotamaḥ | indra | navyam | atakṣat | brahma | hari-yojanāya |
su-nīthāya | naḥ | śavasāna | nodhāḥ | prātaḥ | makṣu | dhiyā-vasuḥ | jagamyāt |
tvam | mahān | indra | yaḥ | ha | śuṣmaiḥ | dyāvā | jajñānaḥ | pṛthivī iti | ame | dhāḥ |
yat | ha | te | viśvā | girayaḥ | cit | abhvā | bhiyā | dṛḻhāsaḥ | kiraṇāḥ | na | aijan |
ā | yat | harī iti | indra | vi-vratā | veḥ | ā | te | vajram | jaritā | bāhvoḥ | dhāt |
yena | aviharyatakrato ityaviharyata-krato | amitrān | puraḥ | iṣṇāsi | puru-hūta | pūrvīḥ |
tvam | satyaḥ | indra | dhṛṣṇuḥ | etān | tvam | ṛbhukṣāḥ | naryaḥ | tvam | ṣāṭ |
tvam | śuṣṇam | vṛjane | pṛkṣe | āṇau | yūne | kutsāya | dyu-mate | sacā | ahan |
tvam | ha | tyat | indra | codīḥ | sakhā | vṛtram | yat | vajrin | vṛṣa-karman | ubhnāḥ |
yat | ha | śūra | vṛṣa-manaḥ | parācaiḥ | vi | dasyūn | yonau | akṛtaḥ | vṛthāṣāṭ |
tvam | ha | tyat | indra | ariṣaṇyan | dṛḻhasya | cit | martānām | ajuṣṭau |
vi | asmat | ā | kāṣṭhāḥ | arvate | vaḥ | ghanā-iva | vajrin | śnathihi | amitrān |
tvām | ha | tyat | indra | arṇa-sātau | svaḥ-mīḻhe | naraḥ | ājā | havante |
tava | svadhā-vaḥ | iyam | ā | sa-marye | ūtiḥ | vājeṣu | atasāyyā | bhūt |
tvam | ha | tyat | indra | sapta | yudhyan | puraḥ | vajrin | puru-kutsāya | dardariti dardaḥ |
barhiḥ | na | yat | su-dāse | vṛthā | vark | aṁhoḥ | rājan | varivaḥ | pūrave | kaḥ |
tvam | tyām | naḥ | indra | deva | citrām | iṣam | āpaḥ | na | pīpayaḥ | pari-jman |
yayā | śūra | prati | asmabhyam | yaṁsi | tmanam | ūrjam | na | viśvadha | kṣaradhyai |
akāri | te | indra | gotamebhiḥ | brahmāṇi | ā-uktā | namasā | hari-bhyām |
su-peśasam | vājam | ā | bhara | naḥ | prātaḥ | makṣu | dhiyā-vasuḥ | jagamyāt |
vṛṣṇe | śardhāya | su-makhāya | vedhase | nodhaḥ | su-vṛktim | pra | bhara | marut-bhyaḥ |
apaḥ | na | dhīraḥ | manasā | su-hastyaḥ | giraḥ | sam | añje | vidatheṣu | ā-bhuvaḥ |
te | jajñire | divaḥ | ṛṣvāsaḥ | ukṣaṇaḥ | rudrasya | maryāḥ | asurāḥ | arepasaḥ |
pāvakāsaḥ | śucayaḥ | sūryāḥ-iva | satvānaḥ | na | drapsinaḥ | ghora-varpasaḥ |
yuvānaḥ | rudrāḥ | ajarāḥ | abhok-hanaḥ | vavakṣuḥ | adhri-gāvaḥ | parvatāḥ-iva |
dṛḻhā | cit | viśvā | bhuvanāni | pārthivā | pra | cyavayanti | divyāni | majmanā |
citraiḥ | añji-bhiḥ | vapuṣe | vi | añjate | vakṣaḥ-su | rukmān | adhi | yetire | śubhe |
aṁseṣu | eṣām | ni | mimṛkṣuḥ | ṛṣṭayaḥ | sākam | jajñire | svadhayā | divaḥ | naraḥ |
īśāna-kṛtaḥ | dhunayaḥ | riśādasaḥ | vātān | vi-dyutaḥ | taviṣībhiḥ | akrata |
duhanti | ūdhaḥ | divyāni | dhūtayaḥ | bhūmim | pinvanti | payasā | pari-jrayaḥ |
pinvanti | apaḥ | marutaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | payaḥ | ghṛta-vat | vidatheṣu | ā-bhuvaḥ |
atyam | na | mihe | vi | nayanti | vājinam | utsam | duhanti | stanayantam | akṣitam |
mahiṣāsaḥ | māyinaḥ | citra-bhānavaḥ | girayaḥ | na | sva-tavasaḥ | raghu-syadaḥ |
mṛgāḥ-iva | hastinaḥ | khādatha | vanā | yat | āruṇīṣu | taviṣīḥ | ayugdhvam |
siṁhāḥ-iva | nānadati | pra-cetasaḥ | piśāḥ-iva | su-piśaḥ | viśva-vedasaḥ |
kṣapaḥ | jinvantaḥ | pṛṣatībhiḥ | ṛṣṭi-bhiḥ | sam | it | sa-bādhaḥ | śavasā | ahi-manyavaḥ |
rodasī iti | ā | vadata | gaṇa-śriyaḥ | nṛ-sācaḥ | śūrāḥ | śavasā | ahi-manyavaḥ |
ā | vandhureṣu | amatiḥ | na | darśatā | vi-dyut | na | tasthau | marutaḥ | ratheṣu | vaḥ |
viśva-vedasaḥ | rayi-bhiḥ | sam-okasaḥ | sam-miślāsaḥ | taviṣībhiḥ | vi-rapśinaḥ |
astāraḥ | iṣum | dadhire | gabhastyoḥ | ananta-śuṣmāḥ | vṛṣa-khādayaḥ | naraḥ |
hiraṇyayebhiḥ | pavi-bhiḥ | payaḥ-vṛdhaḥ | ut | jighnante | ā-pathyaḥ | na | parvatān |
makhāḥ | ayāsaḥ | sva-sṛtaḥ | dhruva-cyutaḥ | dudhra-kṛtaḥ | marutaḥ | bhrājat-ṛṣṭayaḥ |
ghṛṣum | pāvakam | vaninam | vi-carṣaṇim | rudrasya | sūnum | havasā | gṛṇīmasi |
rajaḥ-turam | tavasam | mārutam | gaṇam | ṛjīṣiṇam | vṛṣaṇam | saścata | śriye |
pra | nu | saḥ | martaḥ | śavasā | janān | ati | tasthau | vaḥ | ūtī | marutaḥ | yam | āvata |
arvat-bhiḥ | vājam | bharate | dhanā | nṛ-bhiḥ | ā-pṛcchyam | kratum | ā | kṣeti | puṣyati |
carkṛtyam | marutaḥ | pṛt-su | dustaram | dyu-mantam | śuṣmam | maghavat-su | dhattana |
dhana-spṛtam | ukthyam | viśva-carṣaṇim | tokam | puṣyema | tanayam | śatam | himāḥ |
nu | sthiram | marutaḥ | vīra-vantam | ṛti-saham | rayim | asmāsu | dhatta |
sahasriṇam | śatinam | śūśu-vāṁsam | prātaḥ | makṣu | dhiyā-vasuḥ | jagamyāt |
paśvā | na | tāyum | guhā | catantam | namaḥ | yujānam | namaḥ | vahantam |
sa-joṣāḥ | dhīrāḥ | padaiḥ | anu | gman | upa | tvā | sīdan | viśve | yajatrāḥ |
ṛtasya | devāḥ | anu | vratā | guḥ | bhuvat | pariṣṭiḥ | dyauḥ | na | bhūma |
vardhanti | īm | āpaḥ | panvā | su-śiśvim | ṛtasya | yonā | garbhe | su-jātam |
puṣṭiḥ | na | raṇvā | kṣitiḥ | na | pṛthvī | giriḥ | na | bhujma | kṣodaḥ | na | śam-bhu |
atyaḥ | na | ajman | sarga-prataktaḥ | sindhuḥ | na | kṣodaḥ | kaḥ | im | varāte |
jāmiḥ | sindhūnām | bhrātā-iva | svasrām | ibhyān | na | rājā | vanāni | atti |
yat | vāta-jūtaḥ | vanā | vi | asthāt | agniḥ | ha | dāti | roma | pṛthivyāḥ |
śvasiti | ap-su | haṁsaḥ | na | sīdan | kratvā | cetiṣṭhaḥ | viśām | uṣaḥ-bhut |
somaḥ | na | vedhāḥ | ṛta-prajātaḥ | paśuḥ | na | śiśvā | vi-bhuḥ | dūre-bhāḥ |
rayiḥ | na | citrā | sūraḥ | na | sam-dṛk | āyuḥ | na | prāṇaḥ | nityaḥ | na | sūnuḥ |
takvā | na | bhūrṇiḥ | vanā | sisakti | payaḥ | na | dhenuḥ | śuciḥ | vibhā-vā |
dādhāra | kṣemam | okaḥ | na | raṇvaḥ | yavaḥ | na | pakvaḥ | jetā | janānām |
ṛṣiḥ | na | stubhvā | vikṣu | pra-śastaḥ | vājī | na | prītaḥ | vayaḥ | dadhāti |
duroka-śociḥ | kratuḥ | na | nityaḥ | jāyā-iva | yonau | aram | viśvasmai |
citraḥ | yat | abhrāṭ | śvetaḥ | na | vikṣu | rathaḥ | na | rukmī | tveṣaḥ | samat-su |
senā-iva | sṛṣṭā | amam | dadhāti | astuḥ | na | didyut | tveṣa-pratīkā |
yamaḥ | ha | jātaḥ | yamaḥ | jani-tvam | jāraḥ | kanīnām | patiḥ | janīnām |
tam | vaḥ | carāthā | vayam | vasatyā | astam | na | gāvaḥ | nakṣante | iddham |
sindhuḥ | na | kṣodaḥ | pra | nīcīḥ | ainot | navanta | gāvaḥ | svaḥ | dṛśīke |
vaneṣu | jāyuḥ | marteṣu | mitraḥ | vṛṇīte | śruṣṭim | rājā-iva | ajuryam |
kṣemaḥ | na | sādhuḥ | kratuḥ | na | bhadraḥ | bhuvat | su-ādhīḥ | hotā | havya-vāṭ |
haste | dadhānaḥ | nṛmṇā | viśvāni | ame | devān | dhāt | guhā | ni-sīdan |
vidanti | īm | atra | naraḥ | dhiyam-dhāḥ | hṛdā | yat | taṣṭān | mantrān | aśaṁsan |
ajaḥ | na | kṣām | dādhāra | pṛthivīm | tastambha | dyām | mantrebhiḥ | satyaiḥ |
priyā | padāni | paśvaḥ | ni | pāhi | viśva-āyuḥ | agne | guhā | guham | gāḥ |
yaḥ | īm | ciketa | guhā | bhavantam | ā | yaḥ | sasāda | dhārām | ṛtasya |
vi | ye | cṛtanti | ṛtā | sapantaḥ | āt | it | vasūni | pra | vavāca | asmai |
vi | yaḥ | vīrut-su | rodhat | mahi-tvā | uta | pra-jāḥ | uta | pra-sūṣu | antariti |
cittiḥ | apām | dame | viśva-āyuḥ | sadma-iva | dhīrāḥ | sam-māya | cakruḥ |
śrīṇan | upa | sthāt | divam | bhuraṇyuḥ | sthātuḥ | caratham | aktūn | vi | ūrṇot |
pari | yat | eṣām | ekaḥ | viśveṣām | bhuvat | devaḥ | devānām | mahi-tvā |
āt | it | te | viśve | kratum | juṣanta | śuṣkāt | yat | deva | jīvaḥ | janiṣṭhāḥ |
bhajanta | viśve | deva-tvam | nāma | ṛtam | sapantaḥ | amṛtam | evaiḥ |
ṛtasya | preṣāḥ | ṛtasya | dhītiḥ | viśva-āyuḥ | viśve | apāṁsi | cakruḥ |
yaḥ | tubhyam | dāśāt | yaḥ | vā | te | śikṣāt | tasmai | cikitvān | rayim | dayasva |
hotā | ni-sattaḥ | manoḥ | apatye | saḥ | cit | nu | āsām | patiḥ | rayīṇām |
icchanta | retaḥ | mithaḥ | tanūṣu | sam | jānata | svaiḥ | dakṣaiḥ | amūrāḥ |
pituḥ | na | putrāḥ | kratum | juṣanta | śroṣan | ye | asya | śāsam | turāsaḥ |
vi | rāyaḥ | aurṇot | duraḥ | puru-kṣuḥ | pipeśa | nākam | stṛ-bhiḥ | damūnāḥ |
śukraḥ | śuśukvān | uṣaḥ | na | jāraḥ | paprā | samīcī iti sam-īcī | divaḥ | na | jyotiḥ |
pari | pra-jātaḥ | kratvā | babhūtha | bhuvaḥ | devānām | pitā | putraḥ | san |
vedhāḥ | adṛptaḥ | agniḥ | vi-jānan | ūdhaḥ | na | gonām | svādma | pitūnām |
jane | na | śevaḥ | ā-hūryaḥ | san | madhye | ni-sattaḥ | raṇvaḥ | duroṇe |
putraḥ | na | jātaḥ | raṇvaḥ | duroṇe | vājī | na | prītaḥ | viśaḥ | vi | tārīt |
viśaḥ | yat | ahve | nṛ-bhiḥ | sa-nīḻāḥ | agniḥ | deva-tvā | viśvāni | aśyāḥ |
nakiḥ | te | etā | vratā | minanti | nṛ-bhyaḥ | yat | ebhyaḥ | śruṣṭim | cakartha |
tat | tu | te | daṁsaḥ | yat | ahan | samānaiḥ | nṛ-bhiḥ | yat | yuktaḥ | viveḥ | rapāṁsi |
uṣaḥ | na | jāraḥ | vibhā-vā | usraḥ | sañjñāta-rūpaḥ | ciketat | asmai |
tmanā | vahantaḥ | duraḥ | vi | ṛṇvan | navanta | viśve | svaḥ | dṛśīke |
vanema | pūrvīḥ | aryaḥ | manīṣā | agniḥ | su-śokaḥ | viśvāni | aśyāḥ |
ā | daivyāni | vratā | cikitvān | ā | mānuṣasya | janasya | janma |
garbhaḥ | yaḥ | apām | garbhaḥ | vanānām | garbhaḥ | ca | sthātām | garbhaḥ | carathām |
adrau | cit | asmai | antaḥ | duroṇe | viśām | na | viśvaḥ | amṛtaḥ | su-ādhīḥ |
saḥ | hi | kṣapā-vān | agniḥ | rayīṇām | dāśat | yaḥ | asmai | aram | su-uktaiḥ |
etā | cikitvaḥ | bhūma | ni | pāhi | devānām | janma | martān | ca | vidvān |
vardhān | yam | pūrvīḥ | kṣapaḥ | vi-rūpāḥ | sthātuḥ | ca | ratham | ṛta-pravītam |
arādhi | hotā | svaḥ | ni-sattaḥ | kṛṇvan | viśvāni | apāṁsi | satyā |
goṣu | pra-śastim | vaneṣu | dhiṣe | bharanta | viśve | balim | svaḥ | naḥ |
vi | tvā | naraḥ | puru-trā | saparyan | pituḥ | na | jivreḥ | vi | vedaḥ | bharanta |
sādhuḥ | na | gṛdhnuḥ | astā-iva | śūraḥ | yātā-iva | bhīmaḥ | tveṣaḥ | samat-su |
upa | pra | jinvan | uśatīḥ | uśantam | patim | na | nityam | janayaḥ | sa-nīḻāḥ |
svasāraḥ | śyāvīm | aruṣīm | ajuṣran | citram | ucchantīm | uṣasam | na | gāvaḥ |
vīḻu | cit | dṛḻhā | pitaraḥ | naḥ | ukthaiḥ | adrim | rujan | aṅgirasaḥ | raveṇa |
cakruḥ | divaḥ | bṛhataḥ | gātum | asme iti | ahariti | svaḥ | vividuḥ | ketum | usrāḥ |
dadhan | ṛtam | dhanayan | asya | dhītim | āt | it | aryaḥ | dadhiṣvaḥ | vi-bhṛtrāḥ |
atṛṣyantīḥ | apasaḥ | yanti | accha | devān | janma | prayasā | vardhayantīḥ |
mathīt | yat | īm | vi-bhṛtaḥ | mātariśvā | gṛhe-gṛhe | śyetaḥ | jenyaḥ | bhūt |
āt | īm | rājñe | na | sahīyase | sacā | san | ā | dūtyam | bhṛgavāṇaḥ | vivāya |
mahe | yat | pitre | īm | rasam | dive | kaḥ | ava | tsarat | pṛśanyaḥ | cikitvān |
sṛjat | astā | dhṛṣatā | didyum | asmai | svāyām | devaḥ | duhitari | tviṣim | dhāt |
sve | ā | yaḥ | tubhyam | dame | ā | vi-bhāti | namaḥ | vā | dāśāt | uśataḥ | anu | dyūn |
vardho iti | agne | vayaḥ | asya | dvi-barhāḥ | yāsat | rāyā | sa-ratham | yam | junāsi |
agnim | viśvāḥ | abhi | pṛkṣaḥ | sacante | samudram | na | sravataḥ | sapta | yahvīḥ |
na | jāmi-bhiḥ | vi | cikite | vayaḥ | naḥ | vidāḥ | deveṣu | pra-matim | cikitvān |
ā | yat | iṣe | nṛ-patim | tejaḥ | ānaṭ | śuci | retaḥ | ni-siktam | dyauḥ | abhīke |
agniḥ | śardham | anavadyam | yuvānam | su-ādhyam | janayat | sūdayat | ca |
manaḥ | na | yaḥ | adhvanaḥ | sadyaḥ | eti | ekaḥ | satrā | sūraḥ | vasvaḥ | īśe |
rājānā | mitrāvaruṇā | supāṇī iti su-pāṇī | goṣu | priyam | amṛtam | rakṣamāṇā |
mā | naḥ | agne | sakhyā | pitryāṇi | pra | marṣiṣṭhāḥ | abhi | viduḥ | kaviḥ | san |
nabhaḥ | na | rūpam | jarimā | mināti | purā | tasyāḥ | abhi-śasteḥ | adhi | ihi |
ni | kāvyā | vedhasaḥ | śaśvataḥ | kaḥ | haste | dadhānaḥ | naryā | purūṇi |
agniḥ | bhuvat | rayi-patiḥ | rayīṇām | satrā | cakrāṇaḥ | amṛtāni | viśvā |
asme iti | vatsam | pari | santam | na | vindan | icchantaḥ | viśve | amṛtāḥ | amūrāḥ |
śrama-yuvaḥ | pada-vyaḥ | dhiyam-dhāḥ | tasthuḥ | pade | parame | cāru | agneḥ |
tisraḥ | yat | agne | śaradaḥ | tvām | it | śucim | ghṛtena | śucayaḥ | saparyān |
nāmāni | cit | dadhire | yajñiyāni | asūdayanta | tanvaḥ | su-jātāḥ |
ā | rodasī iti | bṛhatī iti | vevidānāḥ | pra | rudriyā | jabhrire | yajñiyāsaḥ |
vidat | martaḥ | nema-dhitā | cikitvān | agnim | pade | parame | tasthi-vāṁsam |
sam-jānānāḥ | upa | sīdan | abhi-jñu | patnī-vantaḥ | namasyam | namasyanniti namasyan |
ririkvāṁsaḥ | tanvaḥ | kṛṇvata | svāḥ | sakhā | sakhyuḥ | ni-miṣi | rakṣamāṇāḥ |
triḥ | sapta | yat | guhyāni | tve iti | it | padā | avidan | ni-hitā | yajñiyāsaḥ |
tebhiḥ | rakṣante | amṛtam | sa-joṣāḥ | paśūn | ca | sthātṝn | caratham | ca | pāhi |
vidvān | agne | vayunāni | kṣitīnām | vi | ānuṣak | śurudhaḥ | jīvase | dhāḥ |
antaḥ-vidvān | adhvanaḥ | deva-yānān | atandraḥ | dūtaḥ | abhavaḥ | haviḥ-vāṭ |
su-ādhyaḥ | divaḥ | ā | sapta | yahvīḥ | rāyaḥ | duraḥ | vi | ṛta-jñāḥ | ajānan |
vidat | gavyam | saramā | dṛḻham | ūrvam | yena | nu | kam | mānuṣī | bhojate | viṭ |
ā | ye | viśvā | su-apatyāni | tasthuḥ | kṛṇvānāsaḥ | amṛta-tvāya | gātum |
mahnā | mahat-bhiḥ | pṛthivī | vi | tasthe | mātā | putraiḥ | aditiḥ | dhāyase | veriti veḥ |
adhi | śriyam | ni | dadhuḥ | cārum | asmin | divaḥ | yat | akṣī iti | amṛtāḥ | akṛṇvan |
adha | kṣaranti | sindhavaḥ | na | sṛṣṭāḥ | pra | nīcīḥ | agne | aruṣīḥ | ajānan |
rayiḥ | na | yaḥ | pitṛ-vittaḥ | vayaḥ-dhāḥ | su-pranītiḥ | cikituṣaḥ | na | śāsuḥ |
syona-śīḥ | atithiḥ | na | prīṇānaḥ | hotā-iva | sadma | vidhataḥ | vi | tārīt |
devaḥ | na | yaḥ | savitā | satya-manmā | kratvā | ni-pāti | vṛjanāni | viśvā |
puru-praśastaḥ | amatiḥ | na | satyaḥ | ātmā-iva | śevaḥ | didhiṣāyyaḥ | bhūt |
devaḥ | na | yaḥ | pṛthivīm | viśva-dhāyāḥ | upa-kṣeti | hita-mitraḥ | na | rājā |
puraḥ-sadaḥ | śarma-sadaḥ | na | vīrāḥ | anavadyā | patijuṣṭā-iva | nārī |
tam | tvā | naraḥ | dame | ā | nityam | iddham | agne | sacanta | kṣitiṣu | dhruvāsu |
adhi | dyumnam | ni | dadhuḥ | bhūri | asmin | bhava | viśva-āyuḥ | dharuṇaḥ | rayīṇām |
vi | pṛkṣaḥ | agne | magha-vānaḥ | aśyuḥ | vi | sūrayaḥ | dadataḥ | viśvam | āyuḥ |
sanema | vājam | sam-itheṣu | aryaḥ | bhāgam | deveṣu | śravase | dadhānāḥ |
ṛtasya | hi | dhenavaḥ | vāvaśānāḥ | smat-ūdhnīḥ | pīpayanta | dyu-bhaktāḥ |
parā-vataḥ | su-matim | bhikṣamāṇāḥ | vi | sindhavaḥ | samayā | sasruḥ | adrim |
tve iti | agne | su-matim | bhikṣamāṇāḥ | divi | śravaḥ | dadhire | yajñiyāsaḥ |
naktā | ca | cakruḥ | uṣasā | virūpe iti vi-rūpe | kṛṣṇam | ca | varṇam | aruṇam | ca | sam | dhuriti dhuḥ |
yān | rāye | martān | susūdaḥ | agne | te | syāma | magha-vānaḥ | vayam | ca |
chāyā-iva | viśvam | bhuvanam | sisakṣi | āpapri-vān | rodasī iti | antarikṣam |
arvat-bhiḥ | agne | arvataḥ | nṛ-bhiḥ | nṝn | vīraiḥ | vīrān | vanuyāma | tvā-ūtāḥ |
īśānāsaḥ | pitṛ-vittasya | rāyaḥ | vi | sūrayaḥ | śata-himāḥ | naḥ | aśyuḥ |
etā | te | agne | ucathāni | vedhaḥ | juṣṭāni | santu | manase | hṛde | ca |
śakema | rāyaḥ | su-dhuraḥ | yamam | te | adhi | śravaḥ | deva-bhaktam | dadhānāḥ |
upa-prayantaḥ | adhvaram | mantram | vocema | agnaye |
āre | asme iti | ca | śṛṇvate |
yaḥ | snīhitīṣu | pūrvyaḥ | sam-jagmānāsu | kṛṣṭiṣu |
arakṣat | dāśuṣe | gayam |
uta | bruvantu | jantavaḥ | ut | agniḥ | vṛtra-hā | ajani |
dhanam-jayaḥ | raṇe-raṇe |
yasya | dūtaḥ | asi | kṣaye | veṣi | havyāni | vītaye |
dasmat | kṛṇoṣi | adhvaram |
tam | it | su-havyam | aṅgiraḥ | su-devam | sahasaḥ | yaho iti |
janāḥ | āhuḥ | su-barhiṣam |
ā | ca | vahāsi | tān | iha | devān | upa | pra-śastaye |
havyā | su-candra | vītaye |
na | yoḥ | upabdiḥ | aśvyaḥ | śṛṇve | rathasya | kat | cana |
yat | agne | yāsi | dūtyam |
tvā-ūtaḥ | vājī | ahrayaḥ | abhi | pūrvasmāt | aparaḥ |
pra | dāśvān | agne | asthāt |
uta | dyu-mat | su-vīryam | bṛhat | agne | vivāsasi |
devebhyaḥ | deva | dāśuṣe |
juṣasva | saprathaḥ-tamam | vacaḥ | devapsaraḥ-tamam |
havyā | juhvānaḥ | āsani |
atha | te | aṅgiraḥ-tama | agne | vedhaḥ-tama | priyam |
vocema | brahma | sānasi |
kaḥ | te | jāmiḥ | janānām | agne | kaḥ | dāśu-adhvaraḥ |
kaḥ | ha | kasmin | asi | śritaḥ |
tvam | jāmiḥ | janānām | agne | mitraḥ | asi | priyaḥ |
sakhā | sakhi-bhyaḥ | īḍyaḥ |
yaja | naḥ | mitrāvaruṇā | yaja | devān | ṛtam | bṛhat |
agne | yakṣi | svam | damam |
kā | te | upa-itiḥ | manasaḥ | varāya | bhuvat | agne | śam-tamā | kā | manīṣā |
kaḥ | vā | yajñaiḥ | pari | dakṣam | te | āpa | kena | vā | te | manasā | dāśema |
ā | ihi | agne | iha | hotā | ni | sīda | adabdhaḥ | su | puraḥ-etā | bhava | naḥ |
avatām | tvā | rodasī iti | viśvaminve iti viśvam-inve | yaja | mahe | saumanasāya | devān |
pra | su | viśvān | rakṣasaḥ | dhakṣi | agne | bhava | yajñānām | abhiśasti-pāvā |
atha | ā | vaha | soma-patim | hari-bhyām | ātithyam | asmai | cakṛma | su-dāvne |
prajā-vatā | vacasā | vahniḥ | āsā | ā | ca | huve | ni | ca | satsi | iha | devaiḥ |
veṣi | hotram | uta | potram | yajatra | bodhi | pra-yantaḥ | janitaḥ | vasūnām |
yathā | viprasya | manuṣaḥ | haviḥ-bhiḥ | devān | ayajaḥ | kavi-bhiḥ | kaviḥ | san |
eva | hotariti | satya-tara | tvam | adya | agne | mandrayā | juhvā | yajasva |
kathā | dāśema | agnaye | kā | asmai | deva-juṣṭā | ucyate | bhāmine | gīḥ |
yaḥ | martyeṣu | amṛtaḥ | ṛta-vā | hotā | yajiṣṭhaḥ | it | kṛṇoti | devān |
yaḥ | adhvareṣu | śam-tamaḥ | ṛta-vā | hotā | tam | ūm̐ iti | namaḥ-bhiḥ | ā | kṛṇudhvam |
agniḥ | yat | veḥ | martāya | devān | saḥ | ca | bodhāti | manasā | yajāti |
saḥ | hi | kratuḥ | saḥ | maryaḥ | saḥ | sādhuḥ | mitraḥ | na | bhūt | adbhutasya | rathīḥ |
tam | medheṣu | prathamam | deva-yantīḥ | viśaḥ | upa | bruvate | dasmam | ārīḥ |
saḥ | naḥ | nṛṇām | nṛ-tamaḥ | riśādāḥ | agniḥ | giraḥ | avasā | vetu | dhītim |
tanā | ca | ye | magha-vānaḥ | śaviṣṭhāḥ | vāja-prasūtāḥ | iṣayanta | manma |
eva | agniḥ | gotamebhiḥ | ṛta-vā | viprebhiḥ | astoṣṭa | jāta-vedāḥ |
saḥ | eṣu | dyumnam | pīpayat | saḥ | vājam | saḥ | puṣṭim | yāti | joṣam | ā | cikitvān |
abhi | tvā | gotamāḥ | girā | jāta-vedaḥ | vi-carṣaṇe |
dyumnaiḥ | abhi | pra | nonumaḥ |
tam | ūm̐ iti | tvā | gotamaḥ | girā | rāyaḥ-kāmaḥ | duvasyati |
dyumnaiḥ | abhi | pra | nonumaḥ |
tam | ūm̐ iti | tvā | vāja-sātamam | aṅgirasvat | havāmahe |
dyumnaiḥ | abhi | pra | nonumaḥ |
tam | ūm̐ iti | tvā | vṛtrahan-tamam | yaḥ | dasyūn | ava-dhūnuṣe |
dyumnaiḥ | abhi | pra | nonumaḥ |
avocāma | rahūgaṇāḥ | agnaye | madhu-mat | vacaḥ |
dyumnaiḥ | abhi | pra | nonumaḥ |
hiraṇya-keśaḥ | rajasaḥ | vi-sāre | ahiḥ | dhuniḥ | vātaḥ-iva | dhrajīmān |
śuci-bhrājāḥ | uṣasaḥ | navedāḥ | yaśasvatīḥ | apasyuvaḥ | na | satyāḥ |
ā | te | su-parṇāḥ | aminanta | evaiḥ | kṛṣṇaḥ | nonāva | vṛṣabhaḥ | yadi | idam |
śivābhiḥ | na | smayamānābhiḥ | ā | agāt | patanti | mihaḥ | stanayanti | abhrā |
yat | īm | ṛtasya | payasā | piyānaḥ | nayan | ṛtasya | pathi-bhiḥ | rajiṣṭhaiḥ |
aryamā | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | pari-jmā | tvacam | pṛñcanti | uparasya | yonau |
agne | vājasya | go-mataḥ | īśānaḥ | sahasaḥ | yaho iti |
asme iti | dhehi | jāta-vedaḥ | mahi | śravaḥ |
saḥ | idhānaḥ | vasuḥ | kaviḥ | agniḥ | īḻenyaḥ | girā |
revat | asmabhyam | puru-aṇīka | dīdihi |
kṣapaḥ | rājan | uta | tmanā | agne | vastoḥ | uta | uṣasaḥ |
saḥ | tigma-jambha | rakṣasaḥ | daha | prati |
ava | naḥ | agne | ūti-bhiḥ | gāyatrasya | pra-bharmaṇi |
viśvāsu | dhīṣu | vandya |
ā | naḥ | agne | rayim | bhara | satrā-saham | vareṇyam |
viśvāsu | pṛt-su | dustaram |
ā | naḥ | agne | su-cetunā | rayim | viśvāyu-poṣasam |
mārḍīkam | dhehi | jīvase |
pra | pūtāḥ | tigma-śociṣe | vācaḥ | gotama | agnaye |
bharasva | sumna-yuḥ | giraḥ |
yaḥ | naḥ | agne | abhi-dāsati | anti | dūre | padīṣṭa | saḥ |
asmākam | it | vṛdhe | bhava |
sahasra-akṣaḥ | vi-carṣaṇiḥ | agniḥ | rakṣāṁsi | sedhati |
hotā | gṛṇīte | ukthyaḥ |
itthā | hi | some | it | made | brahmā | cakāra | vardhanam |
śaviṣṭha | vajrin | ojasā | pṛthivyāḥ | niḥ | śaśāḥ | ahim | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
saḥ | tvā | amadat | vṛṣā | madaḥ | somaḥ | śyena-ābhṛtaḥ | sutaḥ |
yena | vṛtram | niḥ | at-bhyaḥ | jaghantha | vajrin | ojasā | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
pra | ihi | abhi | ihi | dhṛṣṇuhi | na | te | vajraḥ | ni | yaṁsate |
indra | nṛmṇam | hi | te | śavaḥ | hanaḥ | vṛtram | jayāḥ | apaḥ | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
niḥ | indra | bhūmyāḥ | adhi | vṛtram | jaghantha | niḥ | divaḥ |
sṛja | marutvatīḥ | ava | jīva-dhanyāḥ | imāḥ | apaḥ | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
indraḥ | vṛtrasya | dodhataḥ | sānum | vajreṇa | hīḻitaḥ |
abhi-kramya | ava | jighnate | apaḥ | sarmāya | codayan | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
adhi | sānau | ni | jighnate | vajreṇa | śata-parvaṇā |
mandānaḥ | indraḥ | andhasaḥ | sakhi-bhyaḥ | gātum | icchati | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
indra | tubhyam | it | adri-vaḥ | anuttam | vajrin | vīryam |
yat | ha | tyam | māyinam | mṛgam | tam | ūm̐ iti | tvam | māyayā | avadhīḥ | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
vi | te | vajrāsaḥ | asthiran | navatim | nāvyāḥ | anu |
mahat | te | indra | vīryam | bāhvoḥ | te | balam | hitam | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
sahasram | sākam | arcata | pari | stobhata | viṁśatiḥ |
śatā | enam | anu | anonavuḥ | indrāya | brahma | ut-yatam | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
indraḥ | vṛtrasya | taviṣīm | niḥ | ahan | sahasā | sahaḥ |
mahat | tat | asya | pauṁsyam | vṛtram | jaghanvān | asṛjat | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
ime iti | cit | tava | manyave | vepete iti | bhiyasā | mahī iti |
yat | indra | vajrin | ojasā | vṛtram | marutvān | avadhīḥ | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
na | vepasā | na | tanyatā | indram | vṛtraḥ | vi | bībhayat |
abhi | enam | vajraḥ | āyasaḥ | sahasra-bhṛṣṭiḥ | āyāta | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
yat | vṛtram | tava | ca | aśanim | vajreṇa | sam-ayodhayaḥ |
ahim | indra | jighāṁsataḥ | divi | te | badbadhe | śavaḥ | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
abhi-stane | te | adri-vaḥ | yat | sthāḥ | jagat | ca | rejate |
tvaṣṭā | cit | tava | manyave | indra | vevijyate | bhiyā | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
nahi | nu | yāt | adhi-imasi | indram | kaḥ | vīryā | paraḥ |
tasmin | nṛmṇam | uta | kratum | devāḥ | ojāṁsi | sam | dadhuḥ | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
yām | atharvā | manuḥ | pitā | dadhyaṅ | dhiyam | atnata |
tasmin | brahmāṇi | pūrva-thā | indre | ukthā | sam | agmata | arcan | anu | sva-rājyam |
indraḥ | madāya | vavṛdhe | śavase | vṛtra-hā | nṛ-bhiḥ |
tam | it | mahat-su | ājiṣu | uta | īm | arbhe | havāmahe | saḥ | vājeṣu | pra | naḥ | aviṣat |
asi | hi | vīra | senyaḥ | asi | bhūri | parā-dadiḥ |
asi | dabhrasya | cit | vṛdhaḥ | yajamānāya | śikṣasi | sunvate | bhūri | te | vasu |
yat | ut-īrate | ājayaḥ | dhṛṣṇave | dhīyate | dhanā |
yukṣva | mada-cyutā | harī iti | kam | hanaḥ | kam | vasau | dadhaḥ | asmān | indra | vasau | dadhaḥ |
kratvā | mahān | anu-svadham | bhīmaḥ | ā | vavṛdhe | śavaḥ |
śriye | ṛṣvaḥ | upākayoḥ | ni | śiprī | hari-vān | dadhe | hastayoḥ | vajram | āyasam |
ā | paprau | pārthivam | rajaḥ | badbadhe | rocanā | divi |
na | tvā-vān | indra | kaḥ | cana | na | jātaḥ | na | janiṣyate | ati | viśvam | vavakṣitha |
yaḥ | aryaḥ | marta-bhojanam | parā-dadāti | dāśuṣe |
indraḥ | asmabhyam | śikṣatu | vi | bhaja | bhūri | te | vasu | bhakṣīya | tava | rādhasaḥ |
made-made | hi | naḥ | dadiḥ | yūthā | gavām | ṛju-kratuḥ |
sam | gṛbhāya | puru | śatā | ubhayāhastyā | vasu | śiśīhi | rāyaḥ | ā | bhara |
mādayasva | sute | sacā | śavase | śūra | rādhase |
vidma | hi | tvā | puru-vasum | upa | kāmān | sasṛjmahe | atha | naḥ | avitā | bhava |
ete | te | indra | jantavaḥ | viśvam | puṣyanti | vāryam |
antaḥ | hi | khyaḥ | janānām | aryaḥ | vedaḥ | adāśuṣām | teṣām | naḥ | vedaḥ | ā | bhara |
upo iti | su | śṛṇuhi | giraḥ | magha-van | mā | atathāḥ-iva |
yadā | naḥ | sūnṛtā-vataḥ | karaḥ | āt | arthayāse | it | yoja | nu | indra | te | harī iti |
akṣan | amīmadanta | hi | ava | priyāḥ | adhūṣata |
astoṣata | sva-bhānavaḥ | viprāḥ | naviṣṭhayā | matī | yoja | nu | indra | te | harī iti |
su-sandṛśam | tvā | vayam | magha-van | vandiṣīmahi |
pra | nūnam | pūrṇa-vandhuraḥ | stutaḥ | yāhi | vaśān | anu | yoja | nu | indra | te | harī iti |
saḥ | gha | tam | vṛṣaṇam | ratham | adhi | tiṣṭhāti | go-vidam |
yaḥ | pātram | hāri-yojanam | pūrṇam | indra | ciketati | yoja | nu | indra | te | harī iti |
yuktaḥ | te | astu | dakṣiṇaḥ | uta | savyaḥ | śatakrato iti śata-krato |
tena | jāyām | upa | priyām | mandānaḥ | yāhi | andhasaḥ | yoja | nu | indra | te | harī iti |
yunajmi | te | brahmaṇā | keśinā | harī iti | upa | pra | yāhi | dadhiṣe | gabhastyoḥ |
ut | tvā | sutāsaḥ | rabhasāḥ | amandiṣuḥ | pūṣaṇ-vān | vajrin | sam | ūm̐ iti | patnyā | amadaḥ |
aśva-vati | prathamaḥ | goṣu | gaccati | supra-āvīḥ | indra | martyaḥ | tava | ūti-bhiḥ |
tam | it | pṛṇakṣi | vasunā | bhavīyasā | sindhum | āpaḥ | yathā | abhitaḥ | vi-cetasaḥ |
āpaḥ | na | devīḥ | upa | yanti | hotriyam | avaḥ | paśyanti | vi-tatam | yathā | rajaḥ |
prācaiḥ | devāsaḥ | pra | nayanti | deva-yum | brahma-priyam | joṣayante | varāḥ-iva |
adhi | dvayoḥ | adadhāḥ | ukthyam | vacaḥ | yata-srucā | mithunā | yā | saparyataḥ |
asam-yattaḥ | vrate | te | kṣeti | puṣyati | bhadrā | śaktiḥ | yajamānāya | sunvate |
āt | aṅgirāḥ | prathamam | dadhire | vayaḥ | iddha-agnayaḥ | śamyā | ye | su-kṛtyayā |
sarvam | paṇeḥ | sam | avindanta | bhojanam | aśva-vantam | go-mantam | ā | paśum | naraḥ |
yajñaiḥ | atharvā | prathamaḥ | pathaḥ | tate | tataḥ | sūryaḥ | vrata-pāḥ | venaḥ | ā | ajani |
ā | gāḥ | ājat | uśanā | kāvyaḥ | sacā | yamasya | jātam | amṛtam | yajāmahe |
barhiḥ | vā | yat | su-apatyāya | vṛjyate | arkaḥ | vā | ślokam | ā-ghoṣate | divi |
grāvā | yatra | vadati | kāruḥ | ukthyaḥ | tasya | it | indraḥ | abhi-pitveṣu | raṇyati |
asāvi | somaḥ | indra | te | śaviṣṭha | dhṛṣṇo iti | ā | gahi |
ā | tvā | pṛṇaktu | indriyam | rajaḥ | sūryaḥ | na | raśmi-bhiḥ |
indram | it | harī iti | vahataḥ | apratidhṛṣṭa-śavasam |
ṛṣīṇām | ca | stutīḥ | upa | yajñam | ca | mānuṣāṇām |
ā | tiṣṭha | vṛtra-han | ratham | yuktā | te | brahmaṇā | harī iti |
arvācīnam | su | te | manaḥ | grāvā | kṛṇotu | vagnunā |
imam | indra | sutam | piba | jyeṣṭham | amartyam | madam |
śukrasya | tvā | abhi | akṣaran | dhārāḥ | ṛtasya | sadane |
indrāya | nūnam | arcata | ukthāni | ca | bravītana |
sutāḥ | amatsuḥ | indavaḥ | jyeṣṭham | namasyata | sahaḥ |
nakiḥ | tvat | rathi-taraḥ | harī iti | yat | indra | yacchase |
nakiḥ | tvā | anu | majmanā | nakiḥ | su-aśvaḥ | ānaśe |
yaḥ | ekaḥ | it | vi-dayate | vasu | martāya | dāśuṣe |
īśānaḥ | aprati-skutaḥ | indraḥ | aṅga |
kadā | martam | arādhasam | padā | kṣumpam-iva | sphurat |
kadā | naḥ | śuśravat | giraḥ | indraḥ | aṅga |
yaḥ | cit | hi | tvā | bahu-bhyaḥ | ā | suta-vān | ā-vivāsati |
ugram | tat | patyate | śavaḥ | indraḥ | aṅga |
svādoḥ | itthā | viṣu-vataḥ | madhvaḥ | pibanti | gauryaḥ |
yāḥ | indreṇa | sa-yāvarīḥ | vṛṣṇā | madanti | śobhase | vasvīḥ | anu | sva-rājyam |
tāḥ | asya | pṛśana-yuvaḥ | somam | śrīṇanti | pṛśnayaḥ |
priyāḥ | indrasya | dhenavaḥ | vajram | hinvanti | sāyakam | vasvīḥ | anu | sva-rājyam |
tāḥ | asya | namasā | sahaḥ | saparyanti | pra-cetasaḥ |
vratāni | asya | saścire | purūṇi | pūrva-cittaye | vasvīḥ | anu | sva-rājyam |
indraḥ | dadhīcaḥ | astha-bhiḥ | vṛtrāṇi | aprati-skutaḥ |
jaghāna | navatīḥ | nava |
icchan | aśvasya | yat | śiraḥ | parvateṣu | apa-śritam |
tat | vidat | śaryaṇā-vati |
atra | aha | goḥ | amanvata | nāma | tvaṣṭuḥ | apīcyam |
itthā | candramasaḥ | gṛhe |
kaḥ | adya | yuṅkte | dhuri | gāḥ | ṛtasya | śimī-vataḥ | bhāminaḥ | duḥ-hṛṇāyūn |
āsan-iṣūn | hṛtsu-asaḥ | mayaḥ-bhūn | yaḥ | eṣām | bhṛtyām | ṛṇadhat | saḥ | jīvāt |
kaḥ | īṣate | tujyate | kaḥ | bibhāya | kaḥ | maṁsate | santam | indram | kaḥ | anti |
kaḥ | tokāya | kaḥ | ibhāya | uta | rāye | adhi | bravat | tanve | kaḥ | janāya |
kaḥ | agnim | īṭṭe | haviṣā | ghṛtena | srucā | yajātai | ṛtu-bhiḥ | dhruvebhiḥ |
kasmai | devāḥ | ā | vahān | āśu | homa | kaḥ | maṁsate | vīti-hotraḥ | su-devaḥ |
tvam | aṅga | pra | śaṁsiṣaḥ | devaḥ | śaviṣṭha | martyam |
na | tvat | anyaḥ | magha-van | asti | marḍitā | indra | bravīmi | te | vacaḥ |
mā | te | rādhāṁsi | mā | te | ūtayaḥ | vaso iti | asmān | kadā | cana | dabhan |
viśvā | ca | naḥ | upa-mimīhi | mānuṣa | vasūni | carṣaṇi-bhyaḥ | ā |
pra | ye | śumbhante | janayaḥ | na | saptayaḥ | yāman | rudrasya | sūnavaḥ | su-daṁsasaḥ |
rodasī iti | hi | marutaḥ | cakrire | vṛdhe | madanti | vīrāḥ | vidatheṣu | ghṛṣvayaḥ |
te | ukṣitāsaḥ | mahimānam | āśata | divi | rudrāsaḥ | adhi | cakrire | sadaḥ |
arcantaḥ | arkam | janayantaḥ | indriyam | adhi | śriyaḥ | dadhire | pṛśni-mātaraḥ |
go-mātaraḥ | yat | śubhayante | añji-bhiḥ | tanūṣu | śubhrāḥ | dadhire | virukmataḥ |
bādhante | viśvam | abhi-mātinam | apa | vartmāni | eṣām | anu | rīyate | ghṛtam |
vi | ye | bhrājante | su-makhāsaḥ | ṛṣṭi-bhiḥ | pra-cyavayantaḥ | acyutā | cit | ojasā |
manaḥ-juvaḥ | yat | marutaḥ | ratheṣu | ā | vṛṣa-vrātāsaḥ | pṛṣatīḥ | ayugdhvam |
pra | yat | ratheṣu | pṛṣatīḥ | ayugdhvam | vāje | adrim | marutaḥ | raṁhayantaḥ |
uta | aruṣasya | vi | syanti | dhārāḥ | carma-iva | uda-bhiḥ | vi | undanti | bhūma |
ā | vaḥ | vahantu | saptayaḥ | raghu-syadaḥ | raghu-patvānaḥ | pra | jigāta | bāhu-bhiḥ |
sīdata | ā | barhiḥ | uru | vaḥ | sadaḥ | kṛtam | mādayadhvam | marutaḥ | madhvaḥ | andhasaḥ |
te | avardhanta | sva-tavasaḥ | mahi-tvanā | ā | nākam | tasthuḥ | uru | cakrire | sadaḥ |
viṣṇuḥ | yat | ha | āvat | vṛṣaṇam | mada-cyutam | vayaḥ | na | sīdan | adhi | barhiṣi | priye |
śūrāḥ-iva | it | yuyudhayaḥ | na | jagmayaḥ | śravasyavaḥ | na | pṛtanāsu | yetire |
bhayante | viśvā | bhuvanā | marut-bhyaḥ | rājānaḥ-iva | tveṣa-saṁdṛśaḥ | naraḥ |
tvaṣṭā | yat | vajram | su-kṛtam | hiraṇyayam | sahasra-bhṛṣṭim | su-apāḥ | avartayat |
dhatte | indraḥ | nari | apāṁsi | kartave | ahan | vṛtram | niḥ | apām | aubjat | arṇavam |
ūrdhvam | nunudre | avatam | te | ojasā | dadṛhāṇam | cit | bibhiduḥ | vi | parvatam |
dhamantaḥ | vāṇam | marutaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | made | somasya | raṇyāni | cakrire |
jihmam | nunudre | avatam | tayā | diśā | asiñcan | utsam | gotamāya | tṛṣṇa-je |
ā | gacchanti | īm | avasā | citra-bhānavaḥ | kāmam | viprasya | tarpayanta | dhāma-bhiḥ |
yā | vaḥ | śarma | śaśamānāya | santi | tri-dhātūni | dāśuṣe | yacchata | adhi |
asmabhyam | tāni | marutaḥ | vi | yanta | rayim | naḥ | dhatta | vṛṣaṇaḥ | su-vīram |
marutaḥ | yasya | hi | kṣaye | pātha | divaḥ | vi-mahasaḥ |
saḥ | su-gopātamaḥ | janaḥ |
yajñaiḥ | vā | yajña-vāhasaḥ | viprasya | vā | matīnām |
marutaḥ | śṛṇuta | havam |
uta | vā | yasya | vājinaḥ | anu | vipram | atakṣata |
saḥ | gantā | go-mati | vraje |
asya | vīrasya | barhiṣi | sutaḥ | somaḥ | diviṣṭiṣu |
uktham | madaḥ | ca | śasyate |
asya | śroṣantu | ā | bhuvaḥ | viśvāḥ | yaḥ | carṣaṇīḥ | abhi |
sūram | cit | sasruṣīḥ | iṣaḥ |
pūrvībhiḥ | hi | dadāśima | śarat-bhiḥ | marutaḥ | vayam |
avaḥ-bhiḥ | carṣaṇīnām |
su-bhagaḥ | saḥ | pra-yajyavaḥ | marutaḥ | astu | martyaḥ |
yasya | prayāṁsi | parṣatha |
śaśamānasya | vā | naraḥ | svedasya | satya-śavasaḥ |
vida | kāmasya | venataḥ |
yūyam | tat | satya-śavasaḥ | āviḥ | karta | mahi-tvanā |
vidhyata | vi-dyutā | rakṣaḥ |
gūhata | guhyam | tamaḥ | vi | yāta | viśvam | atriṇam |
jyotiḥ | karta | yat | uśmasi |
pra-tvakṣasaḥ | pra-tavasaḥ | vi-rapśinaḥ | anānatāḥ | avithurāḥ | ṛjīṣiṇaḥ |
juṣṭa-tamāsaḥ | nṛ-tamāsaḥ | añji-bhiḥ | vi | ānajre | ke | cit | usrā-iva | stṛ-bhiḥ |
upa-hvareṣu | yat | acidhvam | yayim | vayaḥ-iva | marutaḥ | kena | cit | pathā |
ścotanti | kośāḥ | upa | vaḥ | ratheṣu | ā | ghṛtam | ukṣata | madhu-varṇam | arcate |
pra | eṣām | ajmeṣu | vithurā-iva | rejate | bhūmiḥ | yāmeṣu | yat | ha | yuñjate | śubhe |
te | krīḻayaḥ | dhunayaḥ | bhrājat-ṛṣṭayaḥ | svayam | mahi-tvam | panayanta | dhūtayaḥ |
saḥ | hi | sva-sṛt | pṛṣat-aśvaḥ | yuvā | gaṇaḥ | ayā | īśānaḥ | taviṣībhiḥ | ā-vṛtaḥ |
asi | satyaḥ | ṛṇa-yāvā | anedyaḥ | asyāḥ | dhiyaḥ | pra-avitā | atha | vṛṣā | gaṇaḥ |
pituḥ | pratnasya | janmanā | vadāmasi | somasya | jihvā | pra | jigāti | cakṣasā |
yat | īm | indram | śami | ṛkvāṇaḥ | āśata | āt | it | nāmāni | yajñiyāni | dadhire |
śriyase | kam | bhānu-bhiḥ | sam | mimikṣire | te | raśmi-bhiḥ | te | ṛkva-bhiḥ | su-khādayaḥ |
te | vāśī-mantaḥ | iṣmiṇaḥ | abhīravaḥ | vidre | priyasya | mārutasya | dhāmnaḥ |
ā | vidyunmat-bhiḥ | marutaḥ | su-arkaiḥ | rathebhiḥ | yāta | ṛṣṭimat-bhiḥ | aśva-parṇaiḥ |
ā | varṣiṣṭhayā | naḥ | iṣā | vayaḥ | na | paptata | su-māyāḥ |
te | aruṇebhiḥ | varam | ā | piśaṅgaiḥ | śubhe | kam | yānti | rathatūḥ-bhiḥ | aśvaiḥ |
rukmaḥ | na | citraḥ | svadhiti-vān | pavyā | rathasya | jaṅghananta | bhūma |
śriye | kam | vaḥ | adhi | tanūṣu | vāśīḥ | medhā | vanā | na | kṛṇavante | ūrdhvā |
yuṣmabhyam | kam | marutaḥ | su-jātāḥ | tuvi-dyumnāsaḥ | dhanayante | adrim |
ahāni | gṛdhrāḥ | pari | ā | vaḥ | ā | aguḥ | imām | dhiyam | vārkāryām | ca | devīm |
brahma | kṛṇvantaḥ | gotamāsaḥ | arkaiḥ | ūrdhvam | nunudre | utsa-dhim | pibadhyai |
etat | tyat | na | yojanam | aceti | sasvaḥ | ha | yat | marutaḥ | gotamaḥ | vaḥ |
paśyan | hiraṇya-cakrān | ayaḥ-daṁṣṭrān | vi-dhāvataḥ | varāhūn |
eṣā | syā | vaḥ | marutaḥ | anu-bhartrī | prati | stobhati | vāghataḥ | na | vāṇī |
astobhayat | vṛthā | āsām | anu | svadhām | gabhastyoḥ |
ā | naḥ | bhadrāḥ | kratavaḥ | yantu | viśvataḥ | adabdhāsaḥ | apari-itāsaḥ | ut-bhidaḥ |
devāḥ | naḥ | yathā | sadam | it | vṛdhe | asan | apra-āyuvaḥ | rakṣitāraḥ | dive-dive |
devānām | bhadrā | su-matiḥ | ṛju-yatām | devānām | rātiḥ | abhi | naḥ | ni | vartatām |
devānām | sakhyam | upa | sedima | vayam | devāḥ | naḥ | āyuḥ | pra | tirantu | jīvase |
tān | pūrvayā | ni-vidā | hūmahe | vayam | bhagam | mitram | aditim | dakṣam | asridham |
aryamaṇam | varuṇam | somam | aśvinā | sarasvatī | naḥ | su-bhagā | mayaḥ | karat |
tat | naḥ | vātaḥ | mayaḥ-bhu | vātu | bheṣajam | tat | mātā | pṛthivī | tat | pitā | dyauḥ |
tat | grāvāṇaḥ | soma-sutaḥ | mayaḥ-bhuvaḥ | tat | aśvinā | śṛṇutam | dhiṣṇyā | yuvam |
tam | īśānam | jagataḥ | tasthuṣaḥ | patim | dhiyam-jinvam | avase | hūmahe | vayam |
pūṣā | naḥ | yathā | vedasām | asat | vṛdhe | rakṣitā | pāyuḥ | adabdhaḥ | svastaye |
svasti | naḥ | indraḥ | vṛddha-śravāḥ | svasti | naḥ | pūṣā | viśva-vedāḥ |
svasti | naḥ | tārkṣyaḥ | ariṣṭa-nemiḥ | svasti | naḥ | bṛhaspatiḥ | dadhātu |
pṛṣat-aśvāḥ | marutaḥ | pṛśni-mātaraḥ | śubham-yāvānaḥ | vidatheṣu | jagmayaḥ |
agni-jihvāḥ | manavaḥ | sūra-cakṣasaḥ | viśve | naḥ | devāḥ | avasā | ā | gaman | iha |
bhadram | karṇebhiḥ | śṛṇuyāma | devāḥ | bhadram | paśyema | akṣa-bhiḥ | yajatrāḥ |
sthiraiḥ | aṅgaiḥ | tustu-vāṁsaḥ | tanūbhiḥ | vi | aśema | deva-hitam | yat | āyuḥ |
śatam | it | nu | śaradaḥ | anti | devāḥ | yatra | naḥ | cakra | jarasam | tanūnām |
putrāsaḥ | yatra | pitaraḥ | bhavanti | mā | naḥ | madhyā | ririṣata | āyuḥ | gantoḥ |
aditiḥ | dyauḥ | aditiḥ | antarikṣam | aditiḥ | mātā | saḥ | pitā | saḥ | putraḥ |
viśve | devāḥ | aditiḥ | pañca | janāḥ | aditiḥ | jātam | aditiḥ | jani-tvam |
ṛju-nītī | naḥ | varuṇaḥ | mitraḥ | nayatu | vidvān |
aryamā | devaiḥ | sa-joṣāḥ |
te | hi | vasvaḥ | vasavānāḥ | te | apra-mūrāḥ | mahaḥ-bhiḥ |
vratā | rakṣante | viśvāhā |
te | asmabhyam | śarma | yaṁsan | amṛtāḥ | martyebhyaḥ |
bādhamānāḥ | apa | dviṣaḥ |
vi | naḥ | pathaḥ | suvitāya | ciyantu | indraḥ | marutaḥ |
pūṣā | bhagaḥ | vandyāsaḥ |
uta | naḥ | dhiyaḥ | go-agrāḥ | pūṣan | viṣṇo iti | eva-yāvaḥ |
karta | naḥ | svasti-mataḥ |
madhu | vātāḥ | ṛta-yate | madhu | kṣaranti | sindhavaḥ |
mādhvīḥ | naḥ | santu | oṣadhīḥ |
madhu | naktam | uta | uṣasaḥ | madhu-mat | pārthivam | rajaḥ |
madhu | dyauḥ | astu | naḥ | pitā |
madhu-mān | naḥ | vanaspatiḥ | madhu-mān | astu | sūryaḥ |
mādhvīḥ | gāvaḥ | bhavantu | naḥ |
śam | naḥ | mitraḥ | śam | varuṇaḥ | śam | naḥ | bhavatu | aryamā |
śam | naḥ | indraḥ | bṛhaspatiḥ | śam | naḥ | viṣṇuḥ | uru-kramaḥ |
tvam | soma | pra | cikitaḥ | manīṣā | tvam | rajiṣṭham | anu | neṣi | panthām |
tava | pra-nītī | pitaraḥ | naḥ | indo iti | deveṣu | ratnam | abhajanta | dhīrāḥ |
tvam | soma | kratu-bhiḥ | su-kratuḥ | bhūḥ | tvam | dakṣaiḥ | su-dakṣaḥ | viśva-vedāḥ |
tvam | vṛṣā | vṛṣa-tvebhiḥ | mahi-tvā | dyumnebhiḥ | dyumnī | abhavaḥ | nṛ-cakṣāḥ |
rājñaḥ | nu | te | varuṇasya | vratāni | bṛhat | gabhīram | tava | soma | dhāma |
śuciḥ | tvam | asi | priyaḥ | na | mitraḥ | dakṣāyyaḥ | aryamā-iva | asi | soma |
yā | te | dhāmāni | divi | yā | pṛthivyām | yā | parvateṣu | oṣadhīṣu | ap-su |
tebhiḥ | naḥ | viśvaiḥ | su-manāḥ | aheḻan | rājan | soma | prati | havyā | gṛbhāya |
tvam | soma | asi | sat-patiḥ | tvam | rājā | uta | vṛtra-hā |
tvam | bhadraḥ | asi | kratuḥ |
tvam | ca | soma | naḥ | vaśaḥ | jīvātum | na | marāmahe |
priya-stotraḥ | vanaspatiḥ |
tvam | soma | mahe | bhagam | tvam | yūne | ṛta-yate |
dakṣam | dadhāsi | jīvase |
tvam | naḥ | soma | viśvataḥ | rakṣa | rājan | agha-yataḥ |
na | riṣyet | tvā-vataḥ | sakhā |
soma | yāḥ | te | mayaḥ-bhuvaḥ | ūtayaḥ | santi | dāśuṣe |
tābhiḥ | naḥ | avitā | bhava |
imam | yajñam | idam | vacaḥ | jujuṣāṇaḥ | upa-āgahi |
soma | tvam | naḥ | vṛdhe | bhava |
soma | gīḥ-bhiḥ | tvā | vayam | vardhayāmaḥ | vacaḥ-vidaḥ |
su-mṛḻīkaḥ | naḥ | ā | viśa |
gaya-sphānaḥ | amīva-hā | vasu-vit | puṣṭi-vardhanaḥ |
su-mitraḥ | soma | naḥ | bhava |
soma | rarandhi | naḥ | hṛdi | gāvaḥ | na | yavaseṣu | ā |
maryaḥ-iva | sve | okye |
yaḥ | soma | sakhye | tava | raraṇat | deva | martyaḥ |
tam | dakṣaḥ | sacate | kaviḥ |
uruṣya | naḥ | abhi-śasteḥ | soma | ni | pāhi | aṁhasaḥ |
sakhā | su-śevaḥ | edhi | naḥ |
ā | pyāyasva | sam | etu | te | viśvataḥ | soma | vṛṣṇyam |
bhava | vājasya | sam-gathe |
ā | pyāyasva | madin-tama | soma | viśvebhiḥ | aṁśu-bhiḥ |
bhava | naḥ | suśravaḥ-tamaḥ | sakhā | vṛdhe |
sam | te | payāṁsi | sam | ūm̐ iti | yantu | vājāḥ | sam | vṛṣṇyāni | abhimāti-sahaḥ |
ā-pyāyamānaḥ | amṛtāya | soma | divi | śravāṁsi | ut-tamāni | dhiṣva |
yā | te | dhāmāni | haviṣā | yajanti | tā | te | viśvā | pari-bhūḥ | astu | yajñam |
gaya-sphānaḥ | pra-taraṇaḥ | su-vīraḥ | avīra-hā | pra | cara | soma | duryān |
somaḥ | dhenum | somaḥ | arvantam | āśum | somaḥ | vīram | karmaṇyam | dadāti |
sadanyam | vidathyam | sabheyam | pitṛ-śravaṇam | yaḥ | dadāśat | asmai |
aṣāḻham | yut-su | pṛtanāsu | paprim | svaḥ-sām | apsām | vṛjanasya | gopām |
bhareṣu-jām | su-kṣitim | su-śravasam | jayantam | tvām | anu | madema | soma |
tvam | imāḥ | oṣadhīḥ | soma | viśvāḥ | tvam | apaḥ | ajanayaḥ | tvam | gāḥ |
tvam | ā | tatantha | uru | antarikṣam | tvam | jyotiṣā | vi | tamaḥ | vavartha |
devena | naḥ | manasā | deva | soma | rāyaḥ | bhāgam | sahasā-van | abhi | yudhya |
mā | tvā | ā | tanat | īśiṣe | vīryasya | ubhayebhyaḥ | pra | cikitsa | go-iṣṭau |
etāḥ | ūm̐ iti | tyāḥ | uṣasaḥ | ketum | akrata | pūrve | ardhe | rajasaḥ | bhānum | añjate |
niḥ-kṛṇvānāḥ | āyudhāni-iva | dhṛṣṇavaḥ | prati | gāvaḥ | aruṣīḥ | yanti | mātaraḥ |
ut | apaptan | aruṇāḥ | bhānavaḥ | vṛthā | su-āyujaḥ | aruṣīḥ | gāḥ | ayukṣata |
akran | uṣasaḥ | vayunāni | pūrva-thā | ruśantam | bhānum | aruṣīḥ | aśiśrayuḥ |
arcanti | nārīḥ | apasaḥ | na | viṣṭi-bhiḥ | samānena | yojanena | ā | parā-vataḥ |
iṣam | vahantīḥ | su-kṛte | su-dānave | viśvā | it | aha | yajamānāya | sunvate |
adhi | peśāṁsi | vapate | nṛtūḥ-iva | apa | ūrṇute | vakṣaḥ | usrā-iva | barjaham |
jyotiḥ | viśvasmai | bhuvanāya | kṛṇvatī | gāvaḥ | na | vrajam | vi | uṣāḥ | āvarityāvaḥ | tamaḥ |
prati | arciḥ | ruśat | asyāḥ | adarśi | vi | tiṣṭhate | bādhate | kṛṣṇam | abhvam |
svarum | na | peśaḥ | vidatheṣu | añjan | citram | divaḥ | duhitā | bhānum | aśret |
atāriṣma | tamasaḥ | pāram | asya | uṣāḥ | ucchantī | vayunā | kṛṇoti |
śriye | chandaḥ | na | smayate | vi-bhātī | su-pratīkā | saumanasāya | ajīgariti |
bhāsvatī | netrī | sūnṛtānām | divaḥ | stave | duhitā | gotamebhiḥ |
prajā-vataḥ | nṛ-vataḥ | aśva-budhyān | uṣaḥ | go-agrān | upa | māsi | vājān |
uṣaḥ | tam | aśyām | yaśasam | su-vīram | dāsa-pravargam | rayim | aśva-budhyam |
su-daṁsasā | śravasā | yā | vi-bhāsi | vāja-prasūtā | su-bhage | bṛhantam |
viśvāni | devī | bhuvanā | abhi-cakṣya | pratīcī | cakṣuḥ | urviyā | vi | bhāti |
viśvam | jīvam | carase | bodhayantī | viśvasya | vācam | avidat | manāyoḥ |
punaḥ-punaḥ | jāyamānā | purāṇī | samānam | varṇam | abhi | śumbhamānā |
śvaghnī-iva | kṛtnuḥ | vijaḥ | ā-minānā | martasya | devī | jarayantī | āyuḥ |
vi-ūrṇvatī | divaḥ | antān | abodhi | apa | svasāram | sanutaḥ | yuyoti |
pra-minatī | manuṣyā | yugāni | yoṣā | jārasya | cakṣasā | vi | bhāti |
paśūn | na | citrā | su-bhagā | prathānā | sindhuḥ | na | kṣodaḥ | urviyā | vi | aśvait |
aminatī | daivyāni | vratāni | sūryasya | ceti | raśmi-bhiḥ | dṛśānā |
uṣaḥ | tat | citram | ā | bhara | asmabhyam | vājinī-vati |
yena | tokam | ca | tanayam | ca | dhāmahe |
uṣaḥ | adya | iha | go-mati | aśva-vati | vibhā-vari |
revat | asme iti | vi | uccha | sūnṛtā-vati |
yukṣva | hi | vājinī-vati | aśvān | adya | aruṇān | uṣaḥ |
atha | naḥ | viśvā | saubhagāni | ā | vaha |
aśvinā | vartiḥ | asmat | ā | go-mat | dasrā | hiraṇya-vat |
arvāk | ratham | sa-manasā | ni | yacchatam |
yau | itthā | ślokam | ā | divaḥ | jyotiḥ | janāya | cakrathuḥ |
ā | naḥ | ūrjam | vahatam | aśvinā | yuvam |
ā | iha | devā | mayaḥ-bhuvā | dasrā | hiraṇyavartanī iti hiraṇya-vartanī |
uṣaḥ-budhaḥ | vahantu | soma-pītaye |
agnīṣomau | imam | su | me | śṛṇutam | vṛṣaṇā | havam |
prati | su-uktāni | haryatam | bhavatam | dāśuṣe | mayaḥ |
agnīṣomā | yaḥ | adya | vām | idam | vacaḥ | saparyati |
tasmai | dhattam | su-vīryam | gavām | poṣam | su-aśvyam |
agnīṣomā | yaḥ | ā-hutim | yaḥ | vām | dāśāt | haviḥ-kṛtim |
saḥ | pra-jayā | su-vīryam | viśvam | āyuḥ | vi | aśnavat |
agnīṣomā | ceti | tat | vīryam | vām | yat | amuṣṇītam | avasam | paṇim | gāḥ |
ava | atiratam | bṛsayasya | śeṣaḥ | avindatam | jyotiḥ | ekam | bahu-bhyaḥ |
yuvam | etāni | divi | rocanāni | agniḥ | ca | soma | sakratū iti sa-kratū | adhattam |
yuvam | sindhūn | abhi-śasteḥ | avadyāt | agnīṣomau | amuñcatam | gṛbhītān |
ā | anyam | divaḥ | mātariśvā | jabhāra | amathnāt | anyam | pari | śyenaḥ | adreḥ |
agnīṣomā | brahmaṇā | vavṛdhānā | urum | yajñāya | cakrathuḥ | ūm̐ iti | lokam |
agnīṣomā | haviṣaḥ | pra-sthitasya | vītam | haryatam | vṛṣaṇā | juṣethām |
su-śarmāṇā | su-avasā | hi | bhūtam | atha | dhattam | yajamānāya | śam | yoḥ |
yaḥ | agnīṣomā | haviṣā | saparyāt | devadrīcā | manasā | yaḥ | ghṛtena |
tasya | vratam | rakṣatam | pātam | aṁhasaḥ | viśe | janāya | mahi | śarma | yacchatam |
agnīṣomā | sa-vedasā | sahūtī iti sa-hūtī | vanatam | giraḥ |
sam | deva-trā | babhūvathuḥ |
agnīṣomau | anena | vām | yaḥ | vām | ghṛtena | dāśati |
tasmai | dīdayatam | bṛhat |
agnīṣomau | imāni | naḥ | yuvam | havyā | jujoṣatam |
ā | yātam | upa | naḥ | sacā |
agnīṣomā | pipṛtam | arvataḥ | naḥ | ā | pyāyantām | usriyāḥ | havya-sūdaḥ |
asme iti | balāni | maghavat-su | dhattam | kṛṇutam | naḥ | adhvaram | śruṣṭi-mantam |
imam | stomam | arhate | jāta-vedase | ratham-iva | sam | mahema | manīṣayā |
bhadrā | hi | naḥ | pra-matiḥ | asya | sam-sadi | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
yasmai | tvam | ā-yajase | saḥ | sādhati | anarvā | kṣeti | dadhate | su-vīryam |
saḥ | tūtāva | na | enam | aśnoti | aṁhatiḥ | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
śakema | tvā | sam-idham | sādhaya | dhiyaḥ | tve iti | devāḥ | haviḥ | adanti | ā-hutam |
tvam | ādityān | ā | vaha | tān | hi | uśmasi | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
bharāma | idhmam | kṛṇavāma | havīṁṣi | te | citayantaḥ | parvaṇā-parvaṇā | vayam |
jīvātave | pra-taram | sādhaya | dhiyaḥ | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
viśām | gopāḥ | asya | caranti | jantavaḥ | dvi-pat | ca | yat | uta | catuḥ-pat | aktu-bhiḥ |
citraḥ | pra-ketaḥ | uṣasaḥ | mahān | asi | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
tvam | adhvaryuḥ | uta | hotā | asi | pūrvyaḥ | pra-śāstā | potā | januṣā | puraḥ-hitaḥ |
viśvā | vidvān | ārtvijyā | dhīra | puṣyasi | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
yaḥ | viśvataḥ | su-pratīkaḥ | sa-dṛṅ | asi | dūre | cit | san | taḻit-iva | ati | rocase |
rātryāḥ | cit | andhaḥ | ati | deva | paśyasi | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
pūrvaḥ | devāḥ | bhavatu | sunvataḥ | rathaḥ | asmākam | śaṁsaḥ | abhi | astu | duḥ-dhyaḥ |
tat | ā | jānīta | uta | puṣyata | vacaḥ | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
vadhaiḥ | duḥ-śaṁsān | apa | duḥ-dhyaḥ | jahi | dūre | vā | ye | anti | vā | ke | cit | atriṇaḥ |
atha | yajñāya | gṛṇate | su-gam | kṛdhi | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
yat | ayukthāḥ | aruṣā | rohitā | rathe | vāta-jūtā | vṛṣabhasya-iva | te | ravaḥ |
āt | invasi | vaninaḥ | dhūma-ketunā | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
adha | svanāt | uta | bibhyuḥ | patatriṇaḥ | drapsāḥ | yat | te | yavasa-adaḥ | vi | asthiran |
su-gam | tat | te | tāvakebhyaḥ | rathebhyaḥ | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
ayam | mitrasya | varuṇasya | dhāyase | ava-yātām | marutām | heḻaḥ | adbhutaḥ |
mṛḻa | su | naḥ | bhūtu | eṣām | manaḥ | punaḥ | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
devaḥ | devānām | asi | mitraḥ | adbhutaḥ | vasuḥ | vasūnām | asi | cāruḥ | adhvare |
śarman | syāma | tava | saprathaḥ-tame | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
tat | te | bhadram | yat | sam-iddhaḥ | sve | dame | soma-āhutaḥ | jarase | mṛḻayat-tamaḥ |
dadhāsi | ratnam | draviṇam | ca | dāśuṣe | agne | sakhye | mā | riṣāma | vayam | tava |
yasmai | tvam | su-draviṇaḥ | dadāśaḥ | anāgāḥ-tvam | adite | sarva-tātā |
yam | bhadreṇa | śavasā | codayāsi | prajā-vatā | rādhasā | te | syāma |
saḥ | tvam | agne | saubhaga-tvasya | vidvān | asmākam | āyuḥ | pra | tira | iha | deva |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
dve iti | virūpe iti vi-rūpe | carataḥ | svarthe iti su-arthe | anyā-anyā | vatsam | upa | dhāpayete iti |
hariḥ | anyasyām | bhavati | svadhā-vān | śukraḥ | anyasyām | dadṛśe | su-varcāḥ |
daśa | imam | tvaṣṭuḥ | janayanta | garbham | atandrāsaḥ | yuvatayaḥ | vi-bhṛtram |
tigma-anīkam | sva-yaśasam | janeṣu | vi-rocamānam | pari | sīm | nayanti |
trīṇi | jānā | pari | bhūṣanti | asya | samudre | ekam | divi | ekam | ap-su |
pūrvām | anu | pra | diśam | pārthivānām | ṛtūn | pra-śāsat | vi | dadhau | anuṣṭhu |
kaḥ | imam | vaḥ | niṇyam | ā | ciketa | vatsaḥ | mātṝḥ | janayata | svadhābhiḥ |
bahvīnām | garbhaḥ | apasām | upa-sthāt | mahān | kaviḥ | niḥ | carati | svadhā-vān |
āviḥ-tyaḥ | vardhate | cāruḥ | āsu | jihmānām | ūrdhvaḥ | sva-yaśāḥ | upa-sthe |
ubhe iti | tvaṣṭuḥ | bibhyatuḥ | jāyamānāt | pratīcī iti | siṁham | prati | joṣayete iti |
ubhe iti | bhadre iti | joṣayete iti | na | mene iti | gāvaḥ | na | vāśrāḥ | upa | tasthuḥ | evaiḥ |
saḥ | dakṣāṇām | dakṣa-patiḥ | babhūva | añjanti | yam | dakṣiṇataḥ | haviḥ-bhiḥ |
ut | yaṁyamīti | savitā-iva | bāhū iti | ubhe iti | sicau | yatate | bhīmaḥ | ṛñjan |
ut | śukram | atkam | ajate | simasmāt | navā | mātṛ-bhyaḥ | vasanā | jahāti |
tveṣam | rūpam | kṛṇute | ut-taram | yat | sam-pṛñcānaḥ | sadane | gobhiḥ | at-bhiḥ |
kaviḥ | budhnam | pari | marmṛjyate | dhīḥ | sā | deva-tātā | sam-itiḥ | babhūva |
uru | te | jrayaḥ | pari | eti | budhnam | vi-rocamānam | mahiṣasya | dhāma |
viśvebhiḥ | agne | svayaśaḥ-bhiḥ | iddhaḥ | adabdhebhiḥ | pāyu-bhiḥ | pāhi | asmān |
dhanvan | srotaḥ | kṛṇute | gatum | ūrmim | śukraiḥ | ūrmi-bhiḥ | abhi | nakṣati | kṣām |
viśvā | sanāni | jaṭhareṣu | dhatte | antaḥ | navāsu | carati | pra-sūṣu |
eva | naḥ | agne | sam-idhā | vṛdhānaḥ | revat | pāvaka | śravase | vi | bhāhi |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
saḥ | pratna-thā | sahasā | jāyamānaḥ | sadyaḥ | kāvyāni | baṭ | adhatta | viśvā |
āpaḥ | ca | mitram | dhiṣaṇā | ca | sādhan | devāḥ | agnim | dhārayan | draviṇaḥ-dām |
saḥ | pūrvayā | ni-vidā | kavyatā | āyoḥ | imāḥ | pra-jāḥ | ajanayat | manūnām |
vivasvatā | cakṣasā | dyām | apaḥ | ca | devāḥ | agnim | dhārayan | draviṇaḥ-dām |
tam | iḻata | prathamam | yajña-sādham | viśaḥ | ārīḥ | ā-hutam | ṛñjasānam |
ūrjaḥ | putram | bharatam | sṛpra-dānum | devāḥ | agnim | dhārayan | draviṇaḥ-dām |
saḥ | mātariśvā | puruvāra-puṣṭiḥ | vidat | gātum | tanayāya | svaḥ-vit |
viśām | gopāḥ | janitā | rodasyoḥ | devāḥ | agnim | dhārayan | draviṇaḥ-dām |
naktoṣasā | varṇam | āmemyāne ityā-memyāne | dhāpayete iti | śiśum | ekam | samīcī iti sam-īcī |
dyāvākṣāmā | rukmaḥ | antaḥ | vi | bhāti | devāḥ | agnim | dhārayan | draviṇaḥ-dām |
rāyaḥ | budhnaḥ | sam-gamanaḥ | vasūnām | yajñasya | ketuḥ | manma-sādhanaḥ | veriti veḥ |
amṛta-tvam | rakṣamāṇāsaḥ | enam | devāḥ | agnim | dhārayan | draviṇaḥ-dām |
nu | ca | purā | ca | sadanam | rayīṇām | jātasya | ca | jāyamānasya | ca | kṣām |
sataḥ | ca | gopām | bhavataḥ | ca | bhūreḥ | devāḥ | agnim | dhārayan | draviṇaḥ-dām |
draviṇaḥ-dāḥ | draviṇasaḥ | turasya | draviṇaḥ-dāḥ | sanarasya | pra | yaṁsat |
draviṇaḥ-dāḥ | vīra-vatīm | iṣam | naḥ | draviṇaḥ-dāḥ | rāsate | dīrgham | āyuḥ |
eva | naḥ | agne | sam-idhā | vṛdhānaḥ | revat | pāvaka | śravase | vi | bhāhi |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
apa | naḥ | śośucat | agham | agne | śuśugdhi | ā | rayim |
apa | naḥ | śośucat | agham |
su-kṣetriyā | sugātu-yā | vasu-yā | ca | yajāmahe |
apa | naḥ | śośucat | agham |
pra | yat | bhandiṣṭhaḥ | eṣām | pra | asmākāsaḥ | ca | sūrayaḥ |
apa | naḥ | śośucat | agham |
pra | yat | te | agne | sūrayaḥ | jāyemahi | pra | te | vayam |
apa | naḥ | śośucat | agham |
pra | yat | agneḥ | sahasvataḥ | viśvataḥ | yanti | bhānavaḥ |
apa | naḥ | śośucat | agham |
tvam | hi | viśvataḥ-mukha | viśvataḥ | pari-bhūḥ | asi |
apa | naḥ | śośucat | agham |
dviṣaḥ | naḥ | viśvataḥ-mukha | ati | nāvā-iva | pāraya |
apa | naḥ | śośucat | agham |
saḥ | naḥ | sindhum-iva | nāvayā | ati | parṣa | svastaye |
apa | naḥ | śośucat | agham |
vaiśvānarasya | su-matau | syāma | rājā | hi | kam | bhuvanānām | abhi-śrīḥ |
itaḥ | jātaḥ | viśvam | idam | vi | caṣṭe | vaiśvānaraḥ | yatate | sūryeṇa |
pṛṣṭaḥ | divi | pṛṣṭaḥ | agniḥ | pṛthivyām | pṛṣṭaḥ | viśvāḥ | oṣadhīḥ | ā | viveśa |
vaiśvānaraḥ | sahasā | pṛṣṭaḥ | agniḥ | saḥ | naḥ | divā | saḥ | riṣaḥ | pātu | naktam |
vaiśvānara | tava | tat | satyam | astu | asmān | rāyaḥ | magha-vānaḥ | sacantām |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
jāta-vedase | sunavāma | somam | arāti-yataḥ | ni | dahāti | vedaḥ |
saḥ | naḥ | parṣat | ati | duḥ-gāni | viśvā | nāvā-iva | sindhum | duḥ-itā | ati | agniḥ |
saḥ | yaḥ | vṛṣā | vṛṣṇyebhiḥ | sam-okāḥ | mahaḥ | divaḥ | pṛthivyāḥ | ca | sam-rāṭ |
satīna-satvā | havyaḥ | bhareṣu | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
yasya | anāptaḥ | sūryasya-iva | yāmaḥ | bhare-bhare | vṛtra-hā | śuṣmaḥ | asti |
vṛṣan-tamaḥ | sakhi-bhiḥ | svebhiḥ | evaiḥ | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
divaḥ | na | yasya | retasaḥ | dughānāḥ | panthāsaḥ | yanti | śavasā | apari-itāḥ |
tarat-dveṣāḥ | sasahiḥ | pauṁsyebhiḥ | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
saḥ | aṅgiraḥ-bhiḥ | aṅgiraḥ-tamaḥ | bhūt | vṛṣā | vṛṣa-bhiḥ | sakhi-bhiḥ | sakhā | san |
ṛgmi-bhiḥ | ṛgmī | gātu-bhiḥ | jyeṣṭhaḥ | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
saḥ | sūnu-bhiḥ | na | rudrebhiḥ | ṛbhvā | nṛ-sahye | sasahvān | amitrān |
sa-nīḻebhiḥ | śravasyāni | tūrvan | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
saḥ | manyu-mīḥ | sa-madanasya | kartā | asmākebhiḥ | nṛ-bhiḥ | sūryam | sanat |
asmin | ahan | sat-patiḥ | puru-hūtaḥ | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
tam | ūtayaḥ | raṇayan | śūra-sātau | tam | kṣemasya | kṣitayaḥ | kṛṇvata | trām |
saḥ | viśvasya | karuṇasya | īśe | ekaḥ | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
tam | apsanta | śavasaḥ | ut-saveṣu | naraḥ | naram | avase | tam | dhanāya |
saḥ | andhe | cit | tamasi | jyotiḥ | vidat | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
saḥ | savyena | yamati | vrādhataḥ | cit | saḥ | dakṣiṇe | sam-gṛbhītā | kṛtāni |
saḥ | kīriṇā | cit | sanitā | dhanāni | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
saḥ | grāmebhiḥ | sanitā | saḥ | rathebhiḥ | vide | viśvābhiḥ | kṛṣṭi-bhiḥ | nu | adya |
saḥ | pauṁsyebhiḥ | abhi-bhūḥ | aśastīḥ | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
saḥ | jāmi-bhiḥ | yat | sam-ajāti | mīḻhe | ajāmi-bhiḥ | vā | puru-hūtaḥ | evaiḥ |
apām | tokasya | tanayasya | jeṣe | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
saḥ | vajra-bhṛt | dasyu-hā | bhīmaḥ | ugraḥ | sahasra-cetāḥ | śata-nīthaḥ | ṛbhvā |
camrīṣaḥ | na | śavasā | pāñca-janyaḥ | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
tasya | vajraḥ | krandati | smat | svaḥ-sāḥ | divaḥ | na | tveṣaḥ | ravathaḥ | śimī-vān |
tam | sacante | sanayaḥ | tam | dhanāni | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
yasya | ajasram | śavasā | mānam | uktham | pari-bhujat | rodasī iti | viśvataḥ | sīm |
saḥ | pāriṣat | kratu-bhiḥ | mandasānaḥ | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
na | yasya | devāḥ | devatā | na | martāḥ | āpaḥ | cana | śavasaḥ | antam | āpuḥ |
saḥ | pra-rikvā | tvakṣasā | kṣmaḥ | divaḥ | ca | marutvān | naḥ | bhavatu | indraḥ | ūtī |
rohit | śyāvā | sumat-aṁśuḥ | lalāmīḥ | dyukṣā | rāye | ṛjra-aśvasya |
vṛṣaṇ-vantam | bibhratī | dhūḥ-su | ratham | mandrā | ciketa | nāhuṣīṣu | vikṣu |
etat | tyat | te | indra | vṛṣṇe | uktham | vārṣāgirāḥ | abhi | gṛṇanti | rādhaḥ |
ṛjra-aśvaḥ | praṣṭi-bhiḥ | ambarīṣaḥ | saha-devaḥ | bhayamānaḥ | su-rādhāḥ |
dasyūn | śimyūn | ca | puru-hūtaḥ | evaiḥ | hatvā | pṛthivyām | śarvā | ni | barhīt |
sanat | kṣetram | sakhi-bhiḥ | śvitnyebhiḥ | sanat | sūryam | sanat | apaḥ | su-vajraḥ |
viśvāhā | indraḥ | adhi-vaktā | naḥ | astu | apari-hvṛtāḥ | sanuyāma | vājam |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
pra | mandine | pitu-mat | arcata | vacaḥ | yaḥ | kṛṣṇa-garbhāḥ | niḥ-ahan | ṛjiśvanā |
avasyavaḥ | vṛṣaṇam | vajra-dakṣiṇam | marutvantam | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yaḥ | vi-aṁsam | jahṛṣāṇena | manyunā | yaḥ | śambaram | yaḥ | ahan | piprum | avratam |
indraḥ | yaḥ | śuṣṇam | aśuṣam | ni | avṛṇak | marutvantam | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yasya | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | pauṁsyam | mahat | yasya | vrate | varuṇaḥ | yasya | sūryaḥ |
yasya | indrasya | sindhavaḥ | saścati | vratam | marutvantam | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yaḥ | aśvānām | yaḥ | gavām | go-patiḥ | vaśī | yaḥ | āritaḥ | karmaṇi-karmaṇi | sthiraḥ |
vīḻoḥ | cit | indraḥ | yaḥ | asunvataḥ | vadhaḥ | marutvantam | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yaḥ | viśvasya | jagataḥ | prāṇataḥ | patiḥ | yaḥ | brahmaṇe | prathamaḥ | gāḥ | avindat |
indraḥ | yaḥ | dasyūn | adharān | ava-atirat | marutvantam | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yaḥ | śūrebhiḥ | havyaḥ | yaḥ | ca | bhīru-bhiḥ | yaḥ | dhāvat-bhiḥ | hūyate | yaḥ | ca | jigyubhiḥ |
indram | yam | viśvā | bhuvanā | abhi | sam-dadhuḥ | marutvantam | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
rudrāṇām | eti | pra-diśā | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | rudrebhiḥ | yoṣā | tanute | pṛthu | jrayaḥ |
indram | manīṣā | abhi | arcati | śrutam | marutvantam | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yat | vā | marutvaḥ | parame | sadha-sthe | yat | vā | avame | vṛjane | mādayāse |
ataḥ | ā | yāhi | adhvaram | naḥ | accha | tvā-yā | haviḥ | cakṛma | satya-rādhaḥ |
tvā-yā | indra | somam | susuma | su-dakṣa | tvā-yā | haviḥ | cakṛma | brahma-vāhaḥ |
adha | ni-yutvaḥ | sa-gaṇaḥ | marut-bhiḥ | asmin | yajñe | barhiṣi | mādayasva |
mādayasva | hari-bhiḥ | ye | te | indra | vi | syasva | śipre iti | vi | sṛjasva | dhene iti |
ā | tvā | su-śipra | harayaḥ | vahantu | uśan | havyāni | prati | naḥ | juṣasva |
marut-stotrasya | vṛjanasya | gopāḥ | vayam | indreṇa | sanuyāma | vājam |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
imām | te | dhiyam | pra | bhare | mahaḥ | mahīm | asya | stotre | dhiṣaṇā | yat | te | ānaje |
tam | ut-save | ca | pra-save | ca | sasahim | indram | devāsaḥ | śavasā | amadan | anu |
asya | śravaḥ | nadyaḥ | sapta | bibhrati | dyāvākṣāmā | pṛthivī | darśatam | vapuḥ |
asme iti | sūryācandramasā | abhi-cakṣe | śraddhe | kam | indra | carataḥ | vi-tarturam |
tam | sma | ratham | magha-van | pra | ava | sātaye | jaitram | yam | te | anu-madāma | sam-game |
ājā | naḥ | indra | manasā | puru-stuta | tvāyat-bhyaḥ | magha-van | śarma | yaccha | naḥ |
vayam | jayema | tvayā | yujā | vṛtam | asmākam | aṁśam | ut | ava | bhare-bhare |
asmabhyam | indra | varivaḥ | su-gam | kṛdhi | pra | śatrūṇām | magha-van | vṛṣṇyā | ruja |
nānā | hi | tvā | havamānāḥ | janāḥ | ime | dhanānām | dhartaḥ | avasā | vipanyavaḥ |
asmākam | sma | ratham | ā | tiṣṭha | sātaye | jaitram | hi | indra | ni-bhṛtam | manaḥ | tava |
go-jitā | bāhū iti | amita-kratuḥ | simaḥ | karman-karman | śatam-ūtiḥ | khajam-karaḥ |
akalpaḥ | indraḥ | prati-mānam | ojasā | atha | janāḥ | vi | hvayante | sisāsavaḥ |
ut | te | śatāt | magha-van | ut | ca | bhūyasaḥ | ut | sahasrāt | ririce | kṛṣṭiṣu | śravaḥ |
amātram | tvā | dhiṣaṇā | titviṣe | mahī | adha | vṛtrāṇi | jighnase | puram-dara |
triviṣṭi-dhātu | prati-mānam | ojasaḥ | tisraḥ | bhūmīḥ | nṛ-pate | trīṇi | rocanā |
ati | idam | viśvam | bhuvanam | vavakṣitha | aśatruḥ | indra | januṣā | sanāt | asi |
tvām | deveṣu | prathamam | havāmahe | tvam | babhūtha | pṛtanāsu | sasahiḥ |
saḥ | imam | naḥ | kārum | upa-manyum | ut-bhidam | indraḥ | kṛṇotu | pra-save | ratham | puraḥ |
tvam | jigetha | na | dhanā | rurodhitha | arbheṣu | ājā | magha-van | mahat-su | ca |
tvām | ugram | avase | sam | śiśīmasi | atha | naḥ | indra | havaneṣu | codaya |
viśvāhā | indraḥ | adhi-vaktā | naḥ | astu | apari-hvṛtāḥ | sanuyāma | vājam |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
tat | te | indriyam | paramam | parācaiḥ | adhārayanta | kavayaḥ | purā | idam |
kṣamā | idam | anyat | divi | anyat | asya | sam | īmiti | pṛcyate | samanā-iva | ketuḥ |
saḥ | dhārayat | pṛthivīm | paprathat | ca | vajreṇa | hatvā | niḥ | apaḥ | sasarja |
ahan | ahim | abhinat | rauhiṇam | vi | ahan | vi-aṁsam | magha-vā | śacībhiḥ |
saḥ | jātū-bharmā | śrat-dadhānaḥ | ojaḥ | puraḥ | vi-bhindan | acarat | vi | dāsīḥ |
vidvān | vajrin | dasyave | hetim | asya | āryam | sahaḥ | vardhaya | dyumnam | indra |
tat | ūcuṣe | mānuṣā | imā | yugāni | kīrtenyam | magha-vā | nāma | bibhrat |
upa-prayan | dasyu-hatyāya | vajrī | yat | ha | sūnuḥ | śravase | nāma | dadhe |
tat | asya | idam | paśyata | bhūri | puṣṭam | śrat | indrasya | dhattana | vīryāya |
saḥ | gāḥ | avindat | saḥ | avindat | aśvān | saḥ | oṣadhīḥ | saḥ | apaḥ | saḥ | vanāni |
bhūri-karmaṇe | vṛṣabhāya | vṛśṇe | satya-śuṣmāya | sunavāma | somam |
yaḥ | ā-dṛtya | paripanthī-iva | śūraḥ | ayajvanaḥ | vi-bhajan | eti | vedaḥ |
tat | indra | pra-iva | vīryam | cakartha | yat | sasantam | vajreṇa | abodhayaḥ | ahim |
anu | tvā | patnīḥ | hṛṣitam | vayaḥ | ca | viśve | devāsaḥ | amadan | anu | tvā |
śuṣṇam | piprum | kuyavam | vṛtram | indra | yadā | avadhīḥ | vi | puraḥ | śambarasya |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
yoniḥ | te | indra | ni-sade | akāri | tam | ā | ni | sīda | svānaḥ | na | arvā |
vi-mucya | vayaḥ | ava-sāya | aśvān | doṣā | vastoḥ | vahīyasaḥ | pra-pitve |
o iti | tye | naraḥ | indram | ūtaye | guḥ | nu | cit | tān | sadyaḥ | adhvanaḥ | jagamyāt |
devāsaḥ | manyum | dāsasya | ścamnan | te | naḥ | ā | vakṣan | suvitāya | varṇam |
ava | tmanā | bharate | keta-vedāḥ | ava | tmanā | bharate | phenam | udan |
kṣīreṇa | snātaḥ | kuyavasya | yoṣe iti | hate iti | te iti | syātām | pravaṇe | śiphāyāḥ |
yuyopa | nābhiḥ | uparasya | āyoḥ | pra | pūrvābhiḥ | tirate | rāṣṭi | śūraḥ |
añjasī | kuliśī | vīra-patnī | payaḥ | hinvānāḥ | uda-bhiḥ | bharante |
prati | yat | syā | nīthā | adarśi | dasyoḥ | okaḥ | na | accha | sadanam | jānatī | gāt |
adha | sma | naḥ | magha-van | carkṛtāt | it | mā | naḥ | maghā-iva | niṣṣapī | parā | dāḥ |
saḥ | tvam | naḥ | indra | sūrye | saḥ | ap-su | anāgāḥ-tve | ā | bhaja | jīva-śaṁse |
mā | antarām | bhujam | ā | ririṣaḥ | naḥ | śraddhitam | te | mahate | indriyāya |
adha | manye | śrat | te | asmai | adhāyi | vṛṣā | codasva | mahate | dhanāya |
mā | naḥ | akṛte | puru-hūta | yonau | indra | kṣudhyat-bhyaḥ | vayaḥ | ā-sutim | dāḥ |
mā | naḥ | vadhīḥ | indra | mā | parā | dāḥ | mā | naḥ | priyā | bhojanāni | pra | moṣīḥ |
āṇḍā | mā | naḥ | magha-van | śakra | niḥ | bhet | mā | naḥ | pātrā | bhet | saha-jānuṣāṇi |
arvāṅ | ā | ihi | soma-kāmam | tvā | āhuḥ | ayam | sutaḥ | tasya | piba | madāya |
uru-vyacāḥ | jaṭhare | ā | vṛṣasva | pitā-iva | naḥ | śṛṇuhi | hūyamānaḥ |
candramāḥ | ap-su | antaḥ | ā | su-parṇaḥ | dhāvate | divi |
na | vaḥ | hiraṇya-nemayaḥ | padam | vindanti | vi-dyutaḥ | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
artham | it | vai | ūm̐ iti | arthinaḥ | ā | jāyā | yuvate | patim |
tuñjāte iti | vṛṣṇyam | payaḥ | pari-dāya | rasam | duhe | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
mo iti | su | devāḥ | adaḥ | svaḥ | ava | pādi | divaḥ | pari |
mā | somyasya | śam-bhuvaḥ | śūne | bhūma | kadā | cana | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
yajñam | pṛcchāmi | avamam | saḥ | tat | dūtaḥ | vi | vocati |
kva | ṛtam | pūrvyam | gatam | kaḥ | tat | bibharti | nūtanaḥ | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
amī iti | ye | devāḥ | sthana | triṣu | ā | rocane | divaḥ |
kat | vaḥ | ṛtam | kat | anṛtam | kva | pratnā | vaḥ | ā-hutiḥ | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
kat | vaḥ | ṛtasya | dharṇasi | kat | varuṇasya | cakṣaṇam |
kat | aryamṇaḥ | mahaḥ | pathā | ati | krāmema | duḥ-dhyaḥ | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
aham | saḥ | asmi | yaḥ | purā | sute | vadāmi | kāni | cit |
tam | mā | vyanti | ā-dhyaḥ | vṛkaḥ | na | tṛṣṇa-jam | mṛgam | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
sam | mā | tapanti | abhitaḥ | sapatnīḥ-iva | parśavaḥ |
mūṣaḥ | na | śiśnā | vi | adanti | mā | ā-dhyaḥ | stotāram | te | śatakrato iti śata-krato | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
amī iti | ye | sapta | raśmayaḥ | tatra | me | nābhiḥ | ā-tatā |
tritaḥ | tat | veda | āptyaḥ | saḥ | jāmi-tvāya | rebhati | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
amī iti | ye | pañca | ukṣaṇaḥ | madhye | tasthuḥ | mahaḥ | divaḥ |
deva-trā | nu | pra-vācyam | sadhrīcīnāḥ | ni | vavṛtuḥ | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
su-parṇāḥ | ete | āsate | madhye | ā-rodhane | divaḥ |
te | sedhanti | pathaḥ | vṛkam | tarantam | yahvatīḥ | apaḥ | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
navyam | tat | ukthyam | hitam | devāsaḥ | su-pravācanam |
ṛtam | arṣanti | sindhavaḥ | satyam | tatāna | sūryaḥ | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
agne | tava | tyat | ukthyam | deveṣu | asti | āpyam |
saḥ | naḥ | sattaḥ | manuṣvat | ā | devān | yakṣi | viduḥ-taraḥ | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
sattaḥ | hotā | manuṣvat | ā | devān | accha | viduḥ-taraḥ |
agniḥ | havyā | susūdati | devaḥ | deveṣu | medhiraḥ | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
brahma | kṛṇoti | varuṇaḥ | gātu-vidam | tam | īmahe |
vi | ūrṇoti | hṛdā | matim | navyaḥ | jāyatām | ṛtam | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
asau | yaḥ | panthāḥ | ādityaḥ | divi | pra-vācyam | kṛtaḥ |
na | saḥ | devāḥ | ati-krame | tam | martāsaḥ | na | paśyatha | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
tritaḥ | kūpe | ava-hitaḥ | devān | havate | ūtaye |
tat | śuśrāva | bṛhaspatiḥ | kṛṇvan | aṁhūraṇāt | uru | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
aruṇaḥ | mā | sakṛt | vṛkaḥ | pathā | yantam | dadarśa | hi |
ut | jihīte | ni-cāyya | taṣṭā-iva | pṛṣṭi-āmayī | vittam | me | asya | rodasī iti |
enā | āṅgūṣeṇa | vayam | indra-vantaḥ | abhi | syāma | vṛjane | sarva-vīrāḥ |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
indram | mitram | varuṇam | agnim | ūtaye | mārutam | śardhaḥ | aditim | havāmahe |
ratham | na | duḥ-gāt | vasavaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | viśvasmāt | naḥ | aṁhasaḥ | niḥ | pipartana |
te | ādityāḥ | ā | gata | sarva-tātaye | bhūta | devāḥ | vṛtra-tūryeṣu | śam-bhuvaḥ |
ratham | na | duḥ-gāt | vasavaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | viśvasmāt | naḥ | aṁhasaḥ | niḥ | pipartana |
avantu | naḥ | pitaraḥ | su-pravācanāḥ | uta | devī iti | devaputre iti deva-putre | ṛta-vṛdhā |
ratham | na | duḥ-gāt | vasavaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | viśvasmāt | naḥ | aṁhasaḥ | niḥ | pipartana |
narāśaṁsam | vājinam | vājayan | iha | kṣayat-vīram | pūṣaṇam | sumnaiḥ | īmahe |
ratham | na | duḥ-gāt | vasavaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | viśvasmāt | naḥ | aṁhasaḥ | niḥ | pipartana |
bṛhaspate | sadam | it | naḥ | su-gam | kṛdhi | śam | yoḥ | yat | te | manuḥ-hitam | tat | īmahe |
ratham | na | duḥ-gāt | vasavaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | viśvasmāt | naḥ | aṁhasaḥ | niḥ | pipartana |
indram | kutsaḥ | vṛtra-hanam | śacī-patim | kāṭe | ni-bāḻhaḥ | ṛṣiḥ | ahvat | ūtaye |
ratham | na | duḥ-gāt | vasavaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | viśvasmāt | naḥ | aṁhasaḥ | niḥ | pipartana |
devaiḥ | naḥ | devī | aditiḥ | ni | pātu | devaḥ | trātā | trāyatām | apra-yucchan |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
yajñaḥ | devānām | prati | eti | sumnam | ādityāsaḥ | bhavata | mṛḻayantaḥ |
ā | vaḥ | arvācī | su-matiḥ | vavṛtyāt | aṁhoḥ | cit | yā | varivovit-tarā | asat |
upa | naḥ | devāḥ | avasā | ā | gamantu | aṅgirasām | sāma-bhiḥ | stūyamānāḥ |
indraḥ | indriyaiḥ | marutaḥ | marut-bhiḥ | ādityaiḥ | naḥ | aditiḥ | śarma | yaṁsat |
tat | naḥ | indraḥ | tat | varuṇaḥ | tat | agniḥ | tat | aryamā | tat | savitā | canaḥ | dhāt |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
yaḥ | indrāgnī iti | citra-tamaḥ | rathaḥ | vām | abhi | viśvāni | bhuvanāni | caṣṭe |
tena | ā | yātam | sa-ratham | tasthi-vāṁsā | atha | somasya | pibatam | sutasya |
yāvat | idam | bhuvanam | viśvam | asti | uru-vyacā | varimatā | gabhīram |
tāvān | ayam | pātave | somaḥ | astu | aram | indrāgnī iti | manase | yuva-bhyām |
cakrāthe iti | hi | sadhryak | nāma | bhadram | sadhrīcīnā | vṛtra-hanau | uta | sthaḥ |
tau | indrāgnī iti | sadhryañcā | ni-sadya | vṛṣṇaḥ | somasya | vṛṣaṇā | ā | vṛṣethām |
sam-iddheṣu | agniṣu | ānajānā | yata-srucā | barhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | tistirāṇā |
tīvraiḥ | somaiḥ | pari-siktebhiḥ | arvāk | ā | indrāgnī iti | saumanasāya | yātam |
yāni | indrāgnī iti | cakrathuḥ | vīryāṇi | yāni | rūpāṇi | uta | vṛṣṇyāni |
yā | vām | pratnāni | sakhyā | śivāni | tebhiḥ | somasya | pibatam | sutasya |
yat | abravam | prathamam | vām | vṛṇānaḥ | ayam | somaḥ | asuraiḥ | naḥ | vi-havyaḥ |
tām | satyām | śraddhām | abhi | ā | hi | yātam | atha | somasya | pibatam | sutasya |
yat | indrāgnī iti | madathaḥ | sve | duroṇe | yat | brahmaṇi | rājani | vā | yajatrā |
ataḥ | pari | vṛṣaṇau | ā | hi | yātam | atha | somasya | pibatam | sutasya |
yat | indrāgnī iti | yaduṣu | turvaśeṣu | yat | druhyuṣu | anuṣu | pūruṣu | sthaḥ |
ataḥ | pari | vṛṣaṇau | ā | hi | yātam | atha | somasya | pibatam | sutasya |
yat | indrāgnī iti | avamasyām | pṛthivyām | madhyamasyām | paramasyām | uta | sthaḥ |
ataḥ | pari | vṛṣaṇau | ā | hi | yātam | atha | somasya | pibatam | sutasya |
yat | indrāgnī iti | paramasyām | pṛthivyām | madhyamasyām | avamasyām | uta | sthaḥ |
ataḥ | pari | vṛṣaṇau | ā | hi | yātam | atha | somasya | pibatam | sutasya |
yat | indrāgnī iti | divi | sthaḥ | yat | pṛthivyām | yat | parvateṣu | oṣadhīṣu | ap-su |
ataḥ | pari | vṛṣaṇau | ā | hi | yātam | atha | somasya | pibatam | sutasya |
yat | indrāgnī iti | ut-itā | sūryasya | madhye | divaḥ | svadhayā | mādayethe iti |
ataḥ | pari | vṛṣaṇau | ā | hi | yātam | atha | somasya | pibatam | sutasya |
eva | indrāgnī iti | papi-vāṁsā | sutasya | viśvā | asmabhyam | sam | jayatam | dhanāni |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
vi | hi | akhyam | manasā | vasyaḥ | icchan | indrāgnī iti | jñāsaḥ | uta | vā | sa-jātān |
na | anyā | yuvat | pra-matiḥ | asti | mahyam | saḥ | vām | dhiyam | vāja-yantīm | atakṣam |
aśravam | hi | bhūridāvat-tarā | vām | vi-jāmātuḥ | uta | vā | gha | syālāt |
atha | somasya | pra-yatī | yuva-bhyām | indrāgnī iti | stomam | janayāmi | navyam |
mā | chedma | raśmīn | iti | nādhamānāḥ | pitṝṇām | śaktīḥ | anu-yacchamānāḥ |
indrāgni-bhyām | kam | vṛṣaṇaḥ | madanti | tā | hi | adrī iti | dhiṣaṇāyāḥ | upa-sthe |
yuvābhyām | devī | dhiṣaṇā | madāya | indrāgnī iti | somam | uśatī | sunoti |
tau | aśvinā | bhadra-hastā | supāṇī iti su-pāṇī | ā | dhāvatam | madhunā | pṛṅktam | ap-su |
yuvām | indrāgnī iti | vasunaḥ | vi-bhāge | tavaḥ-tamā | śuśrava | vṛtra-hatye |
tau | ā-sadya | barhiṣi | yajñe | asmin | pra | carṣaṇī iti | mādayethām | sutasya |
pra | carṣaṇi-bhyaḥ | pṛtanā-haveṣu | pra | pṛthivyāḥ | riricāthe iti | divaḥ | ca |
pra | sindhu-bhyaḥ | pra | giri-bhyaḥ | mahi-tvā | pra | indrāgnī iti | viśvā | bhuvanā | ati | anyā |
ā | bharatam | śikṣatam | vajrabāhū iti vajra-bāhū | asmān | indrāgnī iti | avatam | śacībhiḥ |
ime | nu | te | raśmayaḥ | sūryasya | yebhiḥ | sa-pitvam | pitaraḥ | naḥ | āsan |
puram-darā | śikṣatam | vajra-hastā | asmān | indrāgnī iti | avatam | bhareṣu |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
tatam | me | apaḥ | tat | ūm̐ iti | tāyate | punariti | svādiṣṭhā | dhītiḥ | ucathāya | śasyate |
ayam | samudraḥ | iha | viśva-devyaḥ | svāhā-kṛtasya | sam | ūm̐ iti | tṛpṇuta | ṛbhavaḥ |
ā-bhogayam | pra | yat | icchantaḥ | aitana | apākāḥ | prāñcaḥ | mama | ke | cit | āpayaḥ |
saudhanvanāsaḥ | caritasya | bhūmanā | agacchata | savituḥ | dāśuṣaḥ | gṛham |
tat | savitā | vaḥ | amṛta-tvam | ā | asuvat | agohyam | yat | śravayantaḥ | aitana |
tyam | cit | camasam | asurasya | bhakṣaṇam | ekam | santam | akṛṇuta | catuḥ-vayam |
viṣṭvī | śamī | taraṇi-tvena | vāghataḥ | martāsaḥ | santaḥ | amṛta-tvam | ānaśuḥ |
saudhanvanāḥ | ṛbhavaḥ | sūra-cakṣasaḥ | saṁvatsare | sam | apṛcyanta | dhīti-bhiḥ |
kṣetram-iva | vi | mamuḥ | tejanena | ekam | pātram | ṛbhavaḥ | jehamānam |
upa-stutāḥ | upa-mam | nādhamānāḥ | amartyeṣu | śravaḥ | icchamānāḥ |
ā | mānīṣām | antarikṣasya | nṛ-bhyaḥ | srucā-iva | ghṛtam | juhavāma | vidmanā |
taraṇi-tvā | ye | pituḥ | asya | saścire | ṛbhavaḥ | vājam | aruhan | divaḥ | rajaḥ |
ṛbhuḥ | naḥ | indraḥ | śavasā | navīyān | ṛbhuḥ | vājebhiḥ | vasu-bhiḥ | vasuḥ | dadiḥ |
yuṣmākam | devāḥ | avasā | ahani | priye | abhi | tiṣṭhema | pṛtsutīḥ | asunvatām |
niḥ | carmaṇaḥ | ṛbhavaḥ | gām | apiṁśata | sam | vatsena | asṛjata | mātaram | punariti |
saudhanvanāsaḥ | su-apasyayā | naraḥ | jivrī iti | yuvānā | pitarā | akṛṇotana |
vājebhiḥ | naḥ | vāja-sātau | aviḍḍhi | ṛbhu-mān | indra | citram | ā | darṣi | rādhaḥ |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
takṣan | ratham | su-vṛtam | vidmanā-apasaḥ | takṣan | harī iti | indra-vāhā | vṛṣaṇvasū iti vṛṣaṇ-vasū |
takṣan | pitṛ-bhyām | ṛbhavaḥ | yuvat | vayaḥ | takṣan | vatsāya | mātaram | sacā-bhuvam |
ā | naḥ | yajñāya | takṣata | ṛbhu-mat | vayaḥ | kratve | dakṣāya | su-prajāvatīm | iṣam |
yathā | kṣayāma | sarva-vīrayā | viśā | tat | naḥ | śardhāya | dhāsatha | su | indriyam |
ā | takṣata | sātim | asmabhyam | ṛbhavaḥ | sātim | rathāya | sātim | arvate | naraḥ |
sātim | naḥ | jaitrīm | sam | maheta | viśva-hā | jāmim | ajāmim | pṛtanāsu | sakṣaṇim |
ṛbhukṣaṇam | indram | ā | huve | ūtaye | ṛbhūn | vājān | marutaḥ | soma-pītaye |
ubhā | mitrāvaruṇā | nūnam | aśvinā | te | naḥ | hinvantu | sātaye | dhiye | jiṣe |
ṛbhuḥ | bharāya | sam | śiśātu | sātim | samarya-jit | vājaḥ | asmān | aviṣṭu |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
īḻe | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | pūrva-cittaye | agnim | gharmam | su-rucam | yāman | iṣṭaye |
yābhiḥ | bhare | kāram | aṁśāya | jinvathaḥ | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yuvoḥ | dānāya | su-bharāḥ | asaścataḥ | ratham | ā | tasthuḥ | vacasam | na | mantave |
yābhiḥ | dhiyaḥ | avathaḥ | karman | iṣṭaye | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yuvam | tāsām | divyasya | pra-śāsane | viśām | kṣayathaḥ | amṛtasya | majmanā |
yābhiḥ | dhenum | asvam | pinvathaḥ | narā | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | pari-jmā | tanayasya | majmanā | dvi-mātā | tūrṣu | taraṇiḥ | vi-bhūṣati |
yābhiḥ | tri-mantuḥ | abhavat | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | rebham | ni-vṛtam | sitam | at-bhyaḥ | ut | vandanam | airayatam | svaḥ | dṛśe |
yābhiḥ | kaṇvam | pra | sisāsantam | āvatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | antakam | jasamānam | ā-araṇe | bhujyum | yābhiḥ | avyathi-bhiḥ | jijinvathuḥ |
yābhiḥ | karkandhum | vayyam | ca | jinvathaḥ | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | śucantim | dhana-sām | su-saṁsadam | taptam | gharmam | omyā-vantam | atraye |
yābhiḥ | pṛṣni-gum | puru-kutsam | āvatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | śacībhiḥ | vṛṣaṇā | parā-vṛjam | pra | andham | śroṇam | cakṣase | etave | kṛthaḥ |
yābhiḥ | vartikām | grasitām | amuñcatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | sindhum | madhu-mantam | asaścatam | vasiṣṭham | yābhiḥ | ajarau | ajinvatam |
yābhiḥ | kutsam | śrutaryam | naryam | āvatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | viśpalām | dhana-sām | atharvyam | sahasra-mīḻhe | ājau | ajinvatam |
yābhiḥ | vaśam | aśvyam | preṇim | āvatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | sudānū iti su-dānū | auśijāya | vaṇije | dīrgha-śravase | madhu | kośaḥ | akṣarat |
kakṣīvantam | stotāram | yābhiḥ | āvatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | rasām | kṣodasā | udnaḥ | pipinvathuḥ | anaśvam | yābhiḥ | ratham | āvatam | jiṣe |
yābhiḥ | tri-śokaḥ | usriyāḥ | ut-ājata | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | sūryam | pari-yāthaḥ | parā-vati | mandhātāram | kṣaitra-patyeṣu | āvatam |
yābhiḥ | vipram | pra | bharat-vājam | āvatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | mahām | atithi-gvam | kaśaḥ-juvam | divaḥ-dāsam | śambara-hatye | āvatam |
yābhiḥ | pūḥ-bhidye | trasadasyum | āvatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | vamram | vi-pipānam | upa-stutam | kalim | yābhiḥ | vitta-jānim | duvasyathaḥ |
yābhiḥ | vi-aśvam | uta | pṛthim | āvatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | narā | śayave | yābhiḥ | atraye | yābhiḥ | purā | manave | gātum | īṣathuḥ |
yābhiḥ | śārīḥ | ājatam | syūma-raśmaye | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | paṭharvā | jaṭharasya | majmanā | agniḥ | na | adīdet | citaḥ | iddhaḥ | ajman | ā |
yābhiḥ | śaryātam | avathaḥ | mahā-dhane | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | aṅgiraḥ | manasā | ni-raṇyathaḥ | agram | gacchathaḥ | vi-vare | go-arṇasaḥ |
yābhiḥ | manum | śūram | iṣā | sam-āvatam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | patnīḥ | vi-madāya | ni-ūhathuḥ | ā | gha | vā | yābhiḥ | aruṇīḥ | aśikṣatam |
yābhiḥ | su-dāse | ūhathuḥ | su-devyam | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | śaṁtātī iti śam-tātī | bhavathaḥ | dadāśuṣe | bhujyum | yābhiḥ | avathaḥ | yābhiḥ | adhri-gum |
omyā-vatīm | su-bharām | ṛta-stubham | tābhiḥ | ūm̐ iti | su | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam |
yābhiḥ | kṛśānum | asane | duvasyathaḥ | jave | yābhiḥ | yūnaḥ | arvantam | āvatam |
