tejiṣṭhāḥ | apaḥ | maṁhanā | pari | vyata | yadi | devasya | śravasā | sadaḥ | viduḥ |
te | asya | santu | ketavaḥ | amṛtyavaḥ | adābhyāsaḥ | januṣī iti | ubhe iti | anu |
yebhiḥ | nṛmṇā | ca | devyā | ca | punate | āt | it | rājānam | mananāḥ | agṛbhṇata |
saḥ | mṛjyamānaḥ | daśa-bhiḥ | sukarma-bhiḥ | pra | madhyamāsu | mātṛṣu | pra-me | sacā |
vratāni | pānaḥ | amṛtasya | cāruṇaḥ | ubhe iti | nṛ-cakṣāḥ | anu | paśyate | viśau |
saḥ | marmṛjānaḥ | indriyāya | dhāyase | ā | ubhe iti | antariti | rodasī iti | harṣate | hitaḥ |
vṛṣā | śuṣmeṇa | bādhate | vi | duḥ-matīḥ | ādediśānaḥ | śaryahā-iva | śurudhaḥ |
saḥ | mātarā | na | dadṛśānaḥ | usriyaḥ | nānadat | eti | marutām-iva | svanaḥ |
jānan | ṛtam | prathamam | yat | svaḥ-naram | pra-śastaye | kam | avṛṇīta | su-kratuḥ |
ruvati | bhīmaḥ | vṛṣabhaḥ | taviṣyayā | śṛṅge iti | śiśānaḥ | hariṇī iti | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ |
ā | yonim | somaḥ | su-kṛtam | ni | sīdati | gavyayī | tvak | bhavati | niḥ-nik | avyayī |
śuciḥ | punānaḥ | tanvam | arepasam | avye | hariḥ | ni | adhāviṣṭa | sānavi |
juṣṭaḥ | mitrāya | varuṇāya | vāyave | tri-dhātu | madhu | kriyate | sukarma-bhiḥ |
pavasva | soma | deva-vītaye | vṛṣā | indrasya | hārdi | soma-dhānam | ā | viśa |
purā | naḥ | bādhāt | duḥ-itā | ati | pāraya | kṣetra-vit | hi | diśaḥ | āha | vi-pṛcchate |
hitaḥ | na | saptiḥ | abhi | vājam | arṣa | indrasya | indo iti | jaṭharam | ā | pavasva |
nāvā | na | sindhum | ati | parṣi | vidvān | śūraḥ | na | yudhyan | ava | naḥ | nidaḥ | spariti spaḥ |
ā | dakṣiṇā | sṛjyate | śuṣmī | ā-sadam | veti | druhaḥ | rakṣasaḥ | pāti | jāgṛviḥ |
hariḥ | opaśam | kṛṇute | nabhaḥ | payaḥ | upa-stire | camvoḥ | brahma | niḥ-nije |
pra | kṛṣṭihā-iva | śūṣaḥ | eti | roruvat | asuryam | varṇam | ni | riṇīte | asya | tam |
jahāti | vavrim | pituḥ | eti | niḥ-kṛtam | upa-prutam | kṛṇute | niḥ-nijam | tanā |
adri-bhiḥ | sutaḥ | pavate | gabhastyoḥ | vṛṣa-yate | nabhasā | vepate | matī |
saḥ | modate | nasate | sādhate | girā | nenikte | ap-su | yajate | parīmaṇi |
pari | dyukṣam | sahasaḥ | parvata-vṛdham | madhvaḥ | siñcanti | harmyasya | sakṣaṇim |
ā | yasmin | gāvaḥ | suhuta-adaḥ | ūdhani | mūrdhan | śrīṇanti | agriyam | varīma-bhiḥ |
sam | īmiti | ratham | na | bhurijoḥ | aheṣata | daśa | svasāraḥ | aditeḥ | upa-sthe | ā |
jigāt | upa | jrayati | goḥ | apīcyam | padam | yat | asya | matuthāḥ | ajījanan |
śyenaḥ | na | yonim | sadanam | dhiyā | kṛtam | hiraṇyayam | ā-sadam | devaḥ | ā | īṣati |
ā | īmiti | riṇanti | barhiṣi | priyam | girā | aśvaḥ | na | devān | api | eti | yajñiyaḥ |
parā | vi-aktaḥ | aruṣaḥ | divaḥ | kaviḥ | vṛṣā | tri-pṛṣṭhaḥ | anaviṣṭa | gāḥ | abhi |
sahasra-nītiḥ | yatiḥ | parā-yatiḥ | rebhaḥ | na | pūrvīḥ | uṣasaḥ | vi | rājati |
tveṣam | rūpam | kṛṇute | varṇaḥ | asya | saḥ | yatra | aśayat | sam-ṛtā | sedhati | sridhaḥ |
apsāḥ | yāti | svadhayā | daivyam | janam | sam | su-stutī | nasate | sam | go-agrayā |
ukṣā-iva | yūthā | pari-yan | arāvīt | adhi | tviṣīḥ | adhita | sūryasya |
divyaḥ | su-parṇaḥ | ava | cakṣata | kṣām | somaḥ | pari | kratunā | paśyate | jāḥ |
harim | mṛjanti | aruṣaḥ | na | yujyate | sam | dhenu-bhiḥ | kalaśe | somaḥ | ajyate |
ut | vācam | īrayati | hinvate | matī | puru-stutasya | kati | cit | pari-priyaḥ |
sākam | vadanti | bahavaḥ | manīṣiṇaḥ | indrasya | somam | jaṭhare | yat | ā-duhuḥ |
yadi | mṛjanti | su-gabhastayaḥ | naraḥ | sa-nīḻābhiḥ | daśa-bhiḥ | kāmyam | madhu |
aramamāṇaḥ | ati | eti | gāḥ | abhi | sūryasya | priyam | duhituḥ | tiraḥ | ravam |
anu | asmai | joṣam | abharat | vinam-gṛsaḥ | sam | dvayībhiḥ | svasṛ-bhiḥ | kṣeti | jāmi-bhiḥ |
nṛ-dhūtaḥ | adri-sutaḥ | barhiṣi | priyaḥ | patiḥ | gavām | pra-divaḥ | induḥ | ṛtviyaḥ |
purandhi-vān | manuṣaḥ | yajña-sādhanaḥ | śuciḥ | dhiyā | pavate | somaḥ | indra | te |
nṛbāhu-bhyām | coditaḥ | dhārayā | sutaḥ | anu-svadham | pavate | somaḥ | indra | te |
ā | aprāḥ | kratūn | sam | ajaiḥ | adhvare | matīḥ | veḥ | na | dru-sat | camvoḥ | ā | asadat | hariḥ |
aṁśum | duhanti | stanayantam | akṣitam | kavim | kavayaḥ | apasaḥ | manīṣiṇaḥ |
sam | īmiti | gāvaḥ | matayaḥ | yanti | sam-yataḥ | ṛtasya | yonā | sadane | punaḥ-bhuvaḥ |
nābhā | pṛthivyāḥ | dharuṇaḥ | mahaḥ | divaḥ | apām | ūrmau | sindhuṣu | antaḥ | ukṣitaḥ |
indrasya | vajraḥ | vṛṣabhaḥ | vibhu-vasuḥ | somaḥ | hṛde | pavate | cāru | matsaraḥ |
saḥ | tu | pavasva | pari | pārthivam | rajaḥ | stotre | śikṣan | ā-dhūnvate | ca | sukrato iti su-krato |
mā | naḥ | niḥ | bhāk | vasunaḥ | sadana-spṛśaḥ | rayim | piśaṅgam | bahulam | vasīmahi |
ā | tu | naḥ | indo iti | śata-dātu | aśvyam | sahasra-dātu | paśu-mat | hiraṇya-vat |
upa | māsva | bṛhatīḥ | revatīḥ | iṣaḥ | adhi | stotrasya | pavamāna | naḥ | gahi |
srakve | drapsasya | dhamataḥ | sam | asvaran | ṛtasya | yonā | sam | aranta | nābhayaḥ |
trīn | saḥ | mūrdhnaḥ | asuraḥ | cakre | ā-rabhe | satyasya | nāvaḥ | su-kṛtam | apīparan |
samyak | samyañcaḥ | mahiṣāḥ | aheṣata | sindhoḥ | ūrmau | adhi | venāḥ | avīvipan |
madhoḥ | dhārābhiḥ | janayantaḥ | arkam | it | priyām | indrasya | tanvam | avīvṛdhan |
pavitra-vantaḥ | pari | vācam | āsate | pitā | eṣām | pratnaḥ | abhi | rakṣati | vratam |
mahaḥ | samudram | varuṇaḥ | tiraḥ | dadhe | dhīrāḥ | it | śekuḥ | dharuṇeṣu | ā-rabham |
sahasra-dhāre | ava | te | sam | asvaran | divaḥ | nāke | madhu-jihvāḥ | asaścataḥ |
asya | spaśaḥ | na | ni | miṣanti | bhūrṇayaḥ | pade-pade | pāśinaḥ | santi | setavaḥ |
pituḥ | mātuḥ | adhi | ā | ye | sam-asvaran | ṛcā | śocantaḥ | sam-dahantaḥ | avratān |
indra-dviṣṭām | apa | dhamanti | māyayā | tvacam | asiknīm | bhūmanaḥ | divaḥ | pari |
pratnāt | mānāt | adhi | ā | ye | sam-asvaran | śloka-yantrāsaḥ | rabhasasya | mantavaḥ |
apa | anakṣāsaḥ | badhirāḥ | ahāsata | ṛtasya | panthām | na | taranti | duḥ-kṛtaḥ |
sahasra-dhāre | vi-tate | pavitre | ā | vācam | punanti | kavayaḥ | manīṣiṇaḥ |
rudrāsaḥ | eṣām | iṣirāsaḥ | adruhaḥ | spaśaḥ | su-añcaḥ | su-dṛśaḥ | nṛ-cakṣasaḥ |
ṛtasya | gopāḥ | na | dabhāya | su-kratuḥ | trī | saḥ | pavitrā | hṛdi | antaḥ | ā | dadhe |
vidvān | saḥ | viśvā | bhuvanā | abhi | paśyati | ava | ajuṣṭān | vidhyati | karte | avratān |
ṛtasya | tantuḥ | vi-tataḥ | pavitre | ā | jihvāyāḥ | agre | varuṇasya | māyayā |
dhīrāḥ | cit | tat | sam-inakṣantaḥ | āśata | atra | kartam | ava | padāti | apra-bhuḥ |
śiśuḥ | na | jātaḥ | ava | cakradat | vane | svaḥ | yat | vājī | aruṣaḥ | sisāsati |
divaḥ | retasā | sacate | payaḥ-vṛdhā | tam | īmahe | su-matī | śarma | sa-prathaḥ |
divaḥ | yaḥ | skambhaḥ | dharuṇaḥ | su-ātataḥ | ā-pūrṇaḥ | aṁśuḥ | pari-eti | viśvataḥ |
saḥ | ime iti | mahī iti | rodasī iti | yakṣat | ā-vṛtā | samīcīne iti sam-īcīne | dāhāra | sam | iṣaḥ | kaviḥ |
mahi | psaraḥ | su-kṛtam | somyam | madhu | urvī | gavyūtiḥ | aditeḥ | ṛtam | yate |
īśe | yaḥ | vṛṣṭeḥ | itaḥ | usriyaḥ | vṛṣā | apām | netā | yaḥ | itaḥ-ūtiḥ | ṛgmiyaḥ |
ātman-vat | nabhaḥ | duhyate | ghṛtam | payaḥ | ṛtasya | nābhiḥ | amṛtam | vi | jāyate |
sam-īcīnāḥ | su-dānavaḥ | prīṇanti | tam | naraḥ | hitam | ava | mehanti | peravaḥ |
arāvīt | aṁśuḥ | sacamānaḥ | ūrmiṇā | deva-avyam | manuṣe | pinvati | tvacam |
dadhāti | garbham | aditeḥ | upa-sthe | ā | yena | tokam | ca | tanayam | ca | dhāmahe |
sahasra-dhāre | ava | tāḥ | asaścataḥ | tṛtīye | santu | rajasi | prajā-vatīḥ |
catasraḥ | nābhaḥ | ni-hitāḥ | avaḥ | divaḥ | haviḥ | bharanti | amṛtam | ghṛta-ścutaḥ |
śvetam | rūpam | kṛṇute | yat | sisāsati | somaḥ | mīḍhvān | asuraḥ | veda | bhūmanaḥ |
dhiyā | śamī | sacate | saḥ | īm | abhi | pra-vat | divaḥ | kavandham | ava | darṣat | udriṇam |
adha | śvetam | kalaśam | gobhiḥ | aktam | kārṣman | ā | vājī | akramīt | sasa-vān |
ā | hinvire | manasā | deva-yantaḥ | kakṣīvate | śata-himāya | gonām |
at-bhiḥ | soma | papṛcānasya | te | rasaḥ | avyaḥ | vāram | vi | pavamāna | dhāvati |
saḥ | mṛjyamānaḥ | kavi-bhiḥ | madin-tama | svadasva | indrāya | pavamāna | pītaye |
abhi | priyāṇi | pavate | canaḥ-hitaḥ | nāmāni | yahvaḥ | adhi | yeṣu | vardhate |
ā | sūryasya | bṛhataḥ | bṛhan | adhi | ratham | viṣvañcam | aruhat | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ |
ṛtasya | jihvā | pavate | madhu | priyam | vaktā | patiḥ | dhiyaḥ | asyāḥ | adābhyaḥ |
dadhāti | putraḥ | pitroḥ | apīcyam | nāma | tṛtīyam | adhi | rocane | divaḥ |
ava | dyutānaḥ | kalaśān | acikradat | nṛ-bhiḥ | yemānaḥ | kośe | ā | hiraṇyaye |
abhi | īm | ṛtasya | dohanāḥ | anūṣata | adhi | tri-pṛṣṭhaḥ | uṣasaḥ | vi | rājati |
adri-bhiḥ | sutaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | canaḥ-hitaḥ | pra-rocayan | rodasī iti | mātarā | śuciḥ |
romāṇi | avyā | samayā | vi | dhāvati | madhoḥ | dhārā | pinvamānā | dive-dive |
pari | soma | pra | dhanva | svastaye | nṛ-bhiḥ | punānaḥ | abhi | vāsaya | ā-śiram |
ye | te | madāḥ | āhanasaḥ | vi-hāyasaḥ | tebhiḥ | indram | codaya | dātave | magham |
dhartā | divaḥ | pavate | kṛtvyaḥ | rasaḥ | dakṣaḥ | devānām | anu-mādyaḥ | nṛ-bhiḥ |
hariḥ | sṛjānaḥ | atyaḥ | na | satva-bhiḥ | vṛthā | pājāṁsi | kṛṇute | nadīṣu | ā |
śūraḥ | na | dhatte | āyudhā | gabhastyoḥ | svariti svaḥ | sisāsan | rathiraḥ | go-iṣṭiṣu |
indrasya | śuṣmam | īrayan | apasyu-bhiḥ | induḥ | hinvānaḥ | ajyate | manīṣi-bhiḥ |
indrasya | soma | pavamānaḥ | ūrmiṇā | taviṣyamāṇaḥ | jaṭhareṣu | ā | viśa |
pra | naḥ | pinva | vi-dyut | abhrā-iva | rodasī iti | dhiyā | na | vājān | upa | māsi | śaśvataḥ |
viśvasya | rājā | pavate | svaḥ-dṛśaḥ | ṛtasya | dhītim | ṛṣiṣāṭ | avīvaśat |
yaḥ | sūryasya | asireṇa | mṛjyate | pitā | matīnām | asamaṣṭa-kāvyaḥ |
vṛṣā-iva | yūthā | pari | kośam | arṣasi | apām | upa-sthe | vṛṣabhaḥ | kanikradat |
saḥ | indrāya | pavase | matsarin-tamaḥ | yathā | jeṣāma | sam-ithe | tvā-ūtayaḥ |
eṣaḥ | pra | kośe | madhu-mān | acikradat | indrasya | vajraḥ | vapuṣaḥ | vapuḥ-taraḥ |
abhi | īm | ṛtasya | su-dughāḥ | ghṛta-ścutaḥ | vāśrāḥ | arṣanti | payasā-iva | dhenavaḥ |
saḥ | pūrvyaḥ | pavate | yam | divaḥ | pari | śyenaḥ | mathāyat | iṣitaḥ | tiraḥ | rajaḥ |
saḥ | madhvaḥ | ā | yuvate | vevijānaḥ | it | kṛśānoḥ | astuḥ | manasā | aha | bibhyuṣā |
te | naḥ | pūrvāsaḥ | uparāsaḥ | indavaḥ | mahe | vājāya | dhanvantu | go-mate |
īkṣeṇyāsaḥ | ahyaḥ | na | cāravaḥ | brahma-brahma | ye | jujuṣuḥ | haviḥ-haviḥ |
ayam | naḥ | vidvān | vanavat | vanuṣyataḥ | induḥ | satrācā | manasā | puru-stutaḥ |
inasya | yaḥ | sadane | garbham | ā-dadhe | gavām | urubjam | abhi | arṣati | vrajam |
cakriḥ | divaḥ | pavate | kṛtvyaḥ | rasaḥ | mahān | adabdhaḥ | varuṇaḥ | huruk | yate |
asāvi | mitraḥ | vṛjaneṣu | yajñiyaḥ | atyaḥ | na | yūthe | vṛṣa-yuḥ | kanikradat |
pra | rājā | vācam | janayan | asisyadat | apaḥ | vasānaḥ | abhi | gāḥ | iyakṣati |
gṛbhṇāti | ripram | aviḥ | asya | tānvā | śuddhaḥ | devānām | upa | yāti | niḥ-kṛtam |
indrāya | soma | pari | sicyase | nṛ-bhiḥ | nṛ-cakṣāḥ | ūrmiḥ | kaviḥ | ajyase | vane |
pūrvīḥ | hi | te | srutayaḥ | santi | yātave | sahasram | aśvāḥ | harayaḥ | camū-sadaḥ |
samudriyāḥ | apsarasaḥ | manīṣiṇam | āsīnāḥ | antaḥ | abhi | somam | akṣaran |
tāḥ | īm | hinvanti | harmyasya | sakṣaṇim | yācante | sumnam | pavamānam | akṣitam |
go-jit | naḥ | somaḥ | ratha-jit | hiraṇya-jit | svaḥ-jit | ap-jit | pavate | sahasra-jit |
yam | devāsaḥ | cakrire | pītaye | madam | svādiṣṭham | drapsam | aruṇam | mayaḥ-bhuvam |
etāni | soma | pavamānaḥ | asma-yuḥ | satyāni | kṛṇvan | draviṇāni | arṣasi |
jahi | śatrum | antike | dūrake | ca | yaḥ | urvīm | gavyūtim | abhayam | ca | naḥ | kṛdhi |
acodasaḥ | naḥ | dhanvantu | indavaḥ | pra | suvānāsaḥ | bṛhat-diveṣu | harayaḥ |
vi | ca | naśan | naḥ | iṣaḥ | arātayaḥ | aryaḥ | naśanta | saniṣanta | naḥ | dhiyaḥ |
pra | naḥ | dhanvantu | indavaḥ | mada-cyutaḥ | dhanā | vā | yebhiḥ | arvataḥ | junīmasi |
tiraḥ | martasya | kasya | cit | pari-hvṛtim | vayam | dhanāni | viśvadhā | bharemahi |
uta | svasyāḥ | arātyāḥ | ariḥ | hi | saḥ | uta | anyasyāḥ | arātyāḥ | vṛkaḥ | hi | saḥ |
dhanvan | na | tṛṣṇā | sam | arīta | tān | abhi | soma | jahi | pavamāna | duḥ-ādhyaḥ |
divi | te | nābhā | paramaḥ | yaḥ | ā-dade | pṛthivyāḥ | te | ruruhuḥ | sānavi | kṣipaḥ |
adrayaḥ | tvā | bapsati | goḥ | adhi | tvaci | ap-su | tvā | hastaiḥ | duduhuḥ | manīṣiṇaḥ |
eva | te | indo iti | su-bhvam | su-peśasam | rasam | tuñjanti | prathamāḥ | abhi-śriyaḥ |
nidam-nidam | pavamāna | ni | tāriṣaḥ | āviḥ | te | śuṣmaḥ | bhavatu | priyaḥ | madaḥ |
somasya | dhārā | pavate | nṛ-cakṣasaḥ | ṛtena | devān | havate | divaḥ | pari |
bṛhaspateḥ | ravathena | vi | didyute | samudrāsaḥ | na | savanāni | vivyacuḥ |
yam | tvā | vājin | aghnyāḥ | abhi | anūṣata | ayaḥ-hatam | yonim | ā | rohasi | dyu-mān |
maghonām | āyuḥ | pra-tiran | mahi | śravaḥ | indrāya | soma | pavase | vṛṣā | madaḥ |
ā | indrasya | kukṣā | pavate | madin-tamaḥ | ūrjam | vasānaḥ | śravase | su-maṅgalaḥ |
pratyaṅ | saḥ | viśvā | bhuvanā | abhi | paprathe | krīḻan | hariḥ | atyaḥ | syandate | vṛṣā |
tam | tvā | devebhyaḥ | madhumat-tamam | naraḥ | sahasra-dhāram | duhate | daśa | kṣipaḥ |
nṛ-bhiḥ | soma | pra-cyutaḥ | grāva-bhiḥ | sutaḥ | viśvān | devān | ā | pavasva | sahasra-jit |
tam | tvā | hastinaḥ | madhu-mantam | adri-bhiḥ | duhanti | ap-su | vṛṣabham | daśa | kṣipaḥ |
indram | soma | mādayan | daivyam | janam | sindhoḥ-iva | ūrmiḥ | pavamānaḥ | arṣasi |
pra | somasya | pavamānasya | ūrmayaḥ | indrasya | yanti | jaṭharam | su-peśasaḥ |
dadhnā | yat | īm | ut-nītāḥ | yaśasā | gavām | dānāya | śūram | ut-amandiṣuḥ | sutāḥ |
accha | hi | somaḥ | kalaśān | asisyadat | atyaḥ | na | voḻhā | raghu-vartaniḥ | vṛṣā |
atha | devānām | ubhayasya | janmanaḥ | vidvān | aśnoti | amutaḥ | itaḥ | ca | yat |
ā | naḥ | soma | pavamānaḥ | kira | vasu | indo iti | bhava | magha-vā | rādhasaḥ | mahaḥ |
śikṣa | vayaḥ-dhaḥ | vasave | su | cetunā | mā | naḥ | gayam | āre | asmat | parā | sicaḥ |
ā | naḥ | pūṣā | pavamānaḥ | su-rātayaḥ | mitraḥ | gacchantu | varuṇaḥ | sa-joṣasaḥ |
bṛhaspatiḥ | marutaḥ | vāyuḥ | aśvinā | tvaṣṭā | savitā | su-yamā | sarasvatī |
ubhe iti | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | viśvaminve iti viśvam-inve | aryamā | devaḥ | aditiḥ | vi-dhātā |
bhagaḥ | nṛ-śaṁsaḥ | uru | antarikṣam | viśve | devāḥ | pavamānam | juṣanta |
asāvi | somaḥ | aruṣaḥ | vṛṣā | hariḥ | rājā-iva | dasmaḥ | abhi | gāḥ | acikradat |
punānaḥ | vāram | pari | eti | avyayam | śyenaḥ | na | yonim | ghṛta-vantam | ā-sadam |
kaviḥ | vedhasyā | pari | eṣi | māhinam | atyaḥ | na | mṛṣṭaḥ | abhi | vājam | arṣasi |
apa-sedhan | duḥ-itā | soma | mṛḻaya | ghṛtam | vasānaḥ | pari | yāsi | niḥ-nijam |
parjanyaḥ | pitā | mahiṣasya | parṇinaḥ | nābhā | pṛthivyāḥ | giriṣu | kṣayam | dadhe |
svasāraḥ | āpaḥ | abhi | gāḥ | uta | asaran | sam | grāva-bhiḥ | nasate | vīte | adhvare |
jāyā-iva | patyau | adhi | śeva | maṁhase | pajrāyāḥ | garbha | śṛṇuhi | bravīmi | te |
antaḥ | vāṇīṣu | pra | cara | su | jīvase | anindyaḥ | vṛjane | soma | jāgṛhi |
yathā | pūrvebhyaḥ | śata-sāḥ | amṛdhraḥ | sahasra-sāḥ | pari-ayāḥ | vājam | indo iti |
eva | pavasva | suvitāya | navyase | tava | vratam | anu | āpaḥ | sacante |
pavitram | te | vi-tatam | brahmaṇaḥ | pate | pra-bhuḥ | gātrāṇi | pari | eṣi | viśvataḥ |
atapta-tanūḥ | na | tat | āmaḥ | aśnute | śṛtāsaḥ | it | vahantaḥ | tat | sam | āśata |
tapoḥ | pavitram | vi-tatam | divaḥ | pade | śocantaḥ | asya | tantavaḥ | vi | asthiran |
avanti | asya | pavitāram | āśavaḥ | divaḥ | pṛṣṭham | adhi | tiṣṭhanti | cetasā |
arūrucat | uṣasaḥ | pṛśniḥ | agriyaḥ | ukṣā | bibharti | bhuvanāni | vāja-yuḥ |
māyā-vinaḥ | mamire | asya | māyayā | nṛ-cakṣasaḥ | pitaraḥ | garbham | ā | dadhuḥ |
gandharvaḥ | itthā | padam | asya | rakṣati | pāti | devānām | janimāni | adbhutaḥ |
gṛbhṇāti | ripum | ni-dhayā | nidhā-patiḥ | sukṛt-tamāḥ | madhunaḥ | bhakṣam | āśata |
haviḥ | haviṣmaḥ | mahi | sadma | daivyam | nabhaḥ | vasānaḥ | pari | yāsi | adhvaram |
rājā | pavitra-rathaḥ | vājam | ā | aruhaḥ | sahasra-bhṛṣṭiḥ | jayasi | śravaḥ | bṛhat |
pavasva | deva-mādanaḥ | vi-carṣaṇiḥ | apsāḥ | indrāya | varuṇāya | vāyave |
kṛdhi | naḥ | adya | varivaḥ | svasti-mat | uru-kṣitau | gṛṇīhi | daivyam | janam |
ā | yaḥ | tasthau | bhuvanāni | amartyaḥ | viśvāni | somaḥ | pari | tāni | arṣati |
kṛṇvan | sam-cṛtam | vi-cṛtam | abhiṣṭaye | induḥ | sisakti | uṣasam | na | sūryaḥ |
ā | yaḥ | gobhiḥ | sṛjyate | oṣadhīṣu | ā | devānām | sumne | iṣayan | upa-vasuḥ |
ā | vi-dyutā | pavate | dhārayā | sutaḥ | indram | somaḥ | mādayan | daivyam | janam |
eṣaḥ | syaḥ | somaḥ | pavate | sahasra-jit | hinvānaḥ | vācam | iṣirām | uṣaḥ-budham |
induḥ | samudram | ut | iyarti | vāyu-bhiḥ | ā | indrasya | hārdi | kalaśeṣu | sīdati |
abhi | tyam | gāvaḥ | payasā | payaḥ-vṛdham | somam | śrīṇanti | mati-bhiḥ | svaḥ-vidam |
dhanam-jayaḥ | pavate | kṛtvyaḥ | rasaḥ | vipraḥ | kaviḥ | kāvyena | svaḥ-canāḥ |
indrāya | soma | su-sutaḥ | pari | srava | apa | amīvā | bhavatu | rakṣasā | saha |
mā | te | rasasya | matsata | dvayāvinaḥ | draviṇasvantaḥ | iha | santu | indavaḥ |
asmān | sa-marye | pavamāna | codaya | dakṣaḥ | devānām | asi | hi | priyaḥ | madaḥ |
jahi | śatrūn | abhi | ā | bhandanā-yataḥ | piba | indra | somam | ava | naḥ | mṛdhaḥ | jahi |
adabdhaḥ | indo iti | pavase | madin-tamaḥ | ātmā | indrasya | bhavasi | dhāsiḥ | ut-tamaḥ |
abhi | svaranti | bahavaḥ | manīṣiṇaḥ | rājānam | asya | bhuvanasya | niṁsate |
sahasra-nīthaḥ | śata-dhāraḥ | adbhutaḥ | indrāya | induḥ | pavate | kāmyam | madhu |
jayan | kṣetram | abhi | arṣa | jayan | apaḥ | urum | naḥ | gātum | kṛṇu | soma | mīḍhvaḥ |
kanikradat | kalaśe | gobhiḥ | ajyase | vi | avyayam | samayā | vāram | arṣasi |
marmṛjyamānaḥ | atyaḥ | na | sānasiḥ | indrasya | soma | jaṭhare | sam | akṣaraḥ |
svāduḥ | pavasva | divyāya | janmane | svāduḥ | indrāya | suhavītu-nāmne |
svāduḥ | mitrāya | varuṇāya | vāyave | bṛhaspataye | madhu-mān | adābhyaḥ |
atyam | mṛjanti | kalaśe | daśa | kṣipaḥ | pra | viprāṇām | matayaḥ | vācaḥ | īrate |
pavamānāḥ | abhi | arṣanti | su-stutim | ā | indram | viśanti | madirāsaḥ | indavaḥ |
pavamānaḥ | abhi | arṣa | su-vīryam | urvīm | gavyūtim | mahi | śarma | sa-prathaḥ |
mākiḥ | naḥ | asya | pari-sūtiḥ | īśata | indo iti | jayema | tvayā | dhanam-dhanam |
adhi | dyām | asthāt | vṛṣabhaḥ | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | arūrucat | vi | divaḥ | rocanā | kaviḥ |
rājā | pavitram | ati | eti | roruvat | divaḥ | pīyūṣam | duhate | nṛ-cakṣasaḥ |
divaḥ | nāke | madhu-jihvāḥ | asaścataḥ | venāḥ | duhanti | ukṣaṇam | giri-sthām |
ap-su | drapsam | vavṛdhānam | samudre | ā | sindhoḥ | ūrmā | madhu-mantam | pavitre | ā |
nāke | su-parṇam | upapapti-vāṁsam | giraḥ | venānām | akṛpanta | pūrvīḥ |
śiśum | rihanti | matayaḥ | panipnatam | hiraṇyayam | śakunam | kṣāmaṇi | sthām |
ūrdhvaḥ | gandharvaḥ | adhi | nāke | asthāt | viśvā | rūpā | prati-cakṣāṇaḥ | asya |
bhānuḥ | śukreṇa | śociṣā | vi | adyaut | pra | arūrucat | rodasī iti | mātarā | śuciḥ |
pra | te | āśavaḥ | pavamāna | dhī-javaḥ | madāḥ | arṣanti | raghujāḥ-iva | tmanā |
divyāḥ | su-parṇāḥ | madhu-mantaḥ | indavaḥ | madin-tamāsaḥ | pari | kośam | āsate |
pra | te | madāsaḥ | madirāsaḥ | āśavaḥ | asṛkṣata | rathyāsaḥ | yathā | pṛthak |
dhenuḥ | na | vatsam | payasā | abhi | vajriṇam | indram | indavaḥ | madhu-mantaḥ | ūrmayaḥ |
atyaḥ | na | hiyānaḥ | abhi | vājam | arṣa | svaḥ-vit | kośam | divaḥ | adri-mātaram |
vṛṣā | pavitre | adhi | sānau | avyaye | somaḥ | punānaḥ | indriyāya | dhāyase |
pra | te | āśvinīḥ | pavamāna | dhī-juvaḥ | divyāḥ | asṛgran | payasā | dharīmaṇi |
pra | antaḥ | ṛṣayaḥ | sthāvirīḥ | asṛkṣata | ye | tvā | mṛjanti | ṛṣi-sāna | vedhasaḥ |
viśvā | dhāmāni | viśva-cakṣaḥ | ṛbhvasaḥ | pra-bhoḥ | te | sataḥ | pari | yanti | ketavaḥ |
vi-ānaśiḥ | pavase | soma | dharma-bhiḥ | patiḥ | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājasi |
ubhayataḥ | pavamānasya | raśmayaḥ | dhruvasya | sataḥ | pari | yanti | ketavaḥ |
yadi | pavitre | adhi | mṛjyate | hariḥ | sattā | ni | yonā | kalaśeṣu | sīdati |
yajñasya | ketuḥ | pavate | su-adhvaraḥ | somaḥ | devānām | upa | yāti | niḥ-kṛtam |
sahasra-dhāraḥ | pari | kośam | arṣati | vṛṣā | pavitram | ati | eti | roruvat |
rājā | samudram | nadyaḥ | vi | gāhate | apām | ūrmim | sacate | sindhuṣu | śritaḥ |
adhi | asthāt | sānu | pavamānaḥ | avyayam | nābhā | pṛthivyāḥ | dharuṇaḥ | mahaḥ | divaḥ |
divaḥ | na | sānu | stanayan | acikradat | dyauḥ | ca | yasya | pṛthivī | ca | dharma-bhiḥ |
indrasya | sakhyam | pavate | vi-vevidat | somaḥ | punānaḥ | kalaśeṣu | sīdati |
jyotiḥ | yajñasya | pavate | madhu | priyam | pitā | devānām | janitā | vibhu-vasuḥ |
dadhāti | ratnam | svadhayoḥ | apīcyam | madin-tamaḥ | matsaraḥ | indriyaḥ | rasaḥ |
abhi-krandan | kalaśam | vājī | arṣati | patiḥ | divaḥ | śata-dhāraḥ | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ |
hariḥ | mitrasya | sadaneṣu | sīdati | marmṛjānaḥ | avi-bhiḥ | sindhu-bhiḥ | vṛṣā |
agre | sindhūnām | pavamānaḥ | arṣati | agre | vācaḥ | agriyaḥ | goṣu | gacchati |
agre | vājasya | bhajate | mahā-dhanam | su-āyudhaḥ | sotṛ-bhiḥ | pūyate | vṛṣā |
ayam | mata-vān | śakunaḥ | yathā | hitaḥ | avye | sasāra | pavamānaḥ | ūrmiṇā |
tava | kratvā | rodasī iti | antarā | kave | śuciḥ | dhiyā | pavate | somaḥ | indra | te |
drāpim | vasānaḥ | yajataḥ | divi-spṛśam | antarikṣa-prāḥ | bhuvaneṣu | arpitaḥ |
svaḥ | jajñānaḥ | nabhasā | abhi | akramīt | pratnam | asya | pitaram | ā | vivāsati |
saḥ | asya | viśe | mahi | śarma | yacchati | yaḥ | asya | dhāma | prathamam | vi-ānaśe |
padam | yat | asya | parame | vi-omani | ataḥ | viśvāḥ | abhi | sam | yāti | sam-yataḥ |
pro iti | ayāsīt | induḥ | indrasya | niḥ-kṛtam | sakhā | sakhyuḥ | na | pra | mināti | sam-giram |
maryaḥ-iva | yuvati-bhiḥ | sam | arṣati | somaḥ | kalaśe | śata-yāmnā | pathā |
pra | vaḥ | dhiyaḥ | mandra-yuvaḥ | vipanyuvaḥ | panasyuvaḥ | sam-vasaneṣu | akramuḥ |
somam | manīṣāḥ | abhi | anūṣata | stubhaḥ | abhi | dhenavaḥ | payasā | īm | aśiśrayuḥ |
ā | naḥ | soma | sam-yatam | pipyuṣīm | iṣam | indo iti | pavasva | pavamānaḥ | asridham |
yā | naḥ | dohate | triḥ | ahan | asaścuṣī | kṣu-mat | vāja-vat | madhu-mat | su-vīryam |
vṛṣā | matīnām | pavate | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | somaḥ | ahnaḥ | pra-tarītā | uṣasaḥ | divaḥ |
krāṇā | sindhūnām | kalaśān | avīvaśat | indrasya | hārdi | ā-viśan | manīṣi-bhiḥ |
manīṣi-bhiḥ | pavate | pūrvyaḥ | kaviḥ | nṛ-bhiḥ | yataḥ | pari | kośān | acikradat |
tritasya | nāma | janayan | madhu | kṣarat | indrasya | vāyoḥ | sakhyāya | kartave |
ayam | punānaḥ | uṣasaḥ | vi | rocayat | ayam | sindhu-bhyaḥ | abhavat | ūm̐ iti | loka-kṛt |
ayam | triḥ | sapta | duduhānaḥ | ā-śiram | somaḥ | hṛde | pavate | cāru | matsaraḥ |
pavasva | soma | divyeṣu | dhāma-su | sṛjānaḥ | indo iti | kalaśe | pavitre | ā |
sīdan | indrasya | jaṭhare | kanikradat | nṛ-bhiḥ | yataḥ | sūryam | ā | arohayaḥ | divi |
adri-bhiḥ | sutaḥ | pavase | pavitre | ā | indo iti | indrasya | jaṭhareṣu | ā-viśan |
tvam | nṛ-cakṣāḥ | abhavaḥ | vi-cakṣaṇa | soma | gotram | aṅgiraḥ-bhyaḥ | avṛṇoḥ | apa |
tvām | soma | pavamānam | su-ādhyaḥ | anu | viprāsaḥ | amadan | avasyavaḥ |
tvām | su-parṇaḥ | ā | abharat | divaḥ | pari | indo iti | viśvābhiḥ | mati-bhiḥ | pari-kṛtam |
avye | punānam | pari | vāre | ūrmiṇā | harim | navante | abhi | sapta | dhenavaḥ |
apām | upa-sthe | adhi | āyavaḥ | kavim | ṛtasya | yonā | mahiṣāḥ | aheṣata |
induḥ | punānaḥ | ati | gāhate | mṛdhaḥ | viśvāni | kṛṇvan | su-pathāni | yajyave |
gāḥ | kṛṇvānaḥ | niḥ-nijam | haryataḥ | kaviḥ | atyaḥ | na | krīḻan | pari | vāram | arṣati |
asaścataḥ | śata-dhārāḥ | abhi-śriyaḥ | harim | navante | ava | tāḥ | udanyuvaḥ |
kṣipaḥ | mṛjanti | pari | gobhiḥ | ā-vṛtam | tṛtīye | pṛṣṭhe | adhi | rocane | divaḥ |
tava | imāḥ | pra-jāḥ | divyasya | retasaḥ | tvam | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājasi |
atha | idam | viśvam | pavamāna | te | vaśe | tvam | indo iti | prathamaḥ | dhāma-dhāḥ | asi |
tvam | samudraḥ | asi | viśva-vit | kave | tava | imāḥ | pañca | pra-diśaḥ | vi-dharmaṇi |
tvam | dyām | ca | pṛthivīm | ca | ati | jabhriṣe | tava | jyotīṁṣi | pavamāna | sūryaḥ |
tvam | pavitre | rajasaḥ | vi-dharmaṇi | devebhyaḥ | soma | pavamāna | pūyase |
tvām | uśijaḥ | prathamāḥ | agṛbhṇata | tubhya | imā | viśvā | bhuvanāni | yemire |
pra | rebhaḥ | eti | ati | vāram | avyayam | vṛṣā | vaneṣu | ava | cakradat | hariḥ |
sam | dhītayaḥ | vāvaśānāḥ | anūṣata | śiśum | rihanti | matayaḥ | panipnatam |
saḥ | sūryasya | raśmi-bhiḥ | pari | vyata | tantum | tanvānaḥ | tri-vṛtam | yathā | vide |
nayan | ṛtasya | pra-śiṣaḥ | navīyasīḥ | patiḥ | janīnām | upa | yāti | niḥ-kṛtam |
rājā | sindhūnām | pavate | patiḥ | divaḥ | ṛtasya | yāti | pathi-bhiḥ | kanikradat |
sahasra-dhāraḥ | pari | sicyate | hariḥ | punānaḥ | vācam | janayan | upa-vasuḥ |
pavamāna | mahi | arṇaḥ | vi | dhāvasi | sūraḥ | na | citraḥ | avyayāni | pavyayā |
gabhasti-pūtaḥ | nṛ-bhiḥ | adri-bhiḥ | sutaḥ | mahe | vājāya | dhanyāya | dhanvasi |
iṣam | ūrjam | pavamāna | abhi | arṣasi | śyenaḥ | na | vaṁsu | kalaśeṣu | sīdasi |
indrāya | madvā | madyaḥ | madaḥ | sutaḥ | divaḥ | viṣṭambhaḥ | upa-maḥ | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ |
sapta | svasāraḥ | abhi | mātaraḥ | śiśum | navam | jajñānam | jenyam | vipaḥ-citam |
apām | gandharvam | divyam | nṛ-cakṣasam | somam | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājase |
īśānaḥ | imā | bhuvanāni | vi | īyase | yujānaḥ | indo iti | haritaḥ | su-parṇyaḥ |
tāḥ | te | kṣarantu | madhu-mat | ghṛtam | payaḥ | tava | vrate | soma | tiṣṭhantu | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
tvam | nṛ-cakṣāḥ | asi | soma | viśvataḥ | pavamāna | vṛṣabha | tā | vi | dhāvasi |
saḥ | naḥ | pavasva | vasu-mat | hiraṇya-vat | vayam | syāma | bhuvaneṣu | jīvase |
go-vit | pavasva | vasu-vit | hiraṇya-vit | retaḥ-dhāḥ | indo iti | bhuvaneṣu | arpitaḥ |
tvam | su-vīraḥ | asi | soma | viśva-vit | tam | tvā | viprāḥ | upa | girā | ime | āsate |
ut | madhvaḥ | ūrmiḥ | vananāḥ | atisthipat | apaḥ | vasānaḥ | mahiṣaḥ | vi | gāhate |
rājā | pavitra-rathaḥ | vājam | ā | aruhat | sahasra-bhṛṣṭiḥ | jayati | śravaḥ | bṛhat |
saḥ | bhandanāḥ | ut | iyarti | prajā-vatīḥ | viśva-āyuḥ | viśvāḥ | su-bharāḥ | ahaḥ-divi |
brahma | prajā-vat | rayim | aśva-pastyam | pītaḥ | indo iti | indram | asmabhyam | yācatāt |
saḥ | agre | ahnām | hariḥ | haryataḥ | madaḥ | pra | cetasā | cetayate | anu | dyu-bhiḥ |
dvā | janā | yātayan | antaḥ | īyate | narāśaṁsam | ca | daivyam | ca | dhartari |
añjate | vi | añjate | sam | añjate | kratum | rihanti | madhunā | abhi | añjate |
sindhoḥ | ut-śvāse | patayantam | ukṣaṇam | hiraṇya-pāvāḥ | paśum | āsu | gṛbhṇate |
vipaḥ-cite | pavamānāya | gāyata | mahī | na | dhārā | ati | andhaḥ | arṣati |
ahiḥ | na | jūṇām | ati | sarpati | tvacam | atyaḥ | na | krīḻan | asarat | vṛṣā | hariḥ |
agre-gaḥ | rājā | apyaḥ | taviṣyate | vi-mānaḥ | ahnām | bhuvaneṣu | arpitaḥ |
hariḥ | ghṛta-snuḥ | su-dṛśīkaḥ | arṇavaḥ | jyotiḥ-rathaḥ | pavate | rāye | okyaḥ |
asarji | skambhaḥ | divaḥ | ut-yataḥ | madaḥ | pari | tri-dhātuḥ | bhuvanāni | arṣati |
aṁśum | rihanti | matayaḥ | panipnatam | girā | yadi | niḥ-nijam | ṛgmiṇaḥ | yayuḥ |
pra | te | dhārāḥ | ati | aṇvāni | meṣyaḥ | punānasya | sam-yataḥ | yanti | raṁhayaḥ |
yat | gobhiḥ | indo iti | camvoḥ | sam-ajyase | ā | suvānaḥ | soma | kalaśeṣu | sīdasi |
pavasva | soma | kratu-vit | naḥ | ukthyaḥ | avyaḥ | vāre | pari | dhāva | madhu | priyam |
jahi | viśvān | rakṣasaḥ | indo iti | atriṇaḥ | bṛhat | vadema | vidathe | su-vīrāḥ |
pra | tu | drava | pari | kośam | ni | sīda | nṛ-bhiḥ | punānaḥ | abhi | vājam | arṣa |
aśvam | na | tvā | vājinam | marjayantaḥ | accha | barhiḥ | raśanābhiḥ | nayanti |
su-āyudhaḥ | pavate | devaḥ | induḥ | aśasti-hā | vṛjanam | rakṣamāṇaḥ |
pitā | devānām | janitā | su-dakṣaḥ | viṣṭambhaḥ | divaḥ | dharuṇaḥ | pṛthivyāḥ |
ṛṣiḥ | vipraḥ | puraḥ-etā | janānām | ṛbhuḥ | dhīraḥ | uśanā | kāvyena |
saḥ | cit | viveda | ni-hitam | yat | āsām | apīcyam | guhyam | nāma | gonām |
eṣaḥ | syaḥ | te | madhu-mān | indra | somaḥ | vṛṣā | vṛṣṇe | pari | pavitre | akṣāriti |
sahasra-sāḥ | śata-sāḥ | bhūri-dāvā | śaśvat-tamam | barhiḥ | ā | vājī | asthāt |
ete | somāḥ | abhi | gavyā | sahasrā | mahe | vājāya | amṛtāya | śravāṁsi |
pavitrebhiḥ | pavamānāḥ | asṛgran | śravasyavaḥ | na | pṛtanājaḥ | atyāḥ |
pari | hi | sma | puru-hūtaḥ | janānām | viśvā | asarat | bhojanā | pūyamānaḥ |
atha | ā | bhara | śyena-bhṛta | prayāṁsi | rayim | tuñjānaḥ | abhi | vājam | arṣa |
eṣaḥ | suvānaḥ | pari | somaḥ | pavitre | sargaḥ | na | sṛṣṭaḥ | adadhāvat | arvā |
tigme iti | śiśānaḥ | mahiṣaḥ | na | śṛṅge iti | gāḥ | gavyan | abhi | śūraḥ | na | satvā |
eṣā | ā | yayau | paramāt | antaḥ | adreḥ | kū-cit | satīḥ | ūrve | gāḥ | viveda |
divaḥ | na | vi-dyut | stanayantī | abhraiḥ | somasya | te | pavate | indra | dhārā |
uta | sma | rāśim | pari | yāsi | gonām | indreṇa | soma | sa-ratham | punānaḥ |
pūrvīḥ | iṣaḥ | bṛhatīḥ | jīradāno iti jīra-dāno | śikṣa | śacī-vaḥ | tava | tāḥ | upa-stut |
ayam | somaḥ | indra | tubhyam | sunve | tubhyam | pavate | tvam | asya | pāhi |
tvam | ha | yam | cakṛṣe | tvam | vavṛṣe | indum | madāya | yujyāya | somam |
saḥ | īm | rathaḥ | na | bhuriṣāṭ | ayoji | mahaḥ | purūṇi | sātaye | vasūni |
āt | īm | viśvā | nahuṣyāṇi | jātā | svaḥ-sātā | vane | ūrdhvā | navanta |
vāyuḥ | na | yaḥ | niyutvān | iṣṭa-yāmā | nāsatyā-iva | have | ā | śam-bhaviṣṭhaḥ |
viśva-vāraḥ | draviṇodāḥ-iva | tman | pūṣā-iva | dhī-javanaḥ | asi | soma |
indraḥ | na | yaḥ | mahā | karmāṇi | cakriḥ | hantā | vṛtrāṇām | asi | soma | pūḥ-bhit |
paidvaḥ | na | hi | tvam | ahi-nāmnām | hantā | viśvasya | asi | soma | dasyoḥ |
agniḥ | na | yaḥ | vane | ā | sṛjyamānaḥ | vṛthā | pājāṁsi | kṛṇute | nadīṣu |
janaḥ | na | yudhvā | mahataḥ | upabdiḥ | iyarti | somaḥ | pavamānaḥ | ūrmim |
ete | somāḥ | ati | vārāṇi | avyā | divyāḥ | na | kośāsaḥ | abhra-varṣāḥ |
vṛthā | samudram | sindhavaḥ | na | nīcīḥ | sutāsaḥ | abhi | kalaśān | asṛgran |
śuṣmī | śardhaḥ | na | mārutam | pavasva | anabhi-śastā | divyā | yathā | viṭ |
āpaḥ | na | makṣu | su-matiḥ | bhava | naḥ | sahasra-apsāḥ | pṛtanāṣāṭ | na | yajñaḥ |
rājñaḥ | nu | te | varuṇasya | vratāni | bṛhat | gabhīram | tava | soma | dhāma |
śuciḥ | tvam | asi | priyaḥ | na | mitraḥ | dakṣāyyaḥ | aryamā-iva | asi | soma |
pro iti | syaḥ | vahniḥ | pathyābhiḥ | asyān | divaḥ | na | vṛṣṭiḥ | pavamānaḥ | akṣāriti |
sahasra-dhāraḥ | asadat | ni | asme iti | mātuḥ | upa-sthe | vane | ā | ca | somaḥ |
rājā | sindhūnām | avasiṣṭa | vāsaḥ | ṛtasya | nāvam | ā | aruhat | rajiṣṭhām |
ap-su | drapsaḥ | vavṛdhe | śyena-jūtaḥ | duhe | īm | pitā | duhe | īm | pituḥ | jām |
siṁham | nasanta | madhvaḥ | ayāsam | harim | aruṣam | divaḥ | asya | patim |
śūraḥ | yut-su | prathamaḥ | pṛcchate | gāḥ | asya | cakṣasā | pari | pāti | ukṣā |
madhu-pṛṣṭham | ghoram | ayāsam | aśvam | rathe | yuñjanti | uru-cakre | ṛṣvam |
svasāraḥ | īm | jāmayaḥ | marjayanti | sa-nābhayaḥ | vājinam | ūrjayanti |
catasraḥ | īm | ghṛta-duhaḥ | sacante | samāne | antaḥ | dharuṇe | ni-sattāḥ |
tāḥ | īm | arṣanti | namasā | punānāḥ | tāḥ | īm | viśvataḥ | pari | santi | pūrvīḥ |
viṣṭambhaḥ | divaḥ | dharuṇaḥ | pṛthivyāḥ | viśvāḥ | uta | kṣitayaḥ | haste | asya |
asat | te | utsaḥ | gṛṇate | niyutvān | madhvaḥ | aṁśuḥ | pavate | indriyāya |
vanvan | avātaḥ | abhi | deva-vītim | indrāya | soma | vṛtra-hā | pavasva |
śagdhi | mahaḥ | puru-candrasya | rāyaḥ | su-vīryasya | patayaḥ | syāma |
pra | hinvānaḥ | janitā | rodasyoḥ | rathaḥ | na | vājam | saniṣyan | ayāsīt |
indram | gacchan | āyudhā | sam-śiśānaḥ | viśvā | vasu | hastayoḥ | ā-dadhānaḥ |
abhi | tri-pṛṣṭham | vṛṣaṇam | vayaḥ-dhām | āṅgūṣāṇām | avāvaśanta | vāṇīḥ |
vanā | vasānaḥ | varuṇaḥ | na | sindhūn | vi | ratna-dhāḥ | dayate | vāryāṇi |
śūra-grāmaḥ | sarva-vīraḥ | sahāvān | jetā | pavasva | sanitā | dhanāni |
tigma-āyudhaḥ | kṣipra-dhanvā | samat-su | aṣāḻhaḥ | sahvān | pṛtanāsu | śatrūn |
uru-gavyūtiḥ | abhayāni | kṛṇvan | samīcīne iti sam-īcīne | ā | pavasva | puraṁdhī iti puram-dhī |
apaḥ | sisāsan | uṣasaḥ | svaḥ | gāḥ | sam | cikradaḥ | mahaḥ | asmabhyam | vājān |
matsi | soma | varuṇam | matsi | mitram | matsi | indram | indo iti | pavamāna | viṣṇum |
matsi | śardhaḥ | mārutam | matsi | devān | matsi | mahām | indram | indo iti | madāya |
eva | rājā-iva | kratu-mān | amena | viśvā | ghanighnat | duḥ-itā | pavasva |
indo iti | su-uktāya | vacase | vayaḥ | dhāḥ | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
asarji | vakvā | rathye | yathā | ājau | dhiyā | manotā | prathamaḥ | manīṣī |
daśa | svasāraḥ | adhi | sānau | avye | ajanti | vahnim | sadanāni | accha |
vītī | janasya | divyasya | kavyaiḥ | adhi | suvānaḥ | nahuṣyebhiḥ | induḥ |
pra | yaḥ | nṛ-bhiḥ | amṛtaḥ | martyebhiḥ | marmṛjānaḥ | avi-bhiḥ | gobhiḥ | at-bhiḥ |
vṛṣā | vṛṣṇe | roruvat | aṁśuḥ | asmai | pavamānaḥ | ruśat | īrte | payaḥ | goḥ |
sahasram | ṛkvā | pathi-bhiḥ | vacaḥ-vit | adhvasma-bhiḥ | sūraḥ | aṇvam | vi | yāti |
ruja | dṛḻhā | cit | rakṣasaḥ | sadāṁsi | punānaḥ | indo iti | ūrṇuhi | vi | vājān |
vṛśca | upariṣṭāt | tujatā | vadhena | ye | anti | dūrāt | upa-nāyam | eṣām |
saḥ | pratna-vat | navyase | viśva-vāra | su-uktāya | pathaḥ | kṛṇuhi | prācaḥ |
ye | duḥ-sahāsaḥ | vanuṣā | bṛhantaḥ | tān | te | aśyāma | puru-kṛt | purukṣo iti puru-kṣo |
eva | punānaḥ | apaḥ | svaḥ | gāḥ | asmabhyam | tokā | tanayāni | bhūri |
śam | naḥ | kṣetram | uru | jyotīṁṣi | soma | jyok | naḥ | sūryam | dṛśaye | rirīhi |
pari | suvānaḥ | hariḥ | aṁśuḥ | pavitre | rathaḥ | na | sarji | sanaye | hiyānaḥ |
āpat | ślokam | indriyam | pūyamānaḥ | prati | devān | ajuṣata | prayaḥ-bhiḥ |
accha | nṛ-cakṣāḥ | asarat | pavitre | nāma | dadhānaḥ | kaviḥ | asya | yonau |
sīdan | hotā-iva | sadane | camūṣu | upa | īm | agman | ṛṣayaḥ | sapta | viprāḥ |
pra | su-medhāḥ | gātu-vit | viśva-devaḥ | somaḥ | punānaḥ | sadaḥ | eti | nityam |
bhuvat | viśveṣu | kāvyeṣu | rantā | anu | janān | yatate | pañca | dhīraḥ |
tava | tye | soma | pavamāna | niṇye | viśve | devāḥ | trayaḥ | ekādaśāsaḥ |
daśa | svadhābhiḥ | adhi | sānau | avye | mṛjanti | tvā | nadyaḥ | sapta | yahvīḥ |
tat | nu | satyam | pavamānasya | astu | yatra | viśve | kāravaḥ | sam-nasanta |
jyotiḥ | yat | ahne | akṛṇot | ūm̐ iti | lokam | pra | āvat | manum | dasyave | kaḥ | abhīkam |
pari | sadma-iva | paśu-manti | hotā | rājā | na | satyaḥ | sam-itīḥ | iyānaḥ |
somaḥ | punānaḥ | kalaśān | ayāsīt | sīdan | mṛgaḥ | na | mahiṣaḥ | vaneṣu |
sākam-ukṣaḥ | marjayanta | svasāraḥ | daśa | dhīrasya | dhītayaḥ | dhanutrīḥ |
hariḥ | pari | adravat | jāḥ | sūryasya | droṇam | nanakṣe | atyaḥ | na | vājī |
sam | mātṛ-bhiḥ | na | śiśuḥ | vāvaśānaḥ | vṛṣā | dadhanve | puru-vāraḥ | at-bhiḥ |
maryaḥ | na | yoṣām | abhi | niḥ-kṛtam | yan | sam | gacchate | kalaśe | usriyābhiḥ |
uta | pra | pipye | ūdhaḥ | aghnyāyāḥ | induḥ | dhārābhiḥ | sacate | su-medhāḥ |
mūrdhānam | gāvaḥ | payasā | camūṣu | abhi | śrīṇanti | vasu-bhiḥ | na | niktaiḥ |
saḥ | naḥ | devebhiḥ | pavamāna | rada | indo iti | rayim | aśvinam | vāvaśānaḥ |
rathirāyatām | uśatī | puram-dhiḥ | asmadryak | ā | dāvane | vasūnām |
nu | naḥ | rayim | upa | māsva | nṛ-vantam | punānaḥ | vātāpyam | viśva-candram |
pra | vandituḥ | indo iti | tāri | āyuḥ | prātaḥ | makṣu | dhiyā-vasuḥ | jagamyāt |
adhi | yat | asmin | vājini-iva | śubhaḥ | spardhante | dhiyaḥ | sūrye | na | viśaḥ |
apaḥ | vṛṇānaḥ | pavate | kavi-yan | vrajam | na | paśu-vardhanāya | manma |
dvitā | vi-ūrṇvan | amṛtasya | dhāma | svaḥ-vide | bhuvanāni | prathanta |
dhiyaḥ | pinvānāḥ | svasare | na | gāvaḥ | ṛta-yantīḥ | abhi | vāvaśre | indum |
pari | yat | kaviḥ | kāvyā | bharate | śūraḥ | na | rathaḥ | bhuvanāni | viśvā |
deveṣu | yaśaḥ | martāya | bhūṣan | dakṣāya | rāyaḥ | puru-bhūṣu | navyaḥ |
śriye | jātaḥ | śriye | ā | niḥ | iyāya | śriyam | vayaḥ | jaritṛ-bhyaḥ | dadhāti |
śriyam | vasānāḥ | amṛta-tvam | āyan | bhavanti | satyā | sam-ithā | mita-drau |
iṣam | ūrjam | abhi | arṣa | aśvam | gām | uru | jyotiḥ | kṛṇuhi | matsi | devān |
viśvāni | hi | su-sahā | tāni | tubhyam | pavamāna | bādhase | soma | śatrūn |
kanikranti | hariḥ | ā | sṛjyamānaḥ | sīdan | vanasya | jaṭhare | punānaḥ |
nṛ-bhiḥ | yataḥ | kṛṇute | niḥ-nijam | gāḥ | ataḥ | matīḥ | janayata | svadhābhiḥ |
hariḥ | sṛjānaḥ | pathyām | ṛtasya | iyarti | vācam | aritā-iva | nāvam |
devaḥ | devānām | guhyāni | nāma | āviḥ | kṛṇoti | barhiṣi | pra-vāce |
apām-iva | it | ūrmayaḥ | tarturāṇāḥ | pra | manīṣāḥ | īrate | somam | accha |
namasyantīḥ | upa | ca | yanti | sam | ca | ā | ca | viśanti | uśatīḥ | uśantam |
tam | marmṛjānam | mahiṣam | na | sānau | aṁśum | duhanti | ukṣaṇam | giri-sthām |
tam | vāvaśānam | matayaḥ | sacante | tritaḥ | bibharti | varuṇam | samudre |
iṣyan | vācam | upavaktā-iva | hotuḥ | punānaḥ | indo iti | vi | sya | manīṣām |
indraḥ | ca | yat | kṣayathaḥ | saubhagāya | su-vīryasya | patayaḥ | syāma |
pra | senā-nīḥ | śūraḥ | agre | rathānām | gavyan | eti | harṣate | asya | senā |
bhadrān | kṛṇvan | indra-havān | sakhi-bhyaḥ | ā | somaḥ | vastrā | rabhasāni | datte |
sam | asya | harim | harayaḥ | mṛjanti | aśva-hayaiḥ | ani-śitam | namaḥ-bhiḥ |
ā | tiṣṭhati | ratham | indrasya | sakhā | vidvān | ena | su-matim | yāti | accha |
saḥ | naḥ | deva | deva-tāte | pavasva | mahe | soma | psarase | indra-pānaḥ |
kṛṇvan | apaḥ | varṣayan | dyām | uta | imām | uroḥ | ā | naḥ | varivasya | punānaḥ |
ajītaye | ahataye | pavasva | svastaye | sarva-tātaye | bṛhate |
tat | uśanti | viśve | ime | sakhāyaḥ | tat | aham | vaśmi | pavamāna | soma |
somaḥ | pavate | janitā | matīnām | janitā | divaḥ | janitā | pṛthivyāḥ |
janitā | agneḥ | janitā | sūryasya | janitā | indrasya | janitā | uta | viṣṇoḥ |
brahmā | devānām | pada-vīḥ | kavīnām | ṛṣiḥ | viprāṇām | mahiṣaḥ | mṛgāṇām |
śyenaḥ | gṛdhrāṇām | sva-dhitiḥ | vanānām | somaḥ | pavitram | ati | eti | rebhan |
pra | avīvipat | vācaḥ | ūrmim | na | sindhuḥ | giraḥ | somaḥ | pavamānaḥ | manīṣāḥ |
antariti | paśyan | vṛjanā | imā | avarāṇi | ā | tiṣṭhati | vṛṣabhaḥ | goṣu | jānan |
saḥ | matsaraḥ | pṛt-su | vanvan | avātaḥ | sahasra-retāḥ | abhi | vājam | arṣa |
indrāya | indo iti | pavamānaḥ | manīṣī | aṁśoḥ | ūrmim | īraya | gāḥ | iṣaṇyan |
pari | priyaḥ | kalaśe | deva-vātaḥ | indrāya | somaḥ | raṇyaḥ | madāya |
sahasra-dhāraḥ | śata-vājaḥ | induḥ | vājī | na | saptiḥ | samanā | jigāti |
saḥ | pūrvyaḥ | vasu-vit | jāyamānaḥ | mṛjānaḥ | ap-su | duduhānaḥ | adrau |
abhiśasti-pāḥ | bhuvanasya | rājā | vidat | gātum | brahmaṇe | pūyamānaḥ |
tvayā | hi | naḥ | pitaraḥ | soma | pūrve | karmāṇi | cakruḥ | pavamāna | dhīrāḥ |
vanvan | avātaḥ | pari-dhīn | apa | ūrṇu | vīrebhiḥ | aśvaiḥ | magha-vā | bhava | naḥ |
yathā | apavathāḥ | manave | vayaḥ-dhāḥ | amitra-hā | varivaḥ-vit | haviṣmān |
eva | pavasva | draviṇam | dadhānaḥ | indre | sam | tiṣṭha | janaya | āyudhāni |
pavasva | soma | madhu-mān | ṛta-vā | apaḥ | vasānaḥ | adhi | sānau | avye |
ava | droṇāni | ghṛta-vanti | sīda | madin-tamaḥ | matsaraḥ | indra-pānaḥ |
vṛṣṭim | divaḥ | śata-dhāraḥ | pavasva | sahasra-sāḥ | vāja-yuḥ | deva-vītau |
sam | sindhu-bhiḥ | kalaśe | vāvaśānaḥ | sam | usriyābhiḥ | pra-tiran | naḥ | āyuḥ |
eṣaḥ | syaḥ | somaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | punānaḥ | atyaḥ | na | vājī | tarati | it | arātīḥ |
payaḥ | na | dugdham | aditeḥ | iṣiram | uru-iva | gātuḥ | su-yamaḥ | na | voḻhā |
su-āyudhaḥ | sotṛ-bhiḥ | pūyamānaḥ | abhi | arṣa | guhyam | cāru | nāma |
abhi | vājam | saptiḥ-iva | śravasyā | abhi | vāyum | abhi | gāḥ | deva | soma |
śiśum | jajñānam | haryatam | mṛjanti | śumbhanti | vahnim | marutaḥ | gaṇena |
kaviḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | kāvyena | kaviḥ | san | somaḥ | pavitram | ati | eti | rebhan |
ṛṣi-manāḥ | yaḥ | ṛṣi-kṛt | svaḥ-sāḥ | sahasra-nīthaḥ | pada-vīḥ | kavīnām |
tṛtīyam | dhāma | mahiṣaḥ | sisāsan | somaḥ | vi-rājam | anu | rājati | stup |
camū-sat | śyenaḥ | śakunaḥ | vi-bhṛtvā | go-vinduḥ | drapsaḥ | āyudhāni | bibhrat |
apām | ūrmim | sacamānaḥ | samudram | turīyam | dhāma | mahiṣaḥ | vivakti |
maryaḥ | na | śubhraḥ | tanvam | mṛjānaḥ | atyaḥ | na | sṛtvā | sanaye | dhanānām |
vṛṣā-iva | yūthā | pari | kośam | arṣan | kanikradat | camvoḥ | ā | viveśa |
pavasva | indo iti | pavamānaḥ | mahaḥ-bhiḥ | kanikradat | pari | vārāṇi | arṣa |
krīḻan | camvoḥ | ā | viśa | pūyamānaḥ | indram | te | rasaḥ | madiraḥ | mamattu |
pra | asya | dhārāḥ | bṛhatīḥ | asṛgran | aktaḥ | gobhiḥ | kalaśān | ā | viveśa |
sāma | kṛṇvan | sāmanyaḥ | vipaḥ-cit | krandan | eti | abhi | sakhyuḥ | na | jāmim |
apa-ghnan | eṣi | pavamāna | śatrūn | priyām | na | jāraḥ | abhi-gītaḥ | induḥ |
sīdan | vaneṣu | śakunaḥ | na | patvā | somaḥ | punānaḥ | kalaśeṣu | sattā |
ā | te | rucaḥ | pavamānasya | soma | yoṣā-iva | yanti | su-dughāḥ | su-dhārāḥ |
hariḥ | ā-nītaḥ | puru-vāraḥ | ap-su | acikradat | kalaśe | deva-yūnām |
asya | preṣā | hemanā | pūyamānaḥ | devaḥ | devebhiḥ | sam | apṛkta | rasam |
sutaḥ | pavitram | pari | eti | rebhan | mitā-iva | sadma | paśu-manti | hotā |
bhadrā | vastrā | samanyā | vasānaḥ | mahān | kaviḥ | ni-vacanāni | śaṁsan |
ā | vacyasva | camvoḥ | pūyamānaḥ | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | jāgṛviḥ | deva-vītau |
sam | ūm̐ iti | priyaḥ | mṛjyate | sānau | avye | yaśaḥ-taraḥ | yaśasām | kṣaitaḥ | asme iti |
abhi | svara | dhanva | pūyamānaḥ | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | gāyata | abhi | arcāma | devān | somam | hinota | mahate | dhanāya |
svāduḥ | pavāte | ati | vāram | avyam | ā | sīdāti | kalaśam | deva-yuḥ | naḥ |
induḥ | devānām | upa | sakhyam | ā-yan | sahasra-dhāraḥ | pavate | madāya |
nṛ-bhiḥ | stavānaḥ | anu | dhāma | pūrvam | agan | indram | mahate | saubhagāya |
stotre | rāye | hariḥ | arṣa | punānaḥ | indram | madaḥ | gacchatu | te | bharāya |
devaiḥ | yāhi | sa-ratham | rādhaḥ | accha | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | kāvyam | uśanā-iva | bruvāṇaḥ | devaḥ | devānām | janima | vivakti |
mahi-vrataḥ | śuci-bandhuḥ | pāvakaḥ | padā | varāhaḥ | abhi | eti | rebhan |
pra | haṁsāsaḥ | tṛpalam | manyum | accha | amāt | astam | vṛṣa-gaṇāḥ | ayāsuḥ |
āṅgūṣyam | pavamānam | sakhāyaḥ | duḥ-marṣam | sākam | pra | vadanti | vāṇam |
saḥ | raṁhate | uru-gāyasya | jūtim | vṛthā | krīḻantam | mimate | na | gāvaḥ |
parīṇasam | kṛṇute | tigma-śṛṅgaḥ | divā | hariḥ | dadṛśe | naktam | ṛjraḥ |
induḥ | vājī | pavate | go-nyoghāḥ | indre | somaḥ | saha | invan | madāya |
hanti | rakṣaḥ | bādhate | pari | arātīḥ | varivaḥ | kṛṇvan | vṛjanasya | rājā |
adha | dhārayā | madhvā | pṛcānaḥ | tiraḥ | roma | pavate | adri-dugdhaḥ |
induḥ | indrasya | sakhyam | juṣāṇaḥ | devaḥ | devasya | matsaraḥ | madāya |
abhi | priyāṇi | pavate | punānaḥ | devaḥ | devān | svena | rasena | pṛñcan |
induḥ | dharmāṇi | ṛtu-thā | vasānaḥ | daśa | kṣipaḥ | avyata | sānau | avye |
vṛṣā | śoṇaḥ | abhi-kanikradat | gāḥ | nadayan | eti | pṛthivīm | uta | dyām |
indrasya-iva | vagnuḥ | ā | śṛṇve | ājau | pra-cetayan | arṣati | vācam | ā | imām |
rasāyyaḥ | payasā | pinvamānaḥ | īrayan | eṣi | madhu-mantam | aṁśum |
pavamānaḥ | sam-tanim | eṣi | kṛṇvan | indrāya | soma | pari-sicyamānaḥ |
eva | pavasva | madiraḥ | madāya | uda-grābhasya | namayan | vadha-snaiḥ |
pari | varṇam | bharamāṇaḥ | ruśantam | gavyuḥ | naḥ | arṣa | pari | soma | siktaḥ |
juṣṭvī | naḥ | indo iti | su-pathā | su-gāni | urau | pavasva | varivāṁsi | kṛṇvan |
ghanā-iva | viṣvak | duḥ-itāni | vi-ghnan | adhi | snunā | dhanva | sānau | avye |
vṛṣṭim | naḥ | arṣa | divyām | jigatnum | iḻā-vatīm | śam-gayīm | jīra-dānum |
stukā-iva | vītā | dhanva | vi-cinvan | bandhūn | imān | avarān | indo iti | vāyūn |
granthim | na | vi | sya | grathitam | punānaḥ | ṛjum | ca | gātum | vṛjinam | ca | soma |
atyaḥ | na | kradaḥ | hariḥ | ā | sṛjānaḥ | maryaḥ | deva | dhanva | pastya-vān |
juṣṭaḥ | madāya | deva-tāte | indo iti | pari | snunā | dhanva | sānau | avye |
sahasra-dhāraḥ | surabhiḥ | adabdhaḥ | pari | srava | vāja-sātau | nṛ-sahye |
araśmānaḥ | ye | arathāḥ | ayuktāḥ | atyāsaḥ | na | sasṛjānāsaḥ | ājau |
ete | śukrāsaḥ | dhanvanti | somāḥ | devāsaḥ | tān | upa | yāta | pibadhyai |
eva | naḥ | indo | abhi | deva-vītim | pari | srava | nabhaḥ | arṇaḥ | camūṣu |
somaḥ | asmabhyam | kāmyam | bṛhantam | rayim | dadātu | vīra-vantam | ugram |
takṣat | yadi | manasaḥ | venataḥ | vāk | jyeṣṭhasya | vā | dharmaṇi | kṣoḥ | anīke |
āt | īm | āyan | varam | ā | vāvaśānāḥ | juṣṭam | patim | kalaśe | gāvaḥ | indum |
pra | dānu-daḥ | divyaḥ | dānu-pinvaḥ | ṛtam | ṛtāya | pavate | su-medhāḥ |
dharmā | bhuvat | vṛjanyasya | rājā | pra | rāsmi-bhiḥ | daśa-bhiḥ | bhāri | bhūma |
pavitrebhiḥ | pavamānaḥ | nṛ-cakṣāḥ | rājā | devānām | uta | martyānām |
dvitā | bhuvat | rayi-patiḥ | rayīṇām | ṛtam | bharat | su-bhṛtam | cāru | induḥ |
arvān-iva | śravase | sātim | accha | indrasya | vāyoḥ | abhi | vītim | arṣa |
saḥ | naḥ | sahasrā | bṛhatīḥ | iṣaḥ | dāḥ | bhava | soma | draviṇaḥ-vit | punānaḥ |
deva-avyaḥ | naḥ | pari-sicyamānāḥ | kṣayam | su-vīram | dhanvantu | somāḥ |
ā-yajyavaḥ | su-matim | viśva-vārāḥ | hotāraḥ | na | divi-yajaḥ | mandra-tamāḥ |
eva | deva | deva-tāte | pavasva | mahe | soma | psarase | deva-pānaḥ |
mahaḥ | cit | hi | smasi | hitāḥ | sa-marye | kṛdhi | susthāne iti su-sthāne | rodasī iti | punānaḥ |
aśvaḥ | na | kradaḥ | vṛṣa-bhiḥ | yujānaḥ | siṁhaḥ | na | bhīmaḥ | manasaḥ | javīyān |
arvācīnaiḥ | pathi-bhiḥ | ye | rajiṣṭhāḥ | ā | pavasva | saumanasam | naḥ | indo iti |
śatam | dhārāḥ | deva-jātāḥ | asṛgran | sahasram | enāḥ | kavayaḥ | mṛjanti |
indo iti | sanitram | divaḥ | ā | pavasva | puraḥ-etā | asi | mahataḥ | dhanasya |
divaḥ | na | sargāḥ | asasṛgram | ahnām | rājā | na | mitram | pra | mināti | dhīraḥ |
pituḥ | na | putraḥ | kratu-bhiḥ | yatānaḥ | ā | pavasva | viśe | asyai | ajītim |
pra | te | dhārāḥ | madhu-matīḥ | asṛgran | vārān | yat | pūtaḥ | ati-eṣi | avyān |
pavamāna | pavase | dhāma | gonām | jajñānaḥ | sūryam | apinvaḥ | arkaiḥ |
kanikradat | anu | panthām | ṛtasya | śukraḥ | vi | bhāsi | amṛtasya | dhāma |
saḥ | indrāya | pavase | matsara-vān | hinvānaḥ | vācam | mati-bhiḥ | kavīnām |
divyaḥ | su-parṇaḥ | ava | cakṣi | soma | pinvan | dhārāḥ | karmaṇā | deva-vītau |
ā | indo iti | viśa | kalaśam | soma-dhānam | krandan | ihi | sūryasya | upa | raśmim |
tisraḥ | vācaḥ | īrayati | pra | vahniḥ | ṛtasya | dhītim | brahmaṇaḥ | manīṣām |
gāvaḥ | yanti | go-patim | pṛcchamānāḥ | somam | yanti | matayaḥ | vāvaśānāḥ |
somam | gāvaḥ | dhenavaḥ | vāvaśānāḥ | somam | viprāḥ | mati-bhiḥ | pṛcchamānāḥ |
somaḥ | sutaḥ | pūyate | ajyamānaḥ | some | arkāḥ | tri-stubhaḥ | sam | navante |
eva | naḥ | soma | pari-sicyamānaḥ | ā | pavasva | pūyamānaḥ | svasti |
indram | ā | viśa | bṛhatā | raveṇa | vardhaya | vācam | janaya | puram-dhim |
ā | jāgṛviḥ | vipraḥ | ṛtā | matīnām | somaḥ | punānaḥ | asadat | camūṣu |
sapanti | yam | mithunāsaḥ | ni-kāmāḥ | adhvaryavaḥ | rathirāsaḥ | su-hastāḥ |
saḥ | punānaḥ | upa | sūre | na | dhātā | ā | ubhe iti | aprāḥ | rodasī iti | vi | saḥ | āvarityāvaḥ |
priyā | cit | yasya | priyasāsaḥ | ūtī | saḥ | tu | dhanam | kāriṇe | na | pra | yaṁsat |
saḥ | vardhitā | vardhanaḥ | pūyamānaḥ | somaḥ | mīḍhvān | abhi | naḥ | jyotiṣā | āvīt |
yena | naḥ | pūrve | pitaraḥ | pada-jñāḥ | svaḥ-vidaḥ | abhi | gāḥ | adrim | uṣṇan |
akrān | samudraḥ | prathame | vi-dharman | janayan | pra-jāḥ | bhuvanasya | rājā |
vṛṣā | pavitre | adhi | sānau | avye | bṛhat | somaḥ | vavṛdhe | suvānaḥ | induḥ |
mahat | tat | somaḥ | mahiṣaḥ | cakāra | apām | yat | garbhaḥ | avṛṇīta | devān |
adadhāt | indre | pavamānaḥ | ojaḥ | ajanayat | sūrye | jyotiḥ | induḥ |
matsi | vāyum | iṣṭaye | rādhase | ca | matsi | mitrāvaruṇā | pūyamānaḥ |
matsi | śardhaḥ | mārutam | matsi | devān | matsi | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | deva | soma |
ṛjuḥ | pavasva | vṛjinasya | hantā | apa | amīvām | bādhamānaḥ | mṛdhaḥ | ca |
abhi-śrīṇan | payaḥ | payasā | abhi | gonām | indrasya | tvam | tava | vayam | sakhāyaḥ |
madhvaḥ | sūdam | pavasva | vasvaḥ | utsam | vīram | ca | naḥ | ā | pavasva | bhagam | ca |
svadasva | indrāya | pavamānaḥ | indo iti | rayim | ca | naḥ | ā | pavasva | samudrāt |
somaḥ | sutaḥ | dhārayā | atyaḥ | na | hitvā | sindhuḥ | na | nimnam | abhi | vājī | akṣāriti |
ā | yonim | vanyam | asadat | punānaḥ | sam | induḥ | gobhiḥ | asarat | sam | at-bhiḥ |
eṣaḥ | syaḥ | te | pavate | indra | somaḥ | camūṣu | dhīraḥ | uśate | tavasvān |
svaḥ-cakṣāḥ | rathiraḥ | satya-śuṣmaḥ | kāmaḥ | na | yaḥ | deva-yatām | asarji |
eṣaḥ | pratnena | vayasā | punānaḥ | tiraḥ | varpāṁsi | duhituḥ | dadhānaḥ |
vasānaḥ | śarma | tri-varūtham | ap-su | hotā-iva | yāti | samaneṣu | rebhan |
nu | naḥ | tvam | rathiraḥ | deva | soma | pari | srava | camvoḥ | pūyamānaḥ |
ap-su | svādiṣṭhaḥ | madhu-mān | ṛta-vā | devaḥ | na | yaḥ | savitā | satya-manmā |
abhi | vāyum | vītī | arṣa | gṛṇānaḥ | abhi | mitrāvaruṇā | pūyamānaḥ |
abhi | naram | dhī-javanam | rathe-sthām | abhi | indram | vṛṣaṇam | vajra-bāhum |
abhi | vastrā | su-vasanāni | arṣa | abhi | dhenūḥ | su-dughāḥ | pūyamānaḥ |
abhi | candrā | bhartave | naḥ | hiraṇyā | abhi | aśvān | rathinaḥ | deva | soma |
abhi | naḥ | arṣa | divyā | vasūni | abhi | viśvā | pārthivā | pūyamānaḥ |
abhi | yena | draviṇam | aśnavāma | abhi | ārṣeyam | jamadagni-vat | naḥ |
ayā | pavā | pavasva | enā | vasūni | mām̐ścatve | indo iti | sarasi | pra | dhanva |
bradhnaḥ | cit | atra | vātaḥ | na | jūtaḥ | puru-medhaḥ | cit | takave | naram | dāt |
uta | naḥ | enā | pavayā | pavasva | adhi | śrute | śravāyyasya | tīrthe |
ṣaṣṭim | sahasrā | naigutaḥ | vasūni | vṛkṣam | na | pakvam | dhūnavat | raṇāya |
mahi | ime iti | asya | vṛṣanāma | śūṣe iti | mām̐ścatve | vā | pṛśane | vā | vadhatre iti |
asvāpayat | ni-gutaḥ | snehayat | ca | apa | amitrān | apa | acitaḥ | aca | itaḥ |
sam | trī | pavitrā | vi-tatāni | eṣi | anu | ekam | dhāvasi | pūyamānaḥ |
asi | bhagaḥ | asi | dātrasya | dātā | asi | magha-vā | maghavat-bhyaḥ | indo iti |
eṣaḥ | viśva-vit | pavate | manīṣī | somaḥ | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājā |
drapsān | īrayan | vidatheṣu | induḥ | vi | vāram | avyam | samayā | ati | yāti |
indum | rihanti | mahiṣāḥ | adabdhāḥ | pade | rebhanti | kavayaḥ | na | gṛdhrāḥ |
hinvanti | dhīrāḥ | daśa-bhiḥ | kṣipābhiḥ | sam | añjate | rūpam | apām | rasena |
tvayā | vayam | pavamānena | soma | bhare | kṛtam | vi | cinuyāma | śaśvat |
tat | naḥ | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mamahantām | aditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
abhi | naḥ | vāja-sātamam | rayim | arṣa | puru-spṛham |
indo iti | sahasra-bharṇasam | tuvi-dyumnam | vibhva-saham |
pari | syaḥ | suvānaḥ | avyayam | rathe | na | varma | avyata |
induḥ | abhi | druṇā | hitaḥ | hiyānaḥ | dhārābhiḥ | akṣāriti |
pari | syaḥ | suvānaḥ | akṣāriti | induḥ | avye | mada-cyutaḥ |
dhārā | yaḥ | ūrdhvaḥ | adhvare | bhrājā | na | eti | gavya-yuḥ |
saḥ | hi | tvam | deva | śaśvate | vasu | martāya | dāśuṣe |
indo iti | sahasriṇam | rayim | śata-ātmānam | vivāsasi |
vayam | te | asya | vṛtra-han | vaso iti | vasvaḥ | puru-spṛhaḥ |
ni | nediṣṭha-tamāḥ | iṣaḥ | syāma | sumnasya | adhrigo ityadhri-go |
dviḥ | yam | pañca | sva-yaśasam | svasāraḥ | adri-saṁhatam |
priyam | indrasya | kāmyam | pra-snāpayanti | ūrmiṇam |
pari | tyam | haryatam | harim | babhrum | punanti | vāreṇa |
yaḥ | devān | viśvān | it | pari | madena | saha | gacchati |
asya | vaḥ | hi | avasā | pāntaḥ | dakṣa-sādhanam |
yaḥ | sūriṣu | śravaḥ | bṛhat | dadhe | svaḥ | na | haryataḥ |
saḥ | vām | yajñeṣu | mānavī iti | induḥ | janiṣṭa | rodasī iti |
devaḥ | devī iti | giri-sthāḥ | asredhan | tam | tuvi-svani |
indrāya | soma | pātave | vṛtra-ghne | pari | sicyase |
nare | ca | dakṣiṇā-vate | devāya | sadana-sade |
te | pratnāsaḥ | vi-uṣṭiṣu | somāḥ | pavitre | akṣaran |
apa-prothantaḥ | sanutaḥ | huraḥ-citaḥ | prātariti | tān | apra-cetasaḥ |
tam | sakhāyaḥ | puraḥ-rucam | yūyam | vayam | ca | sūrayaḥ |
aśyāma | vāja-gandhyam | sanema | vāja-pastyam |
ā | haryatāya | dhṛṣṇave | dhanuḥ | tanvanti | pauṁsyam |
śukrām | vayanti | asurāya | niḥ-nijam | vipām | agre | mahīyuvaḥ |
adha | kṣapā | pari-kṛtaḥ | vājān | abhi | pra | gāhate |
yadi | vivasvataḥ | dhiyaḥ | harim | hinvanti | yātave |
tam | asya | marjayāmasi | madaḥ | yaḥ | indra-pātamaḥ |
yam | gāvaḥ | āsa-bhiḥ | dadhuḥ | purā | nūnam | ca | sūrayaḥ |
tam | gāthayā | purāṇyā | punānam | abhi | anūṣata |
uto iti | kṛpanta | dhītayaḥ | devānām | nāma | bibhratīḥ |
tam | ukṣamāṇam | avyaye | vāre | punanti | dharṇasim |
dūtam | na | pūrva-cittaye | ā | śāsate | manīṣiṇaḥ |
saḥ | punānaḥ | madin-tamaḥ | somaḥ | camūṣu | sīdati |
paśau | na | retaḥ | ā-dadhat | patiḥ | vacasyate | dhiyaḥ |
saḥ | mṛjyate | sukarma-bhiḥ | devaḥ | devebhyaḥ | sutaḥ |
vide | yat | āsu | sam-dadiḥ | mahīḥ | apaḥ | vi | gāhate |
sutaḥ | indo iti | pavitre | ā | nṛ-bhiḥ | yataḥ | vi | nīyase |
indrāya | matsarin-tamaḥ | camūṣu | ā | ni | sīdasi |
abhi | navante | adruhaḥ | priyam | indrasya | kāmyam |
vatsam | na | pūrve | āyuni | jātam | rihanti | mātaraḥ |
punānaḥ | indo iti | ā | bhara | soma | dvi-barhasam | rayim |
tvam | vasūni | puṣyasi | viśvāni | dāśuṣaḥ | gṛhe |
tvam | dhiyam | manaḥ-yujam | sṛja | vṛṣṭim | na | tanyatuḥ |
tvam | vasūni | pārthivā | divyā | ca | soma | puṣyasi |
pari | te | jigyuṣaḥ | yathā | dhārā | sutasya | dhāvati |
raṁhamāṇā | vi | avyayam | vāram | vājī-iva | sānasiḥ |
kratve | dakṣāya | naḥ | kave | pavasva | soma | dhārayā |
indrāya | pātave | sutaḥ | mitrāya | varuṇāya | ca |
pavasva | vāja-sātamaḥ | pavitre | dhārayā | sutaḥ |
indrāya | soma | viṣṇave | devebhyaḥ | madhumat-tamaḥ |
tvām | rihanti | mātaraḥ | harim | pavitre | adruhaḥ |
vatsam | jātam | na | dhenavaḥ | pavamāna | vi-dharmaṇi |
pavamāna | mahi | śravaḥ | citrebhiḥ | yāsi | raśmi-bhiḥ |
śardhan | tamāṁsi | jighnase | viśvāni | dāśuṣaḥ | gṛhe |
tvam | dyām | ca | mahi-vrata | pṛthivīm | ca | ati | jabhriṣe |
prati | drāpim | amuñcathāḥ | pavamāna | mahi-tvanā |
puraḥ-jitī | vaḥ | andhasaḥ | sutāya | mādayitnave |
apa | śvānam | śnathiṣṭana | sakhāyaḥ | dīrgha-jihvyam |
yaḥ | dhārayā | pāvakayā | pari-prasyandate | sutaḥ |
induḥ | aśvaḥ | na | kṛtvyaḥ |
tam | duroṣam | abhi | naraḥ | somam | viśvācyā | dhiyā |
yajñam | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ |
sutāsaḥ | madhumat-tamāḥ | somāḥ | indrāya | mandinaḥ |
pavitra-vantaḥ | akṣaran | devān | gacchantu | vaḥ | madāḥ |
induḥ | indrāya | pavate | iti | devāsaḥ | abruvan |
vācaḥ | patiḥ | makhasyate | viśvasya | īśānaḥ | ojasā |
sahasra-dhāraḥ | pavate | samudraḥ | vācam-īṅkhayaḥ |
somaḥ | patiḥ | rayīṇām | sakhā | indrasya | dive-dive |
ayam | pūṣā | rayiḥ | bhagaḥ | somaḥ | punānaḥ | arṣati |
patiḥ | viśvasya | bhūmanaḥ | vi | akhyat | rodasī iti | ubhe iti |
sam | ūm̐ iti | priyāḥ | anūṣata | gāvaḥ | madāya | ghṛṣvayaḥ |
somāsaḥ | kṛṇvate | pathaḥ | pavamānāsaḥ | indavaḥ |
yaḥ | ojiṣṭhaḥ | tam | ā | bhara | pavamāna | śravāyyam |
yaḥ | pañca | carṣaṇīḥ | abhi | rayim | yena | vanāmahai |
somāḥ | pavante | indavaḥ | asmabhyam | gātuvit-tamāḥ |
mitrāḥ | suvānāḥ | arepasaḥ | su-ādhyaḥ | svaḥ-vidaḥ |
susvāṇāsaḥ | vi | adri-bhiḥ | citānāḥ | goḥ | adhi | tvaci |
iṣam | asmabhyam | abhitaḥ | sam | asvaran | vasu-vidaḥ |
ete | pūtāḥ | vipaḥ-citaḥ | somāsaḥ | dadhi-āśiraḥ |
sūryāsaḥ | na | darśatāsaḥ | jigatnavaḥ | dhruvāḥ | ghṛte |
pra | sunvānasya | andhasaḥ | martaḥ | na | vṛta | tat | vacaḥ |
apa | śvānam | arādhasam | hata | makham | na | bhṛgavaḥ |
ā | jāmiḥ | atke | avyata | bhuje | na | putraḥ | oṇyoḥ |
sarat | jāraḥ | na | yoṣaṇām | varaḥ | na | yonim | ā-sadam |
saḥ | vīraḥ | dakṣa-sādhanaḥ | vi | yaḥ | tastambha | rodasī iti |
hariḥ | pavitre | avyata | vedhāḥ | na | yonim | ā-sadam |
avyaḥ | vārebhiḥ | pavate | somaḥ | gavye | adhi | tvaci |
kanikradat | vṛṣā | hariḥ | indrasya | abhi | eti | niḥ-kṛtam |
krāṇā | śiśuḥ | mahīnām | hinvan | ṛtasya | dīdhitim |
viśvā | pari | priyā | bhuvat | adha | dvitā |
upa | tritasya | pāṣyoḥ | abhakta | yat | guhā | padam |
yajñasya | sapta | dhāma-bhiḥ | adha | priyam |
trīṇi | tritasya | dhārayā | pṛṣṭheṣu | ā | īraya | rayim |
mimīte | asya | yojanā | vi | su-kratuḥ |
jajñānam | sapta | mātaraḥ | vedhām | aśāsata | śriye |
ayam | dhruvaḥ | rayīṇām | ciketa | yat |
asya | vrate | sa-joṣasaḥ | viśve | devāsaḥ | adruhaḥ |
spārhāḥ | bhavanti | rantayaḥ | juṣanta | yat |
yam | īmiti | garbham | ṛta-vṛdhaḥ | dṛśe | cārum | ajījanan |
kavim | maṁhiṣṭham | adhvare | puru-spṛham |
samīcīne iti sam-īcīne | abhi | tmanā | yahvī iti | ṛtasya | mātarā |
tanvānāḥ | yajñam | ānuṣak | yat | añjate |
kratvā | śukrebhiḥ | akṣa-bhiḥ | ṛṇoḥ | apa | vrajam | divaḥ |
hinvan | ṛtasya | dīditim | pra | adhvare |
pra | punānāya | vedhase | somāya | vacaḥ | ut-yatam |
bhṛtim | na | bhara | mati-bhiḥ | jujoṣate |
pari | vārāṇi | avyayā | gobhiḥ | añjānaḥ | arṣati |
trī | sadha-sthā | punānaḥ | kṛṇute | hariḥ |
pari | kośam | madhu-ścutam | avyaye | vāre | arṣati |
abhi | vāṇīḥ | ṛṣīṇām | sapta | nūṣata |
pari | netā | matīnām | viśva-devaḥ | adābhyaḥ |
somaḥ | punānaḥ | camvoḥ | viśat | hariḥ |
pari | daivīḥ | anu | svadhāḥ | indreṇa | yāhi | sa-ratham |
punānaḥ | vāghat | vāghat-bhiḥ | amartyaḥ |
pari | saptiḥ | na | vāja-yuḥ | devaḥ | devebhyaḥ | sutaḥ |
vi-ānaśiḥ | pavamānaḥ | vi | dhāvati |
sakhāyaḥ | ā | ni | sīdata | punānāya | pra | gāyata |
śiśum | na | yajñaiḥ | pari | bhūṣata | śriye |
sam | īmiti | vatsam | na | mātṛ-bhiḥ | sṛjata | gaya-sādhanam |
deva-avyam | madam | abhi | dvi-śavasam |
punāta | dakṣa-sādhanam | yathā | śardhāya | vītaye |
yathā | mitrāya | varuṇāya | śam-tamaḥ |
asmabhyam | tvā | vasu-vidam | abhi | vāṇīḥ | anūṣata |
gobhiḥ | te | varṇam | abhi | vāsayāmasi |
saḥ | naḥ | madānām | pate | indo iti | deva-psarāḥ | asi |
sakhā-iva | sakhye | gātuvit-tamaḥ | bhava |
sanemi | kṛdhi | asmat | ā | rakṣasam | kam | cit | atriṇam |
apa | adevam | dvayum | aṁhaḥ | yuyodhi | naḥ |
tam | vaḥ | sakhāyaḥ | madāya | punānam | abhi | gāyata |
śiśum | na | yajñaiḥ | svadayanta | gūrti-bhiḥ |
sam | vatsaḥ-iva | mātṛ-bhiḥ | induḥ | hinvānaḥ | ajyate |
deva-avīḥ | madaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | pari-kṛtaḥ |
ayam | dakṣāya | sādhanaḥ | ayam | śardhāya | vītaye |
ayam | devebhyaḥ | madhumat-tamaḥ | sutaḥ |
go-mat | naḥ | indo iti | aśva-vat | sutaḥ | su-dakṣa | dhanva |
śucim | te | varṇam | adhi | goṣu | dīdharam |
saḥ | naḥ | harīṇām | pate | indo iti | devapsaraḥ-tamaḥ |
sakhā-iva | sakhye | naryaḥ | ruce | bhava |
sanemi | tvam | asmat | ā | adevam | kam | cit | atriṇam |
sāhvān | indo iti | pari | bādhaḥ | apa | dvayum |
indram | accha | sutāḥ | ime | vṛṣaṇam | yantu | harayaḥ |
śruṣṭī | jātāsaḥ | indavaḥ | svaḥ-vidaḥ |
ayam | bharāya | sānasiḥ | indrāya | pavate | sutaḥ |
somaḥ | jaitrasya | cetati | yathā | vide |
asya | it | indraḥ | madeṣu | ā | grābham | gṛbhṇīta | sānasim |
vajram | ca | vṛṣaṇam | bharat | sam | apsu-jit |
pra | dhanva | soma | jāgṛviḥ | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
dyu-mantam | śuṣmam | ā | bhara | svaḥ-vidam |
indrāya | vṛṣaṇam | madam | pavasva | viśva-darśataḥ |
sahasra-yāmā | pathi-kṛt | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ |
asmabhyam | gātuvit-tamaḥ | devebhyaḥ | madhumat-tamaḥ |
sahasram | yāhi | pathi-bhiḥ | kanikradat |
pavasva | deva-vītaye | indo iti | dhārābhiḥ | ojasā |
ā | kalaśam | madhu-mān | soma | naḥ | sadaḥ |
tava | drapsāḥ | uda-prutaḥ | indram | madāya | vavṛdhuḥ |
tvām | devāsaḥ | amṛtāya | kam | papuḥ |
ā | naḥ | sutāsaḥ | indavaḥ | punānāḥ | dhāvata | rayim |
vṛṣṭi-dyāvaḥ | rīti-āpaḥ | svaḥ-vidaḥ |
somaḥ | punānaḥ | ūrmiṇā | avyaḥ | vāram | vi | dhāvati |
agre | vācaḥ | pavamānaḥ | kanikradat |
dhībhiḥ | hinvanti | vājinam | vane | krīḻantam | ati-avim |
abhi | tri-pṛṣṭham | matayaḥ | sam | asvaran |
asarji | kalaśān | abhi | mīḻhe | saptiḥ | na | vāja-yuḥ |
punānaḥ | vācam | janayan | asisyadat |
pavate | haryataḥ | hariḥ | ati | hvarāṁsi | raṁhyā |
abhi-arṣan | stotṛ-bhyaḥ | vīra-vat | yaśaḥ |
ayā | pavasva | deva-yuḥ | madhoḥ | dhārāḥ | asṛkṣata |
rebhan | pavitram | pari | eṣi | viśvataḥ |
pari | itaḥ | siñcata | sutam | somaḥ | yaḥ | ut-tamam | haviḥ |
dadhanvān | yaḥ | naryaḥ | ap-su | antaḥ | ā | susāva | somam | adri-bhiḥ |
nūnam | punānaḥ | avi-bhiḥ | pari | srava | adabdhaḥ | surabhim-taraḥ |
sute | cit | tvā | ap-su | mādāmaḥ | andhasā | śrīṇantaḥ | gobhiḥ | ut-taram |
pari | suvānaḥ | cakṣase | deva-mādanaḥ | kratuḥ | induḥ | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ |
punānaḥ | soma | dhārayā | apaḥ | vasānaḥ | arṣasi |
ā | ratna-dhāḥ | yonim | ṛtasya | sīdasi | utsaḥ | deva | hiraṇyayaḥ |
duhānaḥ | ūdhaḥ | divyam | madhu | priyam | pratnam | sadha-stham | ā | asadat |
ā-pṛcchyam | dharuṇam | vājī | arṣati | nṛ-bhiḥ | dhūtaḥ | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ |
punānaḥ | soma | jāgṛviḥ | avyaḥ | vāre | pari | priyaḥ |
tvam | vipraḥ | abhavaḥ | aṅgiraḥ-tamaḥ | madhvā | yajñam | mimikṣa | naḥ |
somaḥ | mīḍhvān | pavate | gātuvit-tamaḥ | ṛṣiḥ | vipraḥ | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ |
tvam | kaviḥ | abhavaḥ | deva-vītamaḥ | ā | sūryam | rohayaḥ | divi |
somaḥ | ūm̐ iti | suvānaḥ | sotṛ-bhiḥ | adhi | snu-bhiḥ | avīnām |
aśvayā-iva | haritā | yāti | dhārayā | mandrayā | yāti | dhārayā |
anūpe | go-mān | gobhiḥ | akṣāriti | somaḥ | dugdhābhiḥ | akṣāriti |
samudram | na | sam-varaṇāni | agman | mandī | madāya | tośate |
ā | soma | suvānaḥ | adri-bhiḥ | tiraḥ | vārāṇi | avyayā |
janaḥ | na | puri | camvoḥ | viśat | hariḥ | sadaḥ | vaneṣu | dadhiṣe |
saḥ | mamṛje | tiraḥ | aṇvāni | meṣyaḥ | mīḻhe | saptiḥ | na | vāja-yuḥ |
anu-mādyaḥ | pavamānaḥ | manīṣi-bhiḥ | somaḥ | viprebhiḥ | ṛkva-bhiḥ |
pra | soma | deva-vītaye | sindhuḥ | na | pipye | arṇasā |
aṁśoḥ | payasā | madiraḥ | na | jāgṛviḥ | accha | kośam | madhu-ścutam |
ā | haryataḥ | arjune | atke | avyata | priyaḥ | sūnuḥ | na | marjyaḥ |
tam | īm | hinvanti | apasaḥ | yathā | ratham | nadīṣu | ā | gabhastyoḥ |
abhi | somāsaḥ | āyavaḥ | pavante | madyam | madam |
samudrasya | adhi | viṣṭapi | manīṣiṇaḥ | matsarāsaḥ | svaḥ-vidaḥ |
tarat | samudram | pavamānaḥ | ūrmiṇā | rājā | devaḥ | ṛtam | bṛhat |
arṣat | mitrasya | varuṇasya | dharmaṇā | pra | hinvānaḥ | ṛtam | bṛhat |
nṛ-bhiḥ | yemānaḥ | haryataḥ | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | rājā | devaḥ | samudriyaḥ |
indrāya | pavate | madaḥ | somaḥ | marutvate | sutaḥ |
sahasra-dhāraḥ | ati | avyam | arṣati | tam | īmiti | mṛjanti | āyavaḥ |
punānaḥ | camū iti | janayan | matim | kaviḥ | somaḥ | deveṣu | raṇyati |
apaḥ | vasānaḥ | pari | gobhiḥ | ut-taraḥ | sīdan | vaneṣu | avyata |
tava | aham | soma | raraṇa | sakhye | indo iti | dive-dive |
purūṇi | babhro iti | ni | caranti | mām | ava | pari-dhīn | ati | tān | ihi |
uta | aham | naktam | uta | soma | te | divā | sakhyāya | babhro iti | ūdhani |
ghṛṇā | tapantam | ati | sūryam | paraḥ | śakunāḥ-iva | paptima |
mṛjyamānaḥ | su-hastya | samudre | vācam | invasi |
rayim | piśaṅgam | bahulam | puru-spṛham | pavamāna | abhi | arṣasi |
mṛjānaḥ | vāre | pavamānaḥ | avyaye | vṛṣā | ava | cakradaḥ | vane |
devānām | soma | pavamāna | niḥ-kṛtam | gobhiḥ | añjānaḥ | arṣasi |
pavasva | vāja-sātaye | abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā |
tvam | samudram | prathamaḥ | vi | dhārayaḥ | devebhyaḥ | soma | matsaraḥ |
saḥ | tu | pavasva | pari | pārthivam | rajaḥ | divyā | ca | soma | dharma-bhiḥ |
tvām | viprāsaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | vi-cakṣaṇa | śubhram | hinvanti | dhīti-bhiḥ |
pavamānāḥ | asṛkṣata | pavitram | ati | dhārayā |
marutvantaḥ | matsarāḥ | indriyāḥ | hayāḥ | medhām | abhi | prayāṁsi | ca |
apaḥ | vasānaḥ | pari | kośam | arṣati | induḥ | hiyānaḥ | sotṛ-bhiḥ |
janayan | jyotiḥ | mandanāḥ | avīvaśat | gāḥ | kṛṇvānaḥ | na | niḥ-nijam |
pavasva | madhumat-tamaḥ | indrāya | soma | kratuvit-tamaḥ | madaḥ |
mahi | dyukṣa-tamaḥ | madaḥ |
yasya | te | pītvā | vṛṣabhaḥ | vṛṣa-yate | asya | pītā | svaḥ-vidaḥ |
saḥ | su-praketaḥ | abhi | akramīt | iṣaḥ | accha | vājam | na | etaśaḥ |
tvam | hi | aṅga | daivyā | pavamāna | janimāni | dyumat-tamaḥ |
amṛta-tvāya | ghoṣayaḥ |
yena | nava-gvaḥ | dadhyaṅ | apa-ūrṇute | yena | viprāsaḥ | āpire |
devānām | sumne | amṛtasya | cāruṇaḥ | yena | śravāṁsi | ānaśuḥ |
eṣaḥ | syaḥ | dhārayā | sutaḥ | avyaḥ | vārebhiḥ | pavate | madin-tamaḥ |
krīḻan | ūrmiḥ | apām-iva |
yaḥ | usriyāḥ | apyāḥ | antaḥ | aśmanaḥ | niḥ | gāḥ | akṛntat | ojasā |
abhi | vrajam | tatniṣe | gavyam | aśvyam | varmī-iva | dhṛṣṇo iti | ā | ruja |
ā | sota | pari | siñcata | aśvam | na | stomam | ap-turam | rajaḥ-turam |
vana-krakṣam | uda-prutam |
sahasra-dhāram | vṛṣabham | payaḥ-vṛdham | priyam | devāya | janmane |
ṛtena | yaḥ | ṛta-jātaḥ | vi-vavṛdhe | rājā | devaḥ | ṛtam | bṛhat |
abhi | dyumnam | bṛhat | yaśaḥ | iṣaḥ | pate | didīhi | deva | deva-yuḥ |
vi | kośam | madhyamam | yuva |
ā | vacyasva | su-dakṣa | camvoḥ | sutaḥ | viśām | vahniḥ | na | viśpatiḥ |
vṛṣṭim | divaḥ | pavasva | rītim | apām | jinva | go-iṣṭaye | dhiyaḥ |
etam | ūm̐ iti | tyam | mada-cyutam | sahasra-dhāram | vṛṣabham | divaḥ | duhuḥ |
viśvā | vasūni | bibhratam |
vṛṣā | vi | jajñe | janayan | amartyaḥ | pra-tapan | jyotiṣā | tamaḥ |
saḥ | su-stutaḥ | kavi-bhiḥ | niḥ-nijam | dadhe | tri-dhātu | asya | daṁsasā |
saḥ | sunve | yaḥ | vasūnām | yaḥ | rāyām | ā-netā | yaḥ | iḻānām |
somaḥ | yaḥ | su-kṣitīnām |
yasya | naḥ | indraḥ | pibāt | yasya | marutaḥ | yasya | vā | aryamaṇā | bhagaḥ |
ā | yena | mitrāvaruṇā | karāmahe | ā | indram | avase | mahe |
indrāya | soma | pātave | nṛ-bhiḥ | yataḥ | su-āyudhaḥ | madin-tamaḥ |
pavasva | madhumat-tamaḥ |
indrasya | hārdi | soma-dhānam | ā | viśa | samudram-iva | sindhavaḥ |
juṣṭaḥ | mitrāya | varuṇāya | vāyave | divaḥ | viṣṭambhaḥ | ut-tamaḥ |
pari | pra | dhanva | indrāya | soma | svāduḥ | mitrāya | pūṣṇe | bhagāya |
indraḥ | te | soma | sutasya | peyāḥ | kratve | dakṣāya | viśve | ca | devāḥ |
eva | amṛtāya | mahe | kṣayāya | saḥ | śukraḥ | arṣa | divyaḥ | pīyūṣaḥ |
pavasva | soma | mahān | samudraḥ | pitā | devānām | viśvā | abhi | dhāma |
śukraḥ | pavasva | devebhyaḥ | soma | dive | pṛthivyai | śam | ca | pra-jāyai |
divaḥ | dhartā | asi | śukraḥ | pīyūṣaḥ | satye | vi-dharman | vājī | pavasva |
pavasva | soma | dyumnī | su-dhāraḥ | mahām | avīnām | anu | pūrvyaḥ |
nṛ-bhiḥ | yemānaḥ | jajñānaḥ | pūtaḥ | kṣarat | viśvāni | mandraḥ | svaḥ-vit |
induḥ | punānaḥ | pra-jām | urāṇaḥ | karat | viśvāni | draviṇāni | naḥ |
pavasva | soma | kratve | dakṣāya | aśvaḥ | na | niktaḥ | vājī | dhanāya |
tam | te | sotāraḥ | rasam | madāya | punanti | somam | mahe | dyumnāya |
śiśum | jajñānam | harim | mṛjanti | pavitre | somam | devebhyaḥ | indum |
induḥ | paviṣṭa | cāruḥ | madāya | apām | upa-sthe | kaviḥ | bhagāya |
bibharti | cāru | indrasya | nāma | yena | viśvāni | vṛtrā | jaghāna |
pibanti | asya | viśve | devāsaḥ | gobhiḥ | śrītasya | nṛ-bhiḥ | sutasya |
pra | suvānaḥ | akṣāriti | sahasra-dhāraḥ | tiraḥ | pavitram | vi | vāram | avyam |
saḥ | vājī | akṣāriti | sahasra-retāḥ | at-bhiḥ | mṛjānaḥ | gobhiḥ | śrīṇānaḥ |
pra | soma | yāhi | indrasya | kukṣā | nṛ-bhiḥ | yemānaḥ | adri-bhiḥ | sutaḥ |
asarji | vājī | tiraḥ | pavitram | indrāya | somaḥ | sahasra-dhāraḥ |
añjanti | enam | madhvaḥ | rasena | indrāya | vṛṣṇe | indum | madāya |
devebhyaḥ | tvā | vṛthā | pājase | apaḥ | vasānam | harim | mṛjanti |
induḥ | indrāya | tośate | ni | tośate | śrīṇan | ugraḥ | riṇan | apaḥ |
pari | ūm̐ iti | su | pra | dhanva | vāja-sātaye | pari | vṛtrāṇi | sakṣaṇiḥ |
dviṣaḥ | taradhyai | ṛṇa-yāḥ | naḥ | īyase |
anu | hi | tvā | sutam | soma | madāmasi | mahe | samarya-rājye |
vājān | abhi | pavamāna | pra | gāhase |
ajījanaḥ | hi | pavamāna | sūryam | vi-dhāre | śakmanā | payaḥ |
go-jīrayā | raṁhamāṇaḥ | purandhyā |
ajījanaḥ | amṛta | martyeṣu | ā | ṛtasya | dharman | amṛtasya | cāruṇaḥ |
sadā | asaraḥ | vājam | accha | sanisyadat |
abhi-abhi | hi | śravasā | tatarditha | utsam | na | kam | cit | jana-pānam | akṣitam |
śaryābhiḥ | na | bharamāṇaḥ | gabhastyoḥ |
āt | īm | ke | cit | paśyamānāsaḥ | āpyam | vasu-rucaḥ | divyāḥ | abhi | anūṣata |
vāram | na | devaḥ | savitā | vi | ūrṇute |
tve iti | soma | prathamāḥ | vṛkta-barhiṣaḥ | mahe | vājāya | śravase | dhiyam | dadhuḥ |
saḥ | tvam | naḥ | vīra | vīryāya | codaya |
divaḥ | pīyūṣam | pūrvyam | yat | ukthyam | mahaḥ | gāhāt | divaḥ | ā | niḥ | adhukṣata |
indram | abhi | jāyamānam | sam | asvaran |
adha | yat | ime iti | pavamāna | rodasī iti | imā | ca | viśvā | bhuvanā | abhi | majmanā |
yūthe | na | niḥ-sthāḥ | vṛṣabhaḥ | vi | tiṣṭhase |
somaḥ | punānaḥ | avyaye | vāre | śiśuḥ | na | krīḻan | pavamānaḥ | akṣāriti |
sahasra-dhāraḥ | śata-vājaḥ | induḥ |
eṣaḥ | punānaḥ | madhu-mān | ṛta-vā | indrāya | induḥ | pavate | svāduḥ | ūrmiḥ |
vāja-saniḥ | varivaḥ-vit | vayaḥ-dhāḥ |
saḥ | pavasva | sahamānaḥ | pṛtanyūn | sedhan | rakṣāṁsi | apa | duḥ-gahāṇi |
su-āyudhaḥ | sasahvān | soma | śatrūn |
ayā | rucā | hariṇyā | punānaḥ | viśvā | dveṣāṁsi | tarati | svayugva-bhiḥ | sūraḥ | na | svayugva-bhiḥ |
dhārā | sutasya | rocate | punānaḥ | aruṣaḥ | hariḥ |
viśvā | yat | rūpā | pari-yāti | ṛkva-bhiḥ | sapta-āsyebhiḥ | ṛkva-bhiḥ |
tvam | tyat | paṇīnām | vidaḥ | vasu | sam | mātṛ-bhiḥ | marjayasi | sve | ā | dame | ṛtasya | dhīti-bhiḥ | dame |
parā-vataḥ | na | sāma | tat | yatra | raṇanti | dhītayaḥ |
tridhātu-bhiḥ | aruṣībhiḥ | vayaḥ | dadhe | rocamānaḥ | vayaḥ | dadhe |
pūrvām | anu | pra-diśam | yāti | cekitat | sam | raśmi-bhiḥ | yatate | darśataḥ | rathaḥ | daivyaḥ | darśataḥ | rathaḥ |
agman | ukthāni | pauṁsyā | indram | jaitrāya | harṣayan |
vajraḥ | ca | yat | bhavathaḥ | anapa-cyutā | samat-su | anapa-cyutā |
nānānam | vai | ūm̐ iti | naḥ | dhiyaḥ | vi | vratāni | janānām |
takṣā | riṣṭam | rutam | bhiṣak | brahmā | sunvantam | icchati | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
jaratībhiḥ | oṣadhībhiḥ | parṇebhiḥ | śakunānām |
kārmāraḥ | aśma-bhiḥ | dyu-bhiḥ | hiraṇya-vantam | icchati | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
kāruḥ | aham | tataḥ | bhiṣak | upala-prakṣiṇī | nanā |
nānā-dhiyaḥ | vasu-yavaḥ | anu | gāḥ-iva | tasthima | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
aśvaḥ | voḻhā | su-kham | ratham | hasanām | upa-mantriṇaḥ |
śepaḥ | romaṇ-vantau | bhedau | vāḥ | it | maṇḍūkaḥ | icchati | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
śaryaṇā-vati | somam | indraḥ | pibatu | vṛtra-hā |
balam | dadhānaḥ | ātmani | kariṣyan | vīryam | mahat | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
ā | pavasva | diśām | pate | ārjīkāt | soma | mīḍhvaḥ |
ṛta-vākena | satyena | śraddhayā | tapasā | sutaḥ | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
parjanya-vṛddham | mahiṣam | tam | sūryasya | duhitā | ā | abharat |
tam | gandharvāḥ | prati | agṛbhṇan | tam | some | rasam | ā | adadhuḥ | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
ṛtam | vadan | ṛta-dyumna | satyam | vadan | satya-karman |
śraddhām | vadan | soma | rājan | dhātrā | soma | pari-kṛta | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
satyam-ugrasya | bṛhataḥ | sam | sravanti | sam-sravāḥ |
sam | yanti | rasinaḥ | rasāḥ | punānaḥ | brahmaṇā | hare | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
yatra | brahmā | pavamāna | chandasyām | vācam | vadan |
grāvṇā | some | mahīyate | somena | ā-nandam | janayan | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
yatra | jyotiḥ | ajasram | yasmin | loke | svaḥ | hitam |
tasmin | mām | dhehi | pavamāna | amṛte | loke | akṣite | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
yatra | rājā | vaivasvataḥ | yatra | ava-rodhanam | divaḥ |
yatra | amūḥ | yahvatīḥ | āpaḥ | tatra | mām | amṛtam | kṛdhi | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
yatra | anu-kāmam | caraṇam | tri-nāke | tri-dive | divaḥ |
lokāḥ | yatra | jyotiṣmantaḥ | tatra | mām | amṛtam | kṛdhi | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
yatra | kāmāḥ | ni-kāmāḥ | ca | yatra | bradhnasya | viṣṭapam |
svadhā | ca | yatra | tṛptiḥ | ca | tatra | mām | amṛtam | kṛdhi | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
yatra | ā-nandāḥ | ca | modāḥ | ca | mudaḥ | pra-mudaḥ | āsate |
kāmasya | yatra | āptāḥ | kāmāḥ | tatra | mām | amṛtam | kṛdhi | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
yaḥ | indoḥ | pavamānasya | anu | dhāmāni | akramīt |
tam | āhuḥ | su-prajāḥ | iti | yaḥ | te | soma | avidhat | manaḥ | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
ṛṣe | mantra-kṛtām | stomaiḥ | kaśyapa | ut-vardhayan | giraḥ |
somam | namasya | rājānam | yaḥ | jajñe | vīrudhām | patiḥ | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
sapta | diśaḥ | nānā-sūryāḥ | sapta | hotāraḥ | ṛtvijaḥ |
devāḥ | ādityāḥ | ye | sapta | tebhiḥ | soma | abhi | rakṣa | naḥ | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
yat | te | rājan | śṛtam | haviḥ | tena | soma | abhi | rakṣa | naḥ |
arāti-vā | mā | naḥ | tārīt | mo iti | ca | naḥ | kim | cana | āmamat | indrāya | indo iti | pari | srava |
agre | bṛhan | uṣasām | ūrdhvaḥ | asthāt | niḥ-jaganvān | tamasaḥ | jyotiṣā | ā | agāt |
agniḥ | bhānunā | ruśatā | su-aṅgaḥ | ā | jātaḥ | viśvā | sadmāni | aprāḥ |
saḥ | jātaḥ | garbhaḥ | asi | rodasyoḥ | agne | cāruḥ | vi-bhṛtaḥ | oṣadhīṣu |
citraḥ | śiśuḥ | pari | tamāṁsi | aktūn | pra | mātṛ-bhyaḥ | adhi | kanikradat | gāḥ |
viṣṇuḥ | itthā | paramam | asya | vidvān | jātaḥ | bṛhan | abhi | pāti | tṛtīyam |
āsā | yat | asya | payaḥ | akrata | svam | sa-cetasaḥ | abhi | arcanti | atra |
ataḥ | ūm̐ iti | tvā | pitu-bhṛtaḥ | janitrīḥ | anna-vṛdham | prati | caranti | annaiḥ |
tāḥ | īm | prati | eṣi | punaḥ | anya-rūpāḥ | asi | tvam | vikṣu | mānuṣīṣu | hotā |
hotāram | citra-ratham | adhvarasya | yajñasya-yajñasya | ketum | ruśantam |
prati-ardhim | devasya-devasya | mahnā | śriyā | tu | agnim | atithim | janānām |
saḥ | tu | vastrāṇi | adha | peśanāni | vasānaḥ | agniḥ | nābhā | pṛthivyāḥ |
aruṣaḥ | jātaḥ | pade | iḻāyāḥ | puraḥ-hitaḥ | rājan | yakṣi | iha | devān |
ā | hi | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | agne | ubhe iti | sadā | putraḥ | na | mātarā | tatantha |
pra | yāhi | accha | uśataḥ | yaviṣṭha | atha | ā | vaha | sahasya | iha | devān |
piprīhi | devān | uśataḥ | yaviṣṭha | vidvān | ṛtūn | ṛtu-pate | yaja | iha |
ye | daivyāḥ | ṛtvijaḥ | tebhiḥ | agne | tvam | hotṝṇām | asi | ā-yajiṣṭhaḥ |
veṣi | hotram | uta | potram | janānām | mandhātā | asi | draviṇaḥ-dāḥ | ṛta-vā |
svāhā | vayam | kṛṇavāma | havīṁṣi | devaḥ | devān | yajatu | agniḥ | arhan |
ā | devānām | api | panthām | aganma | yat | śaknavāma | tat | anu | pra-voḻhum |
agniḥ | vidvān | saḥ | yajāt | saḥ | it | ūm̐ iti | hotā | saḥ | adhvarān | saḥ | ṛtūn | kalpayāti |
yat | vaḥ | vayam | pra-mināma | vratāni | viduṣām | devāḥ | aviduḥ-tarāsaḥ |
agniḥ | tat | viśvam | ā | pṛṇāti | vidvān | yebhiḥ | devān | ṛtu-bhiḥ | kalpayāti |
yat | pāka-trā | manasā | dīna-dakṣāḥ | na | yajñasya | manvate | martyāsaḥ |
agniḥ | tat | hotā | kratu-vit | vi-jānan | yajiṣṭhaḥ | devān | ṛtu-śaḥ | yajāti |
viśveṣām | hi | adhvarāṇām | anīkam | citram | ketum | janitā | tvā | jajāna |
saḥ | ā | yajasva | nṛ-vatīḥ | anu | kṣāḥ | spārhāḥ | iṣaḥ | kṣu-matīḥ | viśva-janyāḥ |
yam | tvā | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | yam | tvā | āpaḥ | tvaṣṭā | yam | tvā | su-janimā | jajāna |
panthām | anu | pra-vidvān | pitṛ-yānam | dyu-mat | agne | sam-idhānaḥ | vi | bhāhi |
inaḥ | rājan | aratiḥ | sam-iddhaḥ | raudraḥ | dakṣāya | susu-mān | adarśi |
cikit | vi | bhāti | bhāsā | bṛhatā | asiknīm | eti | ruśatīm | apa-ajan |
kṛṣṇām | yat | enīm | abhi | varpasā | bhūt | janayan | yoṣām | bṛhataḥ | pituḥ | jām |
ūrdhvam | bhānum | sūryasya | stabhāyan | divaḥ | vasu-bhiḥ | aratiḥ | vi | bhāti |
bhadraḥ | bhadrayā | sacamānaḥ | ā | agāt | svasāram | jāraḥ | abhi | eti | paścāt |
su-praketaiḥ | dyu-bhiḥ | agniḥ | vi-tiṣṭhan | ruśat-bhiḥ | varṇaiḥ | abhi | rāmam | asthāt |
asya | yāmāsaḥ | bṛhataḥ | na | vagnūn | indhānāḥ | agneḥ | sakhyuḥ | śivasya |
īḍyasya | vṛṣṇaḥ | bṛhataḥ | su-āsaḥ | bhāmāsaḥ | yāman | aktavaḥ | cikitre |
svanāḥ | na | yasya | bhāmāsaḥ | pavante | rocamānasya | bṛhataḥ | su-divaḥ |
jyeṣṭhebhiḥ | yaḥ | tejiṣṭhaiḥ | krīḻumat-bhiḥ | varṣiṣṭhebhiḥ | bhānu-bhiḥ | nakṣati | dyām |
asya | śuṣmāsaḥ | dadṛśāna-paveḥ | jehamānasya | svanayan | niyut-bhiḥ |
pratnebhiḥ | yaḥ | ruśat-bhiḥ | deva-tamaḥ | vi | rebhat-bhiḥ | aratiḥ | bhāti | vi-bhvā |
saḥ | ā | vakṣi | mahi | naḥ | ā | ca | satsi | divaḥpṛthivyoḥ | aratiḥ | yuvatyoḥ |
agniḥ | su-tukaḥ | su-tukebhiḥ | aśvaiḥ | rabhasvat-bhiḥ | rabhasvān | ā | iha | gamyāḥ |
pra | te | yakṣi | pra | te | iyarmi | manma | bhuvaḥ | yathā | vandyaḥ | naḥ | haveṣu |
dhanvan-iva | pra-pā | asi | tvam | agne | iyakṣave | pūrave | pratna | rājan |
yam | tvā | janāsaḥ | abhi | sam-caranti | gāvaḥ | uṣṇam-iva | vrajam | yaviṣṭha |
dūtaḥ | devānām | asi | martyānām | antaḥ | mahān | carasi | rocanena |
śiśum | na | tvā | jenyam | vardhayantī | mātā | bibharti | sacanasyamānā |
dhanoḥ | adhi | pra-vatā | yāsi | haryan | jigīṣase | paśuḥ-iva | ava-sṛṣṭaḥ |
mūrāḥ | amūra | na | vayam | cikitvaḥ | mahi-tvam | agne | tvam | aṅga | vitse |
śaye | vavriḥ | carati | jihvayā | adan | rerihyate | yuvatim | viśpatiḥ | san |
kū-cit | jāyate | sanayāsu | navyaḥ | vane | tasthau | palitaḥ | dhūma-ketuḥ |
asnātā | āpaḥ | vṛṣabhaḥ | na | pra | veti | sa-cetasaḥ | yam | pra-nayanta | martāḥ |
tanūtyajā-iva | taskarā | vanargū iti | raśanābhiḥ | daśa-bhiḥ | abhi | adhītām |
iyam | te | agne | navyasī | manīṣā | yukṣva | ratham | na | śucayat-bhiḥ | aṅgaiḥ |
brahma | ca | te | jāta-vedaḥ | namaḥ | ca | iyam | ca | gīḥ | sadam | it | vardhanī | bhūt |
rakṣa | naḥ | agne | tanayāni | tokā | rakṣa | uta | naḥ | tanvaḥ | apra-yucchan |
ekaḥ | samudraḥ | dharuṇaḥ | rayīṇām | asmat | hṛdaḥ | bhūri-janmā | vi | caṣṭe |
sisakti | ūdhaḥ | niṇyoḥ | upa-sthe | utsasya | madhye | ni-hitam | padam | veriti veḥ |
samānam | nīḻam | vṛṣaṇaḥ | vasānāḥ | sam | jagmire | mahiṣāḥ | arvatībhiḥ |
ṛtasya | padam | kavayaḥ | ni | pānti | guhā | nāmāni | dadhire | parāṇi |
ṛtayinī ityṛta-yinī | māyinī iti | sam | dadhāte iti | mitvā | śiśum | jajñatuḥ | vardhayantī iti |
viśvasya | nābhim | carataḥ | dhruvasya | kaveḥ | cit | tantum | manasā | vi-yantaḥ |
ṛtasya | hi | vartanayaḥ | su-jātam | iṣaḥ | vājāya | pra-divaḥ | sacante |
adhīvāsam | rodasī iti | vavasāne iti | ghṛtaiḥ | annaiḥ | vavṛdhāte iti | madhūnām |
sapta | svasṝḥ | aruṣīḥ | vāvaśānaḥ | vidvān | madhvaḥ | ut | jabhāra | dṛśe | kam |
antaḥ | yeme | antarikṣe | purā-jāḥ | icchan | vavrim | avidat | pūṣaṇasya |
sapta | maryādāḥ | kavayaḥ | tatakṣuḥ | tāsām | ekām | it | abhi | aṁhuraḥ | gāt |
āyoḥ | ha | skambhaḥ | upa-masya | nīḻe | pathām | vi-sarge | dharuṇeṣu | tasthau |
asat | ca | sat | ca | parame | vi-oman | dakṣasya | janman | aditeḥ | upa-sthe |
agniḥ | ha | naḥ | prathama-jāḥ | ṛtasya | pūrve | āyuni | vṛṣabhaḥ | ca | dhenuḥ |
ayam | saḥ | yasya | śarman | avaḥ-bhiḥ | agneḥ | edhate | jaritā | abhiṣṭau |
jyeṣṭhebhiḥ | yaḥ | bhānu-bhiḥ | ṛṣūṇām | pari-eti | pari-vītaḥ | vibhā-vā |
yaḥ | bhānu-bhiḥ | vibhā-vā | vi-bhāti | agniḥ | devebhiḥ | ṛta-vā | ajasraḥ |
ā | yaḥ | vivāya | sakhyā | sakhi-bhyaḥ | apari-hvṛtaḥ | atyaḥ | na | saptiḥ |
īśe | yaḥ | viśvasyāḥ | deva-vīteḥ | īśe | viśva-āyuḥ | uṣasaḥ | vi-uṣṭau |
ā | yasmin | manā | havīṁṣi | agnau | ariṣṭa-rathaḥ | skabhnāti | śūṣaiḥ |
śūṣebhiḥ | vṛdhaḥ | juṣāṇaḥ | arkaiḥ | devān | accha | raghu-patvā | jagāti |
mandraḥ | hotā | saḥ | juhvā | yajiṣṭhaḥ | sam-miślaḥ | agniḥ | ā | jigharti | devān |
tam | usrām | indram | na | rejamānam | agnim | gīḥ-bhiḥ | namaḥ-bhiḥ | ā | kṛṇudhvam |
ā | yam | viprāsaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | gṛṇanti | jāta-vedasam | juhvam | sahānām |
sam | yasmin | viśvā | vasūni | jagmuḥ | vāje | na | aśvāḥ | sapti-vantaḥ | evaiḥ |
asme iti | ūtīḥ | indravāta-tamāḥ | arvācīnāḥ | agne | ā | kṛṇuṣva |
adha | hi | agne | mahnā | ni-sadya | sadyaḥ | jajñānaḥ | havyaḥ | babhūtha |
tam | te | devāsaḥ | anu | ketam | āyan | adha | avardhanta | prathamāsaḥ | ūmāḥ |
svasti | naḥ | divaḥ | agne | pṛthivyāḥ | viśva-āyuḥ | dhehi | yajathāya | deva |
sacemahi | tava | dasma | pra-ketaiḥ | uruṣya | naḥ | uru-bhiḥ | deva | śaṁsaiḥ |
imāḥ | agne | matayaḥ | tubhyam | jātāḥ | gobhiḥ | aśvaiḥ | abhi | gṛṇanti | rādhaḥ |
yadā | te | martaḥ | anu | bhogam | ānaṭ | vaso iti | dadhānaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | su-jāta |
agnim | manye | pitaram | agnim | āpim | agnim | bhrātaram | sadam | it | sakhāyam |
agneḥ | anīkam | bṛhataḥ | saparyam | divi | śukram | yajatam | sūryasya |
sidhrāḥ | agne | dhiyaḥ | asme iti | sanutrīḥ | yam | trāyase | dame | ā | nitya-hotā |
ṛta-vā | saḥ | rohit-aśvaḥ | puru-kṣuḥ | dyu-bhiḥ | asmai | aha-bhiḥ | vāmam | astu |
dyu-bhiḥ | hitam | mitram-iva | pra-yogam | pratnam | ṛtvijam | adhvarasya | jāram |
bāhu-bhyām | agnim | āyavaḥ | ajananta | vikṣu | hotāram | ni | asādayanta |
svayam | yajasva | divi | deva | devān | kim | te | pākaḥ | kṛṇavat | apra-cetāḥ |
yathā | ayajaḥ | ṛtu-bhiḥ | deva | devān | eva | yajasva | tanvam | su-jāta |
bhava | naḥ | agne | avitā | uta | gopāḥ | bhava | vayaḥ-kṛt | uta | naḥ | vayaḥ-dhāḥ |
rāsva | ca | naḥ | su-mahaḥ | havya-dātim | trāsva | uta | naḥ | tanvaḥ | apra-yucchan |
pra | ketunā | bṛhatā | yāti | agniḥ | ā | rodasī iti | vṛṣabhaḥ | roravīti |
divaḥ | cit | antān | upa-mān | ut | ānaṭ | apām | upa-sthe | mahiṣaḥ | vavardha |
mumoda | garbhaḥ | vṛṣabhaḥ | kakut-mān | asremā | vatsaḥ | śimī-vān | arāvīt |
saḥ | deva-tāti | ut-yatāni | kṛṇvan | sveṣu | kṣayeṣu | prathamaḥ | jigāti |
ā | yaḥ | mūrdhānam | pitroḥ | arabdha | ni | adhvare | dadhire | sūraḥ | arṇaḥ |
asya | patman | aruṣīḥ | aśva-budhnāḥ | ṛtasya | yonau | tanvaḥ | juṣanta |
uṣaḥ-uṣaḥ | hi | vaso iti | agram | eṣi | tvam | yamayoḥ | abhavaḥ | vibhā-vā |
ṛtāya | sapta | dadhiṣe | padāni | janayan | mitram | tanve | svāyai |
bhuvaḥ | cakṣuḥ | mahaḥ | ṛtasya | gopāḥ | bhuvaḥ | varuṇaḥ | yat | ṛtāya | veṣi |
bhuvaḥ | apām | napāt | jāta-vedaḥ | bhuvaḥ | dūtaḥ | yasya | havyam | jujoṣaḥ |
bhuvaḥ | yajñasya | rajasaḥ | ca | netā | yatra | niyut-bhiḥ | sacase | śivābhiḥ |
