mahat | tat | nāma | guhyam | puru-spṛk | yena | bhūtam | janayaḥ | yena | bhavyam |
pratnam | jātam | jyotiḥ | yat | asya | priyam | priyāḥ | sam | aviśanta | pañca |
ā | rodasī iti | apṛṇāt | ā | uta | madhyam | pañca | devān | ṛtu-śaḥ | sapta-sapta |
catuḥ-triṁśatā | purudhā | vi | caṣṭe | sa-rūpeṇa | jyotiṣā | vi-vratena |
yat | uṣaḥ | aucchaḥ | prathamā | vi-bhānām | ajanayaḥ | yena | puṣṭasya | puṣṭam |
yat | te | jāmi-tvam | avaram | parasyāḥ | mahat | mahatyāḥ | asura-tvam | ekam |
vi-dhum | dadrāṇam | samane | bahūnām | yuvānam | santam | palitaḥ | jagāra |
devasya | paśya | kāvyam | mahi-tvā | adya | mamāra | saḥ | hyaḥ | sam | āna |
śākmanā | śākaḥ | aruṇaḥ | su-parṇaḥ | ā | yaḥ | mahaḥ | śūraḥ | sanāt | anīḻaḥ |
yat | ciketa | satyam | it | tat | na | mogham | vasu | spārham | uta | jetā | uta | dātā |
ā | ebhiḥ | dade | vṛṣṇyā | pauṁsyāni | yebhiḥ | aukṣat | vṛtra-hatyāya | vajrī |
ye | karmaṇaḥ | kriyamāṇasya | mahnā | ṛte-karmam | ut-ajāyanta | devāḥ |
yujā | karmāṇi | janayan | viśva-ojāḥ | aśasti-hā | viśva-manāḥ | turāṣāṭ |
pītvī | somasya | divaḥ | ā | vṛdhānaḥ | śūraḥ | niḥ | yudhā | adhamat | dasyūn |
idam | te | ekam | paraḥ | ūm̐ iti | te | ekam | tṛtīyena | jyotiṣā | sam | viśasva |
sam-veśane | tanvaḥ | cāruḥ | edhi | priyaḥ | devānām | parame | janitre |
tanūḥ | te | vājin | tanvam | nayantī | vāmam | asmabhyam | dhātu | śarma | tubhyam |
ahrutaḥ | mahaḥ | dharuṇāya | devān | divi-iva | jyotiḥ | svam | ā | mimīyāḥ |
vājī | asi | vājinena | su-venīḥ | suvitaḥ | stomam | suvitaḥ | divam | gāḥ |
suvitaḥ | dharma | prathamā | anu | satyā | suvitaḥ | devān | suvitaḥ | anu | patma |
mahimnaḥ | eṣām | pitaraḥ | cana | īśire | devāḥ | deveṣu | adadhuḥ | api | kratum |
sam | avivyacuḥ | uta | yāni | atviṣuḥ | ā | eṣām | tanūṣu | ni | viviśuḥ | punariti |
sahaḥ-bhiḥ | viśvam | pari | cakramuḥ | rajaḥ | pūrvā | dhāmāni | amitā | mimānāḥ |
tanūṣu | viśvā | bhuvanā | ni | yemire | pra | asārayanta | purudha | pra-jāḥ | anu |
dvidhā | sūnavaḥ | asuram | svaḥ-vidam | ā | asthāpayanta | tṛtīyena | karmaṇā |
svām | pra-jām | pitaraḥ | pitryam | sahaḥ | ā | avareṣu | adadhuḥ | tantum | ā-tatam |
nāvā | na | kṣodaḥ | pra-diśaḥ | pṛthivyāḥ | svasti-bhiḥ | ati | duḥ-gāni | viśvā |
svām | pra-jām | bṛhat-ukthaḥ | mahi-tvā | ā | avareṣu | adadhāt | ā | pareṣu |
mā | pra | gāma | pathaḥ | vayam | mā | yajñāt | indra | sominaḥ |
mā | antariti | sthuḥ | naḥ | arātayaḥ |
yaḥ | yajñasya | pra-sādhanaḥ | tantuḥ | deveṣu | ā-tataḥ |
tam | ā-hutam | naśīmahi |
manaḥ | nu | ā | huvāmahe | nārāśaṁsena | somena |
pitṝṇām | ca | manma-bhiḥ |
ā | te | etu | manaḥ | punariti | kratve | dakṣāya | jīvase |
jyok | ca | sūryam | dṛśe |
punaḥ | naḥ | pitaraḥ | manaḥ | dadātu | daivyaḥ | janaḥ |
jīvam | vrātam | sacemahi |
vayam | soma | vrate | tava | manaḥ | tanūṣu | bibhrataḥ |
prajā-vantaḥ | sacemahi |
yat | te | yamam | vaivasvatam | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | divam | yat | pṛthivīm | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | bhūmim | catuḥ-bhṛṣṭim | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | catasraḥ | pra-diśaḥ | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | samudram | arṇavam | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | marīcīḥ | pra-vataḥ | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | apaḥ | yat | oṣadhīḥ | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | sūryam | yat | uṣasam | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | parvatān | bṛhataḥ | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | viśvam | idam | jagat | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | parāḥ | parā-vataḥ | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
yat | te | bhūtam | ca | bhavyam | ca | manaḥ | jagāma | dūrakam |
tat | te | ā | vartayāmasi | iha | kṣayāya | jīvase |
pra | tāri | āyuḥ | pra-taram | navīyaḥ | sthātārā-iva | kratu-matā | rathasya |
adha | cyavānaḥ | ut | tavīti | artham | parā-taram | su | niḥ-ṛtiḥ | jihītām |
sāman | nu | rāye | nidhi-mat | nu | annam | karāmahe | su | purudha | śravāṁsi |
tā | naḥ | viśvāni | jaritā | mamattu | parā-taram | su | niḥ-ṛtiḥ | jihītām |
abhi | su | aryaḥ | pauṁsyaiḥ | bhavema | dyauḥ | na | bhūmim | girayaḥ | na | ajrān |
tā | naḥ | viśvāni | jaritā | ciketa | parā-taram | su | niḥ-ṛtiḥ | jihītām |
mo iti | su | naḥ | soma | mṛtyave | parā | dāḥ | paśyema | nu | sūryam | ut-carantam |
dyu-bhiḥ | hitaḥ | jarimā | su | naḥ | astu | parā-taram | su | niḥ-ṛtiḥ | jihītām |
asu-nīte | manaḥ | asmāsu | dhāraya | jīvātave | su | pra | tira | naḥ | āyuḥ |
rarandhi | naḥ | sūryasya | sam-dṛśi | ghṛtena | tvam | tanvam | vardhayasva |
asu-nīte | punaḥ | asmāsu | cakṣuḥ | punariti | prāṇam | iha | naḥ | dhehi | bhogam |
jyok | paśyema | sūryam | ut-carantam | anu-mate | mṛḻaya | naḥ | svasti |
punaḥ | naḥ | asum | pṛthivī | dadātu | punaḥ | dyauḥ | devī | punaḥ | antarikṣam |
punaḥ | naḥ | somaḥ | tanvam | dadātu | punariti | pūṣā | pathyām | yā | svastiḥ |
śam | rodasī iti | su-bandhave | yahvī iti | ṛtasya | mātarā |
bharatām | apa | yat | rapaḥ | dyauḥ | pṛthivi | kṣamā | rapaḥ | mo iti | su | te | kim | cana | āmamat |
ava | dvake iti | ava | trikā | divaḥ | caranti | bheṣajā |
kṣamā | cariṣṇu | ekakam | bharatām | apa | yat | rapaḥ | dyauḥ | pṛthivi | kṣamā | rapaḥ | mo iti | su | te | kim | cana | āmamat |
sam | indra | īraya | gām | anaḍvāham | yaḥ | ā | avahat | uśīnarāṇyāḥ | anaḥ |
bharatām | apa | yat | rapaḥ | dyauḥ | pṛthivi | kṣamā | rapaḥ | mo iti | su | te | kim | cana | āmamat |
ā | janam | tveṣa-saṁdṛśam | māhīnānām | upa-stutam |
aganma | bibhrataḥ | namaḥ |
asamātim | ni-tośanam | tveṣam | ni-yayinam | ratham |
bhaje-rathasya | sat-patim |
yaḥ | janān | mahiṣān-iva | ati-tasthau | pavīravān |
uta | apavīravān | yudhā |
yasya | ikṣvākuḥ | upa | vrate | revān | marāyī | edhate |
divi-iva | pañca | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
indra | kṣatrā | asamātiṣu | ratha-proṣṭheṣu | dhāraya |
divi-iva | sūryam | dṛśe |
agastyasya | nat-bhyaḥ | saptī iti | yunakṣi | rohitā |
paṇīn | ni | akramīḥ | abhi | viśvān | rājan | arādhasaḥ |
ayam | mātā | ayam | pitā | ayam | jīvātuḥ | ā | agamat |
idam | tava | pra-sarpaṇam | subandho iti su-bandho | ā | ihi | niḥ | ihi |
yathā | yugam | varatrayā | nahyanti | dharuṇāya | kam |
eva | dādhāra | te | manaḥ | jīvātave | na | mṛtyave | atho iti | ariṣṭa-tātaye |
yathā | iyam | pṛthivī | mahī | dādhāra | imān | vanaspatīn |
eva | dādhāra | te | manaḥ | jīvātave | na | mṛtyave | atho iti | ariṣṭa-tātaye |
yamāt | aham | vaivasvatāt | su-bandhoḥ | manaḥ | ā | abharam |
jīvātave | na | mṛtyave | atho iti | ariṣṭa-tātaye |
nyak | vātaḥ | ava | vāti | nyak | tapati | sūryaḥ |
nīcīnam | aghnyā | duhe | nyak | bhavatu | te | rapaḥ |
ayam | me | hastaḥ | bhaga-vān | ayam | me | bhagavat-taraḥ |
ayam | me | viśva-bheṣajaḥ | ayam | śiva-abhimarśanaḥ |
idam | itthā | raudram | gūrta-vacāḥ | brahma | kratvā | śacyām | antaḥ | ājau |
krāṇā | yat | asya | pitarā | maṁhane-sthāḥ | parṣat | pakthe | ahan | ā | sapta | hotṝn |
saḥ | it | dānāya | dabhyāya | vanvan | cyavānaḥ | sūdaiḥ | amimīta | vedim |
tūrvayāṇaḥ | gūrtavacaḥ-tamaḥ | kṣodaḥ | na | retaḥ | itaḥ-ūti | siñcat |
manaḥ | na | yeṣu | havaneṣu | tigmam | vipaḥ | śacyā | vanuthaḥ | dravantā |
ā | yaḥ | śaryābhiḥ | tuvi-nṛmṇaḥ | asya | aśrīṇīta | ā-diśam | gabhastau |
kṛṣṇā | yat | goṣu | aruṇīṣu | sīdat | divaḥ | napātā | aśvinā | huve | vām |
vītam | me | yajñam | ā | gatam | me | annam | vavanvāṁsā | na | iṣam | asmṛtadhrū ityasmṛta-dhrū |
prathiṣṭa | yasya | vīra-karmam | iṣṇat | anu-sthitam | nu | naryaḥ | apa | auhat |
punariti | tat | ā | vṛhati | yat | kanāyāḥ | duhituḥ | āḥ | anu-bhṛtam | anarvā |
madhyā | yat | kartvam | abhavat | abhīke | kāmam | kṛṇvāne | pitari | yuvatyām |
manānak | retaḥ | jahatuḥ | vi-yantā | sānau | ni-siktam | su-kṛtasya | yonau |
pitā | yat | svām | duhitaram | adhi-skan | kṣmayā | retaḥ | sam-jagmānaḥ | ni | siñcat |
su-ādhyaḥ | ajanayan | brahma | devāḥ | vāstoḥ | patim | vrata-pām | niḥ | atakṣan |
saḥ | īm | vṛṣā | na | phenam | asyat | ājau | smat | ā | parā | ait | apa | dabhra-cetāḥ |
sarat | padā | na | dakṣiṇā | parā-vṛk | na | tāḥ | nu | me | pṛśanyaḥ | jagṛbhre |
makṣu | na | vahniḥ | pra-jāyāḥ | upabdiḥ | agnim | na | nagnaḥ | upa | sīdat | ūdhaḥ |
sanitā | idhmam | sanitā | uta | vājam | saḥ | dhartā | jajñe | sahasā | yavi-yut |
makṣu | kanāyāḥ | sakhyam | nava-gvāḥ | ṛtam | vadantaḥ | ṛta-yuktim | agman |
dvi-barhasaḥ | ye | upa | gopam | ā | aguḥ | adakṣiṇāsaḥ | acyutā | dudhukṣan |
makṣu | kanāyāḥ | sakhyam | navīyaḥ | rādhaḥ | na | retaḥ | ṛtam | it | turaṇyan |
śuci | yat | te | rekṇaḥ | ā | ayajanta | sabaḥ-dughāyāḥ | payaḥ | usriyāyāḥ |
paśvā | yat | paścā | vi-yutā | budhanta | iti | bravīti | vaktari | rarāṇaḥ |
vasoḥ | vasu-tvā | kāravaḥ | anehā | viśvam | viveṣṭi | draviṇam | upa | kṣu |
tat | it | nu | asya | pari-sadvānaḥ | agman | puru | sadantaḥ | nārṣadam | bibhitsan |
vi | śuṣṇasya | sam-grathitam | anarvā | vidat | puru-prajātasya | guhā | yat |
bhargaḥ | ha | nāma | uta | yasya | devāḥ | svaḥ | na | ye | tri-sadhasthe | ni-seduḥ |
agniḥ | ha | nāma | uta | jāta-vedāḥ | śrudhi | naḥ | hotaḥ | ṛtasya | hotā | adhruk |
uta | tyā | me | raudrau | arci-mantā | nāsatyau | indra | gūrtaye | yajadhyai |
manuṣvat | vṛkta-barhiṣe | rarāṇā | mandū iti | hita-prayasā | vikṣu | yajyū iti |
ayam | stutaḥ | rājā | vandi | vedhāḥ | apaḥ | ca | vipraḥ | tarati | sva-setuḥ |
saḥ | kakṣīvantam | rejayat | saḥ | agnim | nemim | na | cakram | arvataḥ | raghu-dru |
saḥ | dvi-bandhuḥ | vaitaraṇaḥ | yaṣṭā | sabaḥ-dhum | dhenum | asvam | duhadhyai |
sam | yat | mitrāvaruṇā | vṛñje | ukthaiḥ | jyeṣṭhebhiḥ | aryamaṇam | varūthaiḥ |
tat-bandhuḥ | sūriḥ | divi | te | dhiyam-dhāḥ | nābhānediṣṭhaḥ | rapati | pra | venan |
sā | naḥ | nābhiḥ | paramā | asya | vā | gha | aham | tat | paścā | katithaḥ | cit | āsa |
iyam | me | nābhiḥ | iha | me | sadha-stham | ime | me | devāḥ | ayam | asmi | sarvaḥ |
dvi-jāḥ | aha | prathama-jāḥ | ṛtasya | idam | dhenuḥ | aduhat | jāyamānā |
adha | āsu | mandraḥ | aratiḥ | vibhā-vā | ava | syati | dvi-vartaniḥ | vaneṣāṭ |
ūrdhvā | yat | śreṇiḥ | na | śiśuḥ | dan | makṣu | sthiram | śe-vṛdham | sūta | mātā |
adha | gāvaḥ | upa-mātim | kanāyāḥ | anu | śvāntasya | kasya | cit | parā | īyuḥ |
śrudhi | tvam | su-draviṇaḥ | naḥ | tvam | yāṭ | āśva-ghnasya | vavṛdhe | sūnṛtābhiḥ |
adha | tvam | indra | viddhi | asmān | mahaḥ | rāye | nṛ-pate | vajra-bāhuḥ |
rakṣa | ca | naḥ | maghonaḥ | pāhi | sūrīn | anehasaḥ | te | hari-vaḥ | abhiṣṭau |
adha | yat | rājānā | go-iṣṭau | sarat | saraṇyuḥ | kārave | jaraṇyuḥ |
vipraḥ | preṣṭhaḥ | saḥ | hi | eṣām | babhūva | parā | ca | vakṣat | uta | parṣat | enān |
adha | nu | asya | jenyasya | puṣṭau | vṛthā | rebhantaḥ | īmahe | tat | ūm̐ iti | nu |
saraṇyuḥ | asya | sūnuḥ | aśvaḥ | vipraḥ | ca | asi | śravasaḥ | ca | sātau |
yuvoḥ | yadi | sakhyāya | asme iti | śardhāya | stomam | jujuṣe | namasvān |
viśvatra | yasmin | ā | giraḥ | sam-īcīḥ | pūrvī-iva | gātuḥ | dāśat | sūnṛtāyai |
saḥ | gṛṇānaḥ | at-bhiḥ | deva-vān | iti | su-bandhuḥ | namasā | su-uktaiḥ |
vardhat | ukthaiḥ | vacaḥ-bhiḥ | ā | hi | nūnam | vi | adhvā | eti | payasaḥ | usriyāyāḥ |
te | ūm̐ iti | su | naḥ | mahaḥ | yajatrāḥ | bhūta | devāsaḥ | ūtaye | sa-joṣāḥ |
ye | vājān | anayata | vi-yantaḥ | ye | stha | ni-cetāraḥ | amūrāḥ |
ye | yajñena | dakṣiṇayā | sam-aktāḥ | indrasya | sakhyam | amṛta-tvam | ānaśa |
tebhyaḥ | bhadram | aṅgirasaḥ | vaḥ | astu | prati | gṛbhṇīta | mānavam | su-medhasaḥ |
ye | ut-ājan | pitaraḥ | go-mayam | vasu | ṛtena | abhindan | parivatsare | valam |
dīrghāyu-tvam | aṅgirasaḥ | vaḥ | astu | prati | gṛbhṇīta | mānavam | su-medhasaḥ |
ye | ṛtena | sūryam | ā | arohayan | divi | aprathayan | pṛthivīm | mātaram | vi |
suprajāḥ-tvam | aṅgirasaḥ | vaḥ | astu | prati | gṛbhṇīta | mānavam | su-medhasaḥ |
ayam | nābhā | vadati | valgu | vaḥ | gṛhe | deva-putrāḥ | ṛṣayaḥ | tat | śṛṇotana |
su-brahmaṇyam | aṅgirasaḥ | vaḥ | astu | prati | gṛbhṇīta | mānavam | su-medhasaḥ |
vi-rūpāsaḥ | it | ṛṣayaḥ | te | it | gambhīra-vepasaḥ |
te | aṅgirasaḥ | sūnavaḥ | te | agneḥ | pari | jajñire |
ye | agneḥ | pari | jajñire | vi-rūpāsaḥ | divaḥ | pari |
nava-gvaḥ | nu | daśa-gvaḥ | aṅgiraḥ-tamaḥ | sacā | deveṣu | maṁhate |
indreṇa | yujā | niḥ | sṛjanta | vāghataḥ | vrajam | go-mantam | aśvinam |
sahasram | me | dadataḥ | aṣṭa-karṇyaḥ | śravaḥ | deveṣu | akrata |
pra | nūnam | jāyatām | ayam | manuḥ | tokma-iva | rohatu |
yaḥ | sahasram | śata-aśvam | sadyaḥ | dānāya | maṁhate |
na | tam | aśnoti | kaḥ | cana | divaḥ-iva | sānu | ā-rabham |
sāvarṇyasya | dakṣiṇā | vi | sindhuḥ-iva | paprathe |
uta | dāsā | pari-viṣe | smaddiṣṭī iti smat-diṣṭī | go-parīṇasā |
yaduḥ | turvaḥ | ca | mamahe |
sahasra-dāḥ | grāma-nīḥ | mā | riṣat | manuḥ | sūryeṇa | asya | yatamānā | etu | dakṣiṇā |
sāvarṇeḥ | devāḥ | pra | tirantu | āyuḥ | yasmin | aśrāntāḥ | asanāma | vājam |
parā-vataḥ | ye | didhiṣante | āpyam | manu-prītāsaḥ | janima | vivasvataḥ |
yayāteḥ | ye | nahuṣyasya | barhiṣi | devāḥ | āsate | te | adhi | bruvantu | naḥ |
viśvā | hi | vaḥ | namasyāni | vandyā | nāmāni | devāḥ | uta | yajñiyāni | vaḥ |
ye | stha | jātāḥ | aditeḥ | at-bhyaḥ | pari | ye | pṛthivyāḥ | te | me | iha | śruta | havam |
yebhyaḥ | mātā | madhu-mat | pinvate | payaḥ | pīyūṣam | dyauḥ | aditiḥ | adri-barhāḥ |
uktha-śuṣmān | vṛṣa-bharān | su-apnasaḥ | tān | ādityān | anu | mada | svastaye |
nṛ-cakṣasaḥ | ani-miṣantaḥ | arhaṇā | bṛhat | devāsaḥ | amṛta-tvam | ānaśuḥ |
jyotiḥ-rathāḥ | ahi-māyāḥ | anāgasaḥ | divaḥ | varṣmāṇam | vasate | svastaye |
sam-rājaḥ | ye | su-vṛdhaḥ | yajñam | ā-yayuḥ | apari-hvṛtāḥ | dadhire | divi | kṣayam |
tān | ā | vivāsa | namasā | suvṛkti-bhiḥ | mahaḥ | ādityān | aditim | svastaye |
kaḥ | vaḥ | stomam | rādhati | yam | jujoṣatha | viśve | devāsaḥ | manuṣaḥ | yati | sthana |
kaḥ | vaḥ | adhvaram | tuvi-jātāḥ | aram | karat | yaḥ | naḥ | parṣat | ati | aṁhaḥ | svastaye |
yebhyaḥ | hotrām | prathamām | ā-yeje | manuḥ | samiddha-agniḥ | manasā | sapta | hotṛ-bhiḥ |
te | ādityāḥ | abhayam | śarma | yacchata | su-gā | naḥ | karta | su-pathā | svastaye |
ye | īśire | bhuvanasya | pra-cetasaḥ | viśvasya | sthātuḥ | jagataḥ | ca | mantavaḥ |
te | naḥ | kṛtāt | akṛtāt | enasaḥ | pari | adya | devāsaḥ | pipṛta | svastaye |
bhareṣu | indram | su-havam | havāmahe | aṁhaḥ-mucam | su-kṛtam | daivyam | janam |
agnim | mitram | varuṇam | sātaye | bhagam | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | marutaḥ | svastaye |
su-trāmāṇam | pṛthivīm | dyām | anehasam | su-śarmāṇam | aditim | su-pranītim |
daivīm | nāvam | su-aritrām | anāgasam | asravantīm | ā | ruhema | svastaye |
viśve | yajatrāḥ | adhi | vocata | ūtaye | trāyadhvam | naḥ | duḥ-evāyāḥ | abhi-hrutaḥ |
satyayā | vaḥ | deva-hūtyā | huvema | śṛṇvataḥ | devāḥ | avase | svastaye |
apa | amīvām | apa | viśvām | anāhutim | apa | arātim | duḥ-vidatrām | agha-yataḥ |
āre | devāḥ | dveṣaḥ | asmat | yuyotana | uru | naḥ | śarma | yacchata | svastaye |
ariṣṭaḥ | saḥ | martaḥ | viśvaḥ | edhate | pra | pra-jābhiḥ | jāyate | dharmaṇaḥ | pari |
yam | ādityāsaḥ | nayatha | sunīti-bhiḥ | ati | viśvāni | duḥ-itā | svastaye |
yam | devāsaḥ | avatha | vāja-sātau | yam | śūra-sātā | marutaḥ | hite | dhane |
prātaḥ-yāvānam | ratham | indra | sānasim | ariṣyantam | ā | ruhema | svastaye |
svasti | naḥ | pathyāsu | dhanva-su | svasti | ap-su | vṛjane | svaḥ-vati |
svasti | naḥ | putra-kṛtheṣu | yoniṣu | svasti | rāye | marutaḥ | dadhātana |
svastiḥ | it | hi | pra-pathe | śreṣṭhā | rekṇasvatī | abhi | yā | vāmam | eti |
sā | naḥ | amā | so iti | araṇe | ni | pātu | su-āveśā | bhavatu | deva-gopā |
eva | plateḥ | sūnuḥ | avīvṛdhat | vaḥ | viśve | ādityāḥ | adite | manīṣī |
īśānāsaḥ | naraḥ | amartyena | astāvi | janaḥ | divyaḥ | gayena |
kathā | devānām | katamasya | yāmani | su-mantu | nāma | śṛṇvatām | manāmahe |
kaḥ | mṛḻāti | katamaḥ | naḥ | mayaḥ | karat | katamaḥ | ūtī | abhi | ā | vavartati |
kratu-yanti | kratavaḥ | hṛt-su | dhītayaḥ | venanti | venāḥ | patayanti | ā | diśaḥ |
na | marḍitā | vidyate | anyaḥ | ebhyaḥ | deveṣu | me | adhi | kāmāḥ | ayaṁsata |
narāśaṁsam | vā | pūṣaṇam | agohyam | agnim | deva-iddham | abhi | arcase | girā |
sūryāmāsā | candramasā | yamam | divi | tritam | vātam | uṣasam | aktum | aśvinā |
kathā | kaviḥ | tuvi-ravān | kayā | girā | bṛhaspatiḥ | vavṛdhate | suvṛkti-bhiḥ |
ajaḥ | eka-pāt | su-havebhiḥ | ṛkva-bhiḥ | ahiḥ | śṛṇotu | budhnyaḥ | havīmani |
dakṣasya | vā | adite | janmani | vrate | rājānā | mitrāvaruṇā | ā | vivāsasi |
atūrta-panthāḥ | puru-rathaḥ | aryamā | sapta-hotā | viṣu-rūpeṣu | janma-su |
te | naḥ | arvantaḥ | havana-śrutaḥ | havam | viśve | śṛṇvantu | vājinaḥ | mita-dravaḥ |
sahasra-sāḥ | medhasātau-iva | tmanā | mahaḥ | ye | dhanam | sam-itheṣu | jabhrire |
pra | vaḥ | vāyum | ratha-yujam | puram-dhim | stomaiḥ | kṛṇudhvam | sakhyāya | pūṣaṇam |
te | hi | devasya | savituḥ | savīmani | kratum | sacante | sa-citaḥ | sa-cetasaḥ |
triḥ | sapta | sasrāḥ | nadyaḥ | mahīḥ | apaḥ | vanaspatīn | parvatān | agnim | ūtaye |
kṛśānum | astṝn | tiṣyam | sadha-sthe | ā | rudram | rudreṣu | rudriyam | havāmahe |
sarasvatī | sarayuḥ | sindhuḥ | ūrmi-bhiḥ | mahaḥ | mahīḥ | avasā | ā | yantu | vakṣaṇīḥ |
devīḥ | āpaḥ | mātaraḥ | sūdayitnvaḥ | ghṛta-vat | payaḥ | madhu-mat | naḥ | arcata |
uta | mātā | bṛhat-divā | śṛṇotu | naḥ | tvaṣṭā | devebhiḥ | jani-bhiḥ | pitā | vacaḥ |
ṛbhukṣāḥ | vājaḥ | rathaḥpatiḥ | bhagaḥ | raṇvaḥ | śaṁsaḥ | śaśamānasya | pātu | naḥ |
raṇvaḥ | sam-dṛṣṭau | pitumān-iva | kṣayaḥ | bhadrā | rudrāṇām | marutām | upa-stutiḥ |
gobhiḥ | syāma | yaśasaḥ | janeṣu | ā | sadā | devāsaḥ | iḻayā | sacemahi |
yām | me | dhiyam | marutaḥ | indra | devāḥ | adadāta | varuṇa | mitra | yūyam |
tām | pīpayata | payasā-iva | dhenum | kuvit | giraḥ | adhi | rathe | vahātha |
kuvit | aṅga | prati | yathā | cit | asya | naḥ | sa-jātyasya | marutaḥ | bubodhatha |
nābhā | yatra | prathamam | sam-nasāmahe | tatra | jāmi-tvam | aditiḥ | dadhātu | naḥ |
te iti | hi | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | mātarā | mahī iti | devī iti | devān | janmanā | yajñiye iti | itaḥ |
ubhe iti | bibhṛtaḥ | ubhayam | bharīma-bhiḥ | puru | retāṁsi | pitṛ-bhiḥ | ca | siñcataḥ |
vi | sā | hotrā | viśvam | aśnoti | vāryam | bṛhaspatiḥ | aramatiḥ | panīyasī |
grāvā | yatra | madhu-sut | ucyate | bṛhat | avīvaśanta | mati-bhiḥ | manīṣiṇaḥ |
eva | kaviḥ | tuvi-ravān | ṛta-jñāḥ | draviṇasyuḥ | draviṇasaḥ | cakānaḥ |
ukthebhiḥ | atra | mati-bhiḥ | ca | vipraḥ | apīpayat | gayaḥ | divyāni | janma |
eva | plateḥ | sūnuḥ | avīvṛdhat | vaḥ | viśve | ādityāḥ | adite | manīṣī |
īśānāsaḥ | naraḥ | amartyena | astāvi | janaḥ | divyaḥ | gayena |
agniḥ | indraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mitraḥ | aryamā | vāyuḥ | pūṣā | sarasvatī | sa-joṣasaḥ |
ādityāḥ | viṣṇuḥ | marutaḥ | svaḥ | bṛhat | somaḥ | rudraḥ | aditiḥ | brahmaṇaḥ | patiḥ |
indrāgnī iti | vṛtra-hatyeṣu | satpatī iti sat-patī | mithaḥ | hinvānā | tanvā | sam-okasā |
antarikṣam | mahi | ā | papruḥ | ojasā | somaḥ | ghṛta-śrīḥ | mahimānam | īrayan |
teṣām | hi | mahnā | mahatām | anarvaṇām | stomān | iyarmi | ṛta-jñāḥ | ṛta-vṛdhām |
ye | apsavam | arṇavam | citra-rādhasaḥ | te | naḥ | rāsantām | mahaye | su-mitryāḥ |
svaḥ-naram | antarikṣāṇi | rocanā | dyāvābhūmī iti | pṛthivīm | skambhuḥ | ojasā |
pṛkṣāḥ-iva | mahayantaḥ | su-rātayaḥ | devāḥ | stavante | manuṣāya | sūrayaḥ |
mitrāya | śikṣa | varuṇāya | dāśuṣe | yā | sam-rājā | manasā | na | pra-yucchataḥ |
yayoḥ | dhāma | dharmaṇā | rocate | bṛhat | yayoḥ | ubhe iti | rodasī iti | nādhasī iti | vṛtau |
yā | gauḥ | vartanim | pari-eti | niḥ-kṛtam | payaḥ | duhānā | vrata-nīḥ | avārataḥ |
sā | pra-bruvāṇā | varuṇāya | dāśuṣe | devebhyaḥ | dāśat | haviṣā | vivasvate |
divakṣasaḥ | agni-jihvāḥ | ṛta-vṛdhaḥ | ṛtasya | yonim | vi-mṛśantaḥ | āsate |
dyām | skabhitvī | apaḥ | ā | cakruḥ | ojasā | yajñam | janitvī | tanvi | ni | mamṛjuḥ |
pari-kṣitā | pitarā | pūrvajāvarī iti pūrva-jāvarī | ṛtasya | yonā | kṣayataḥ | sam-okasā |
dyāvāpṛthivī iti | varuṇāya | savrate iti sa-vrate | ghṛta-vat | payaḥ | mahiṣāya | pinvataḥ |
parjanyāvātā | vṛṣabhā | purīṣiṇā | indravāyū iti | varuṇaḥ | mitraḥ | aryamā |
devān | ādityān | aditim | havāmahe | ye | pārthivāsaḥ | divyāsaḥ | ap-su | ye |
tvaṣṭāram | vāyum | ṛbhavaḥ | yaḥ | ohate | daivyā | hotārau | uṣasam | svastaye |
bṛhaspatim | vṛtra-khādam | su-medhasam | indriyam | somam | dhana-sāḥ | ūm̐ iti | īmahe |
brahma | gām | aśvam | janayantaḥ | oṣadhīḥ | vanaspatīn | pṛthivīm | parvatān | apaḥ |
sūryam | divi | rohayantaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | āryā | vratā | vi-sṛjantaḥ | adhi | kṣami |
bhujyum | aṁhasaḥ | pipṛthaḥ | niḥ | aśvinā | śyāvam | putram | vadhri-matyāḥ | ajinvatam |
kama-dyuvam | vi-madāya | ūhathuḥ | yuvam | viṣṇāpvam | viśvakāya | ava | sṛjathaḥ |
pāvīravī | tanyatuḥ | eka-pāt | ajaḥ | divaḥ | dhartā | sindhuḥ | āpaḥ | samudriyaḥ |
viśve | devāsaḥ | śṛṇavan | vacāṁsi | me | sarasvatī | saha | dhībhiḥ | puram-dhyā |
viśve | devāḥ | saha | dhībhiḥ | puram-dhyā | manoḥ | yajatrāḥ | amṛtāḥ | ṛta-jñāḥ |
rāti-sācaḥ | abhi-sācaḥ | svaḥ-vidaḥ | svaḥ | giraḥ | brahma | su-uktam | juṣerata |
devān | vasiṣṭhaḥ | amṛtān | vavande | ye | viśvā | bhuvanā | abhi | pra-tasthuḥ |
te | naḥ | rāsantām | uru-gāyam | adya | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
devān | huve | bṛhat-śravasaḥ | svastaye | jyotiḥ-kṛtaḥ | adhvarasya | pra-cetasaḥ |
ye | vavṛdhuḥ | pra-taram | viśva-vedasaḥ | indra-jyeṣṭhāsaḥ | amṛtāḥ | ṛta-vṛdhaḥ |
indra-prasūtāḥ | varuṇa-praśiṣṭāḥ | ye | sūryasya | jyotiṣaḥ | bhāgam | ānaśuḥ |
marut-gaṇe | vṛjane | manma | dhīmahi | māghone | yajñam | janayanta | sūrayaḥ |
indraḥ | vasu-bhiḥ | pari | pātu | naḥ | gayam | ādityaiḥ | naḥ | aditiḥ | śarma | yacchatu |
rudraḥ | rudrebhiḥ | devaḥ | mṛḻayāti | naḥ | tvaṣṭā | naḥ | gnābhiḥ | suvitāya | jinvatu |
aditiḥ | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | ṛtam | mahat | indrāviṣṇū iti | marutaḥ | svaḥ | bṛhat |
devān | ādityān | avase | havāmahe | vasūn | rudrān | savitāram | su-daṁsasam |
sarasvān | dhībhiḥ | varuṇaḥ | dhṛta-vrataḥ | pūṣā | viṣṇuḥ | mahimā | vāyuḥ | aśvinā |
brahma-kṛtaḥ | amṛtāḥ | viśva-vedasaḥ | śarma | naḥ | yaṁsan | tri-varūtham | aṁhasaḥ |
vṛṣā | yajñaḥ | vṛṣaṇaḥ | santu | yajñiyāḥ | vṛṣaṇaḥ | devāḥ | vṛṣaṇaḥ | haviḥ-kṛtaḥ |
vṛṣaṇā | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | ṛtavarī ityṛta-varī | vṛṣā | parjanyaḥ | vṛṣaṇaḥ | vṛṣa-stubhaḥ |
agnīṣomā | vṛṣaṇā | vāja-sātaye | puru-praśastā | vṛṣaṇau | upa | bruve |
yau | ījire | vṛṣaṇaḥ | deva-yajyayā | tā | naḥ | śarma | tri-varūtham | vi | yāṁsataḥ |
dhṛta-vratāḥ | kṣatriyāḥ | yajñaniḥ-kṛtaḥ | bṛhat-divāḥ | adhvarāṇām | abhi-śriyaḥ |
agni-hotāraḥ | ṛta-sāpaḥ | adruhaḥ | apaḥ | asṛjan | anu | vṛtra-tūrye |
dyāvāpṛthivī iti | janayan | abhi | vratā | āpaḥ | oṣadhīḥ | vanināni | yajñiyā |
antarikṣam | svaḥ | ā | papruḥ | ūtaye | vaśam | devāsaḥ | tanvi | ni | mamṛjuḥ |
dhartāraḥ | divaḥ | ṛbhavaḥ | su-hastāḥ | vātāparjanyā | mahiṣasya | tanyatoḥ |
āpaḥ | oṣadhīḥ | pra | tirantu | naḥ | giraḥ | bhagaḥ | rātiḥ | vājinaḥ | yantu | me | havam |
samudraḥ | sindhuḥ | rajaḥ | antarikṣam | ajaḥ | eka-pāt | tanayitnuḥ | arṇavaḥ |
ahiḥ | budhnyaḥ | śṛṇavat | vacāṁsi | me | viśve | devāsaḥ | uta | sūrayaḥ | mama |
syāma | vaḥ | manavaḥ | deva-vītaye | prāñcam | naḥ | yajñam | pra | nayata | sādhu-yā |
ādityāḥ | rudrāḥ | vasavaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | imā | brahma | śasyamānāni | jinvata |
daivyā | hotārā | prathamā | puraḥ-hitā | ṛtasya | panthām | anu | emi | sādhu-yā |
kṣetrasya | patim | prati-veśam | īmahe | viśvān | devān | amṛtān | apra-yucchataḥ |
vasiṣṭhāsaḥ | pitṛ-vat | vācam | akrata | devān | īḻānāḥ | ṛṣi-vat | svastaye |
prītāḥ-iva | jñātayaḥ | kāmam | ā-itya | asme iti | devāsaḥ | ava | dhūnuta | vasu |
devān | vasiṣṭhaḥ | amṛtān | vavande | ye | viśvā | bhuvanā | abhi | pra-tasthuḥ |
te | naḥ | rāsantām | uru-gāyam | adya | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
imām | dhiyam | sapta-śīrṣṇīm | pitā | naḥ | ṛta-prajātām | bṛhatīm | avindat |
turīyam | svit | janayat | viśva-janyaḥ | ayāsyaḥ | uktham | indrāya | śaṁsan |
ṛtam | śaṁsantaḥ | ṛju | dīdhyānāḥ | divaḥ | putrāsaḥ | asurasya | vīrāḥ |
vipram | padam | aṅgirasaḥ | dadhānāḥ | yajñasya | dhāma | prathamam | mananta |
haṁsaiḥ-iva | sakhi-bhiḥ | vāvadat-bhiḥ | aśman-mayāni | nahanā | vi-asyan |
bṛhaspatiḥ | abhi-kanikradat | gāḥ | uta | pra | astaut | ut | ca | vidvān | agāyat |
avaḥ | dvābhyām | paraḥ | ekayā | gāḥ | guhā | tiṣṭhantīḥ | anṛtasya | setau |
bṛhaspatiḥ | tamasi | jyotiḥ | icchan | ut | usrāḥ | ā | akaḥ | vi | hi | tiśraḥ | āvarityāvaḥ |
vi-bhidya | puram | śayathā | īm | apācīm | niḥ | trīṇi | sākam | uda-dheḥ | akṛntat |
bṛhaspatiḥ | uṣasam | sūryam | gām | arkam | viveda | stanayan-iva | dyauḥ |
indraḥ | valam | rakṣitāram | dughānām | kareṇa-iva | vi | cakarta | raveṇa |
svedāñji-bhiḥ | ā-śiram | icchamānaḥ | arodayat | paṇim | ā | gāḥ | amuṣṇāt |
saḥ | īm | satyebhiḥ | sakhi-bhiḥ | śucat-bhiḥ | go-dhāyasam | vi | dhana-saiḥ | adardarityadardaḥ |
brahmaṇaḥ | patiḥ | vṛṣa-bhiḥ | varāhaiḥ | gharma-svedebhiḥ | draviṇam | vi | ānaṭ |
te | satyena | manasā | go-patim | gāḥ | iyānāsaḥ | iṣaṇayanta | dhībhiḥ |
bṛhaspatiḥ | mithaḥ-avadyapebhiḥ | ut | usriyāḥ | asṛjata | svayuk-bhiḥ |
tam | vardhayantaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | śivābhiḥ | siṁham-iva | nānadatam | sadha-sthe |
bṛhaspatim | vṛṣaṇam | śūra-sātau | bhare-bhare | anu | madema | jiṣṇum |
yadā | vājam | asanat | viśva-rūpam | ā | dyām | arukṣat | ut-tarāṇi | sadma |
bṛhaspatim | vṛṣaṇam | vardhayantaḥ | nānā | santaḥ | bibhrataḥ | jyotiḥ | āsā |
satyām | ā-śiṣam | kṛṇuta | vayaḥ-dhai | kīrim | cit | hi | avatha | svebhiḥ | evaiḥ |
paścā | mṛdhaḥ | apa | bhavantu | viśvāḥ | tat | rodasī iti | śṛṇutam | viśvaminve iti viśvam-inve |
indraḥ | mahnā | mahataḥ | arṇavasya | vi | mūrdhānam | abhinat | arbudasya |
ahan | ahim | ariṇāt | sapta | sindhūn | devaiḥ | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | pra | avatam | naḥ |
uda-prutaḥ | na | vayaḥ | rakṣamāṇāḥ | vāvadataḥ | abhriyasya-iva | ghoṣāḥ |
giri-bhrajaḥ | na | ūrmayaḥ | madantaḥ | bṛhaspatim | abhi | arkāḥ | anāvan |
sam | gobhiḥ | āṅgirasaḥ | nakṣamāṇaḥ | bhagaḥ-iva | it | aryamaṇam | nināya |
jane | mitraḥ | na | daṁpatī iti dam-patī | anakti | bṛhaspate | vājaya | āśūn-iva | ājau |
sādhu-aryāḥ | atithinīḥ | iṣirāḥ | spārhāḥ | su-varṇāḥ | anavadya-rūpāḥ |
bṛhaspatiḥ | parvatebhyaḥ | vi-tūrya | niḥ | gāḥ | ūpe | yavam-iva | sthivi-bhyaḥ |
ā-pruṣāyan | madhunā | ṛtasya | yonim | ava-kṣipan | arkaḥ | ulkām-iva | dyoḥ |
bṛhaspatiḥ | uddharan | aśmanaḥ | gāḥ | bhūmyāḥ | udnā-iva | vi | tvacam | bibheda |
apa | jyotiṣā | tamaḥ | antarikṣāt | udnaḥ | śīpālam-iva | vātaḥ | ājat |
bṛhaspatiḥ | anu-mṛśya | valasya | abhram-iva | vātaḥ | ā | cakre | ā | gāḥ |
yadā | valasya | pīyataḥ | jasum | bhet | bṛhaspatiḥ | agnitapaḥ-bhiḥ | arkaiḥ |
dat-bhiḥ | na | jihvā | pari-viṣṭam | ādat | āviḥ | ni-dhīn | akṛṇot | usriyāṇām |
bṛhaspatiḥ | amata | hi | tyat | āsām | nāma | svarīṇām | sadane | guhā | yat |
āṇḍā-iva | bhittvā | śakunasya | garbham | ut | usriyāḥ | parvatasya | tmanā | ājat |
aśnā | api-naddham | madhu | pari | apaśyat | matsyam | na | dīne | udani | kṣiyantam |
niḥ | tat | jabhāra | camasam | na | vṛkṣāt | bṛhaspatiḥ | vi-raveṇa | vi-kṛtya |
saḥ | uṣām | avindat | saḥ | svariti svaḥ | saḥ | agnim | saḥ | arkeṇa | vi | babādhe | tamāṁsi |
bṛhaspatiḥ | go-vapuṣaḥ | valasya | niḥ | majjānam | na | parvaṇaḥ | jabhāra |
himā-iva | parṇā | muṣitā | vanāni | bṛhaspatinā | akṛpayat | valaḥ | gāḥ |
ananu-kṛtyam | apunariti | cakāra | yāt | sūryāmāsā | mithaḥ | ut-carātaḥ |
abhi | śyāvam | na | kṛśanebhiḥ | aśvam | nakṣatrebhiḥ | pitaraḥ | dyām | apiṁśan |
rātryām | tamaḥ | adadhuḥ | jyotiḥ | ahan | bṛhaspatiḥ | bhinat | adrim | vidat | gāḥ |
idam | akarma | namaḥ | abhriyāya | yaḥ | pūrvīḥ | anu | ā-nonavīti |
bṛhaspatiḥ | saḥ | hi | gobhiḥ | saḥ | aśvaiḥ | saḥ | vīrebhiḥ | saḥ | nṛ-bhiḥ | naḥ | vayaḥ | dhāt |
bhadrāḥ | agneḥ | vadhri-aśvasya | sam-dṛśaḥ | vāmī | pra-nītiḥ | su-raṇāḥ | upa-itayaḥ |
yat | īm | su-mitrāḥ | viśaḥ | agre | indhate | ghṛtena | ā-hutaḥ | jarate | davidyutat |
ghṛtam | agneḥ | vadhri-aśvasya | vardhanam | ghṛtam | annam | ghṛtam | ūm̐ iti | asya | medanam |
ghṛtena | ā-hutaḥ | urviyā | vi | paprathe | sūryaḥ-iva | rocate | sarpiḥ-āsutiḥ |
yat | te | manuḥ | yat | anīkam | su-mitraḥ | sam-īdhe | agne | tat | idam | navīyaḥ |
saḥ | revat | śoca | saḥ | giraḥ | juṣasva | saḥ | vājam | darṣi | saḥ | iha | śravaḥ | dhāḥ |
yam | tvā | pūrvam | īḻitaḥ | vadhri-aśvaḥ | sam-īdhe | agne | saḥ | idam | juṣasva |
saḥ | naḥ | sti-pāḥ | uta | bhava | tanū-pāḥ | dātram | rakṣasva | yat | idam | te | asme iti |
bhava | dyumnī | vādhri-aśva | uta | gopāḥ | mā | tvā | tārīt | abhi-mātiḥ | janānām |
śūraḥ-iva | ghṛṣṇuḥ | cyavanaḥ | su-mitraḥ | pra | nu | vocam | vādhri-aśvasya | nāma |
sam | ajryā | parvatyā | vasūni | dāsā | vṛtrāṇi | āryā | jigetha |
śūraḥ-iva | ghṛṣṇuḥ | cyavanaḥ | janānām | tvam | agne | pṛtanā-yūn | abhi | syāḥ |
dīrgha-tantuḥ | bṛhat-ukṣā | ayam | agniḥ | sahasra-starīḥ | śata-nīthaḥ | ṛbhvā |
dyu-mān | dyumat-su | nṛ-bhiḥ | mṛjyamānaḥ | su-mitreṣu | dīdayaḥ | devayat-su |
tve iti | dhenuḥ | su-dughā | jāta-vedaḥ | asaścatā-iva | samanā | sabaḥ-dhuk |
tvam | nṛ-bhiḥ | dakṣiṇāvat-bhiḥ | agne | su-mitrebhiḥ | idhyase | devayat-bhiḥ |
devāḥ | cit | te | amṛtāḥ | jāta-vedaḥ | mahimānam | vādhri-aśva | pra | vocan |
yat | sam-pṛccham | mānuṣīḥ | viśaḥ | āyan | tvam | nṛ-bhiḥ | ajayaḥ | tvā-vṛdhebhiḥ |
pitā-iva | putram | abibhaḥ | upa-sthe | tvām | agne | vadhri-aśvaḥ | saparyan |
juṣāṇaḥ | asya | sam-idham | yaviṣṭha | uta | pūrvān | avanoḥ | vrādhataḥ | cit |
śaśvat | agniḥ | vadhri-aśvasya | śatrūn | nṛ-bhiḥ | jigāya | sutasomavat-bhiḥ |
samanam | cit | adahaḥ | citrabhāno iti citra-bhāno | ava | vrādhantam | abhinat | vṛdhaḥ | cit |
ayam | agniḥ | vadhri-aśvasya | vṛtra-hā | sanakāt | pra-iddhaḥ | namasā | upa-vākyaḥ |
saḥ | naḥ | ajāmīn | uta | vā | vi-jāmīn | abhi | tiṣṭha | śardhataḥ | vādhri-aśva |
imām | me | agne | sam-idham | juṣasva | iḻaḥ | pade | prati | harya | ghṛtācīm |
varṣman | pṛthivyāḥ | sudina-tve | ahnām | ūrdhvaḥ | bhava | sukrato iti su-krato | deva-yajyā |
ā | devānām | agra-yāvā | iha | yātu | narāśaṁsaḥ | viśva-rūpebhiḥ | aśvaiḥ |
ṛtasya | pathā | namasā | miyedhaḥ | devebhyaḥ | deva-tamaḥ | susūdat |
śaśvat-tamam | īḻate | dūtyāya | haviṣmantaḥ | manuṣyāsaḥ | agnim |
vahiṣṭhaiḥ | aśvaiḥ | su-vṛtā | rathena | ā | devān | vakṣi | ni | sada | iha | hotā |
vi | prathatām | deva-juṣṭam | tiraścā | dīrgham | drāghmā | surabhi | bhūtu | asme iti |
aheḻatā | manasā | deva | barhiḥ | indra-jyeṣṭhān | uśataḥ | yakṣi | devān |
divaḥ | vā | sānu | spṛśata | varīyaḥ | pṛthivyā | vā | mātrayā | vi | śrayadhvam |
uśatīḥ | dvāraḥ | mahinā | mahat-bhiḥ | devam | ratham | ratha-yuḥ | dhārayadhvam |
devī iti | divaḥ | duhitarā | suśilpe iti su-śilpe | uṣasānaktā | sadatām | ni | yonau |
ā | vām | devāsaḥ | uśatī iti | uśantaḥ | urau | sīdantu | subhage iti su-bhage | upa-sthe |
ūrdhvaḥ | grāvā | bṛhat | agniḥ | sam-iddhaḥ | priyā | dhāmāni | aditeḥ | upa-sthe |
puraḥ-hitau | ṛtvijā | yajñe | asmin | viduḥ-tarā | draviṇam | ā | yajethām |
tisraḥ | devīḥ | barhiḥ | idam | varīyaḥ | ā | sīdata | cakṛma | vaḥ | syonam |
manuṣvat | yajñam | su-dhitā | havīṁṣi | iḻā | devī | ghṛta-padī | juṣanta |
deva | tvaṣṭaḥ | yat | ha | cāru-tvam | ānaṭ | yat | aṅgirasām | abhavaḥ | sacā-bhūḥ |
saḥ | devānām | pāthaḥ | upa | pra | vidvān | uśan | yakṣi | draviṇaḥ-daḥ | su-ratnaḥ |
vanaspate | raśanayā | ni-yūya | devānām | pāthaḥ | upa | vakṣi | vidvān |
svadāti | devaḥ | kṛṇavat | havīṁṣi | avatām | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | havam | me |
ā | agne | vaha | varuṇam | iṣṭaye | naḥ | indram | divaḥ | marutaḥ | antarikṣāt |
sīdantu | barhiḥ | viśve | ā | yajatrāḥ | svāhā | devāḥ | amṛtāḥ | mādayantām |
bṛhaspate | prathamam | vācaḥ | agram | yat | pra | airata | nāma-dheyam | dadhānāḥ |
yat | eṣām | śreṣṭham | yat | aripram | āsīt | preṇā | tat | eṣām | ni-hitam | guhā | āviḥ |
saktum-iva | titaunā | punantaḥ | yatra | dhīrāḥ | manasā | vācam | akrata |
atra | sakhāyaḥ | sakhyāni | jānate | bhadrā | eṣām | lakṣmīḥ | ni-hitā | adhi | vāci |
yajñena | vācaḥ | pada-vīyam | āyan | tām | anu | avindan | ṛṣiṣu | pra-viṣṭām |
tām | ā-bhṛtya | vi | adadhuḥ | puru-trā | tām | sapta | rebhāḥ | abhi | sam | navante |
uta | tvaḥ | paśyan | na | dadarśa | vācam | uta | tvaḥ | śṛṇvan | na | śṛṇoti | enām |
uto iti | tvasmai | tanvam | vi | sasre | jāyā-iva | patye | uśatī | su-vāsāḥ |
uta | tvam | sakhye | sthira-pītam | āhuḥ | na | enam | hinvanti | api | vājineṣu |
adhenvā | carati | māyayā | eṣaḥ | vācam | śuśru-vān | aphalām | āpuṣpām |
yaḥ | tityāja | saci-vidam | sakhāyam | na | tasya | vāci | api | bhāgaḥ | asti |
yat | īm | śṛṇoti | alakam | śṛṇoti | nahi | pra-veda | su-kṛtasya | panthām |
akṣaṇ-vantaḥ | karṇa-vantaḥ | sakhāyaḥ | manaḥ-javeṣu | asamāḥ | babhūvuḥ |
ādaghnāsaḥ | upa-kakṣāsaḥ | ūm̐ iti | tve | hradāḥ-iva | snātvāḥ | ūm̐ iti | tve | dadṛśre |
hṛdā | taṣṭeṣu | manasaḥ | javeṣu | yat | brāhmaṇāḥ | sam-yajante | sakhāyaḥ |
atra | aha | tvam | vi | jahuḥ | vedyābhiḥ | oha-brahmāṇaḥ | vi | caranti | ūm̐ iti | tve |
ime | ye | na | arvāk | na | paraḥ | caranti | na | brāhmaṇāsaḥ | na | sute-karāsaḥ |
te | ete | vācam | abhi-padya | pāpayā | sirīḥ | tantram | tanvate | apra-jajñayaḥ |
sarve | nandanti | yaśasā | ā-gatena | sabhā-sahena | sakhyā | sakhāyaḥ |
kilbiṣa-spṛt | pitu-saniḥ | hi | eṣām | aram | hitaḥ | bhavati | vājināya |
ṛcām | tvaḥ | poṣam | āste | pupuṣvān | gāyatram | tvaḥ | gāyati | śakvarīṣu |
brahmā | tvaḥ | vadati | jāta-vidyām | yajñasya | mātrām | vi | mimīte | ūm̐ iti | tvaḥ |
devānām | nu | vayam | jānā | pra | vocāma | vipanyayā |
uktheṣu | śasyamāneṣu | yaḥ | paśyāt | ut-tare | yuge |
brahmaṇaḥ | patiḥ | etā | sam | karmāraḥ-iva | adhamat |
devānām | pūrvye | yuge | asataḥ | sat | ajāyata |
devānām | yuge | prathame | asataḥ | sat | ajāyata |
tat | āśāḥ | anu | ajāyanta | tat | uttāna-padaḥ | pari |
bhūḥ | jajñe | uttāna-padaḥ | bhuvaḥ | āśāḥ | ajāyanta |
aditeḥ | dakṣaḥ | ajāyata | dakṣāt | ūm̐ iti | aditiḥ | pari |
aditiḥ | hi | ajaniṣṭa | dakṣa | yā | duhitā | tava |
tām | devāḥ | anu | ajāyanta | bhadrāḥ | amṛta-bandhavaḥ |
yat | devāḥ | adaḥ | salile | su-saṁrabdhāḥ | atiṣṭhata |
atra | vaḥ | nṛtyatām-iva | tīvraḥ | reṇuḥ | apa | āyata |
yat | devāḥ | yatayaḥ | yathā | bhuvanāni | apinvata |
atra | samudre | ā | gūḻham | ā | sūryam | ajabhartana |
aṣṭau | putrāsaḥ | aditeḥ | ye | jātāḥ | tanvaḥ | pari |
devān | upa | pra | ait | sapta-bhiḥ | parā | mārtāṇḍam | āsyat |
sapta-bhiḥ | putraiḥ | aditiḥ | upa | pra | ait | pūrvyam | yugam |
pra-jāyai | mṛtyave | tvat | punaḥ | mārtāṇḍam | ā | abharat |
janiṣṭhāḥ | ugraḥ | sahase | turāya | mandraḥ | ojiṣṭhaḥ | bahula-abhimānaḥ |
avardhan | indram | marutaḥ | cit | atra | mātā | yat | vīram | dadhanat | dhaniṣṭhā |
druhaḥ | ni-sattā | pṛśanī | cit | evaiḥ | puru | śaṁsena | vavṛdhuḥ | te | indram |
abhivṛtā-iva | tā | mahā-padena | dhvāntāt | pra-pitvāt | ut | aranta | garbhāḥ |
ṛṣvā | te | pādā | pra | yat | jigāsi | avardhan | vājāḥ | uta | ye | cit | atra |
tvam | indra | sālāvṛkān | sahasram | āsan | dadhiṣe | aśvinā | ā | vavṛtyāḥ |
samanā | tūrṇiḥ | upa | yāsi | yajñam | ā | nāsatyā | sakhyāya | vakṣi |
vasāvyām | indra | dhārayaḥ | sahasrā | aśvinā | śūra | dadatuḥ | maghāni |
mandamānaḥ | ṛtāt | adhi | pra-jāyai | sakhi-bhiḥ | indraḥ | iṣirebhiḥ | artham |
ā | ābhiḥ | hi | māyāḥ | upa | dasyum | ā | agāt | mihaḥ | pra | tamrāḥ | avapat | tamāṁsi |
sa-nāmānā | cit | dhvasayaḥ | ni | asmai | ava | ahan | indraḥ | uṣasaḥ | yathā | anaḥ |
ṛṣvaiḥ | agacchaḥ | sakhi-bhiḥ | ni-kāmaiḥ | sākam | prati-sthā | hṛdyā | jaghantha |
tvam | jaghantha | namucim | makhasyum | dāsam | kṛṇvānaḥ | ṛṣaye | vi-māyam |
tvam | cakartha | manave | syonān | pathaḥ | deva-trā | añjasā-iva | yānān |
tvam | etāni | papriṣe | vi | nāma | īśānaḥ | indra | dadhiṣe | gabhastau |
anu | tvā | devāḥ | śavasā | madanti | upari-budhnān | vaninaḥ | cakartha |
cakram | yat | asya | ap-su | ā | ni-sattam | uto iti | tat | asmai | madhu | it | cacchadyāt |
pṛthivyām | ati-sitam | yat | ūdhaḥ | payaḥ | goṣu | adadhāḥ | oṣadhīṣu |
aśvāt | iyāya | iti | yat | vadanti | ojasaḥ | jātam | uta | manye | enam |
manyoḥ | iyāya | harmyeṣu | tasthau | yataḥ | pra-jajñe | indraḥ | asya | veda |
vayaḥ | su-parṇāḥ | upa | seduḥ | indram | priya-medhāḥ | ṛṣayaḥ | nādhamānāḥ |
apa | dhvāntam | ūrṇuhi | pūrdhi | cakṣuḥ | mumugdhi | asmān | nidhayā-iva | baddhān |
vasūnām | vā | carkṛṣe | iyakṣan | dhiyā | vā | yajñaiḥ | vā | rodasyoḥ |
arvantaḥ | vā | ye | rayi-mantaḥ | sātau | vanum | vā | ye | su-śruṇam | su-śrutaḥ | dhuriti dhuḥ |
havaḥ | eṣām | asuraḥ | nakṣata | dyām | śravasyatā | manasā | niṁsata | kṣām |
cakṣāṇāḥ | yatra | suvitāya | devāḥ | dyauḥ | na | vārebhiḥ | kṛṇavanta | svaiḥ |
iyam | eṣām | amṛtānām | gīḥ | sarva-tātā | ye | kṛpaṇanta | ratnam |
dhiyam | ca | yajñam | ca | sādhantaḥ | te | naḥ | dhāntu | vasavyam | asāmi |
ā | tat | te | indra | āyavaḥ | pananta | abhi | ye | ūrvam | go-mantam | titṛtsān |
sakṛt-svam | ye | puru-putrām | mahīm | sahasra-dhārām | bṛhatīm | dudhukṣan |
śacī-vaḥ | indram | avase | kṛṇudhvam | anānatam | damayantam | pṛtanyūn |
ṛbhukṣaṇam | magha-vānam | su-vṛktim | bhartā | yaḥ | vajram | naryam | puru-kṣuḥ |
yat | vavāna | puru-tamam | purāṣāṭ | ā | vṛtra-hā | indraḥ | nāmāni | aprāḥ |
aceti | pra-sahaḥ | patiḥ | tuviṣmān | yat | īm | uśmasi | kartave | karat | tat |
pra | su | vaḥ | āpaḥ | mahimānam | ut-tamam | kāruḥ | vocāti | sadane | vivasvataḥ |
pra | sapta-sapta | tredhā | hi | cakramuḥ | pra | sṛtvarīṇām | ati | sindhuḥ | ojasā |
pra | te | aradat | varuṇaḥ | yātave | pathaḥ | sindho iti | yat | vājān | abhi | adravaḥ | tvam |
bhūmyāḥ | adhi | pra-vatā | yāsi | sānunā | yat | eṣām | agram | jagatām | irajyasi |
divi | svanaḥ | yatate | bhūmyā | upari | anantam | śuṣmam | ut | iyarti | bhānunā |
abhrāt-iva | pra | stanayanti | vṛṣṭayaḥ | sindhuḥ | yat | eti | vṛṣabhaḥ | na | roruvat |
abhi | tvā | sindho iti | śiśum | it | na | mātaraḥ | vāśrāḥ | arṣanti | payasā-iva | dhenavaḥ |
rājā-iva | yudhvā | nayasi | tvam | it | sicau | yat | āsām | agram | pra-vatām | inakṣasi |
imam | me | gaṅge | yamune | sarasvati | śutudri | stomam | sacata | paruṣṇi | ā |
asiknyā | marut-vṛdhe | vitastayā | ārjīkīye | śṛṇuhi | ā | su-somayā |
tṛṣṭa-amayā | prathamam | yātave | sa-jūḥ | su-sartvā | rasayā | śvetyā | tyā |
tvam | sindho iti | kubhayā | go-matīm | krumum | mehatnvā | sa-ratham | yābhiḥ | īyase |
ṛjītī | enī | ruśatī | mahi-tvā | pari | jrayāṁsi | bharate | rajāṁsi |
adabdhā | sindhuḥ | apasām | apaḥ-tamā | aśvā | na | citrā | vapuṣī-iva | darśatā |
su-aśvā | sindhuḥ | su-rathā | su-vāsāḥ | hiraṇyayī | su-kṛtā | vājinī-vatī |
ūrṇā-vatī | yuvatiḥ | sīlamā-vatī | uta | adhi | vaste | su-bhagā | madhu-vṛdham |
su-kham | ratham | yuyuje | sindhuḥ | aśvinam | tena | vājam | saniṣat | asmin | ājau |
mahān | hi | asya | mahimā | panasyate | adabdhasya | sva-yaśasaḥ | vi-rapśinaḥ |
ā | vaḥ | ṛñjase | ūrjām | vi-uṣṭiṣu | indram | marutaḥ | rodasī iti | anaktana |
ubhe iti | yathā | naḥ | ahanī iti | sacā-bhuvā | sadaḥ-sadaḥ | varivasyātaḥ | ut-bhidā |
tat | ūm̐ iti | śreṣṭham | savanam | sunotana | atyaḥ | na | hasta-yataḥ | adriḥ | sotari |
vidat | hi | aryaḥ | abhi-bhūti | pauṁsyam | mahaḥ | rāye | cit | tarute | yat | arvataḥ |
tat | it | hi | asya | savanam | viveḥ | apaḥ | yathā | purā | manave | gātum | aśret |
go-arṇasi | tvāṣṭre | aśva-nirniji | pra | īm | adhvareṣu | adhvarān | aśiśrayuḥ |
apa | hata | rakṣasaḥ | bhaṅgura-vataḥ | skabhāyata | niḥ-ṛtim | sedhata | amatim |
ā | naḥ | rayim | sarva-vīram | sunotana | deva-avyam | bharata | ślokam | adrayaḥ |
divaḥ | cit | ā | vaḥ | amavat-tarebhyaḥ | vi-bhvanā | cit | āśvapaḥ-tarebhyaḥ |
vāyoḥ | cit | ā | somarabhaḥ-tarebhyaḥ | agneḥ | cit | arca | pitukṛt-tarebhyaḥ |
bhurantu | naḥ | yaśasaḥ | sotu | andhasaḥ | grāvāṇaḥ | vācā | divitā | divitmatā |
naraḥ | yatra | duhate | kāmyam | madhu | ā-ghoṣayantaḥ | abhitaḥ | mithaḥ-turaḥ |
sunvanti | somam | rathirāsaḥ | adrayaḥ | niḥ | asya | rasam | go-iṣaḥ | duhanti | te |
duhanti | ūdhaḥ | upa-secanāya | kam | naraḥ | havyā | na | marjayante | āsa-bhiḥ |
ete | naraḥ | su-apasaḥ | abhūtana | ye | indrāya | sunutha | somam | adrayaḥ |
vāmam-vāmam | vaḥ | divyāya | dhāmne | vasu-vasu | vaḥ | pārthivāya | sunvate |
abhra-pruṣaḥ | na | vācā | pruṣa | vasu | haviṣmantaḥ | na | yajñāḥ | vi-jānuṣaḥ |
su-mārutam | na | brahmāṇam | arhase | gaṇam | astoṣi | eṣām | na | śobhase |
śriye | maryāsaḥ | añjīn | akṛṇvata | su-mārutam | na | pūrvīḥ | ati | kṣapaḥ |
divaḥ | putrāsaḥ | etāḥ | na | yetire | ādityāsaḥ | te | akrāḥ | na | vavṛdhuḥ |
pra | ye | divaḥ | pṛthivyāḥ | na | barhaṇā | tmanā | riricre | abhrāt | na | sūryaḥ |
pājasvantaḥ | na | vīrāḥ | panasyavaḥ | riśādasaḥ | na | maryāḥ | abhi-dyavaḥ |
yuṣmākam | budhne | apām | na | yāmani | vithuryati | na | mahī | śratharyati |
viśva-psuḥ | yajñaḥ | arvāk | ayam | su | vaḥ | prayasvantaḥ | na | satrācaḥ | ā | gata |
yūyam | dhūḥ-su | pra-yujaḥ | na | raśmi-bhiḥ | jyotiṣmantaḥ | na | bhāsā | vi-uṣṭiṣu |
śyenāsaḥ | na | sva-yaśasaḥ | riśādasaḥ | pravāsaḥ | na | pra-sitāsaḥ | pari-pruṣaḥ |
pra | yat | vahadhve | marutaḥ | parākāt | yūyam | mahaḥ | sam-varaṇasya | vasvaḥ |
vidānāsaḥ | vasavaḥ | rādhyasya | ārāt | cit | dveṣaḥ | sanutaḥ | yuyota |
yaḥ | ut-ṛci | yajñe | adhvare-sthāḥ | marut-bhyaḥ | na | mānuṣaḥ | dadāśat |
revat | saḥ | vayaḥ | dadhate | su-vīram | saḥ | devānām | api | go-pīthe | astu |
te | hi | yajñeṣu | yajñiyāsaḥ | ūmāḥ | ādityena | nāmnā | śam-bhaviṣṭhāḥ |
te | naḥ | avantu | ratha-tūḥ | manīṣām | mahaḥ | ca | yāman | adhvare | cakānāḥ |
viprāsaḥ | na | manma-bhiḥ | su-ādhyaḥ | deva-avyaḥ | na | yajñaiḥ | su-apnasaḥ |
rājānaḥ | na | citrāḥ | su-saṁdṛśaḥ | kṣitīnām | na | maryāḥ | arepasaḥ |
agniḥ | na | ye | bhrājasā | rukma-vakṣasaḥ | vātāsaḥ | na | sva-yujaḥ | sadyaḥ-ūtayaḥ |
pra-jñātāraḥ | na | jyeṣṭhāḥ | su-nītayaḥ | su-śarmāṇaḥ | na | somāḥ | ṛtam | yate |
vātāsaḥ | na | ye | dhunayaḥ | jigatnavaḥ | agnīnām | na | jihvāḥ | vi-rokiṇaḥ |
varmaṇ-vantaḥ | na | yodhāḥ | śimī-vantaḥ | pitṝṇām | na | śaṁsāḥ | su-rātayaḥ |
rathānām | na | ye | arāḥ | sa-nābhayaḥ | jigīvāṁsaḥ | na | śūrāḥ | abhi-dyavaḥ |
vare-yavaḥ | na | maryāḥ | ghṛta-pruṣaḥ | abhi-svartāraḥ | arkam | na | su-stubhaḥ |
aśvāsaḥ | na | ye | jyeṣṭhāsaḥ | āśavaḥ | didhiṣavaḥ | na | rathyaḥ | su-dānavaḥ |
āpaḥ | na | nimnaiḥ | uda-bhiḥ | jigatnavaḥ | viśva-rūpāḥ | aṅgirasaḥ | na | sāma-bhiḥ |
grāvāṇaḥ | na | sūrayaḥ | sindhu-mātaraḥ | ā-dardirāsaḥ | adrayaḥ | na | viśvahā |
śiśūlāḥ | na | krīḻayaḥ | su-mātaraḥ | mahā-grāmaḥ | na | yāman | uta | tviṣā |
uṣasām | na | ketavaḥ | adhvara-śriyaḥ | śubham-yavaḥ | na | añji-bhiḥ | vi | aśvitan |
sindhavaḥ | na | yayiyaḥ | bhrājat-ṛṣṭayaḥ | parā-vataḥ | na | yojanāni | mamire |
su-bhāgān | naḥ | devāḥ | kṛṇuta | su-ratnān | asmān | stotṝn | marutaḥ | vavṛdhānāḥ |
adhi | stotrasya | sakhyasya | gāta | sanāt | hi | vaḥ | ratna-dheyāni | santi |
apaśyam | asya | mahataḥ | mahi-tvam | amartyasya | martyāsu | vikṣu |
nānā | hanū iti | vibhṛte iti vi-bhṛte | sam | bharete iti | asinvatī iti | bapsatī iti | bhūri | attaḥ |
guhā | śiraḥ | ni-hitam | ṛdhak | akṣī iti | asinvan | atti | jihvayā | vanāni |
atrāṇi | asmai | paṭ-bhiḥ | sam | bharanti | uttāna-hastāḥ | namasā | adhi | vikṣu |
pra | mātuḥ | pra-taram | guhyam | icchan | kumāraḥ | na | vīrudhaḥ | sarpat | urvīḥ |
sasam | na | pakvam | avidat | śucantam | ririhvāṁsam | ripaḥ | upa-sthe | antariti |
tat | vām | ṛtam | rodasī iti | pra | bravīmi | jāyamānaḥ | mātarā | garbhaḥ | atti |
na | aham | devasya | martyaḥ | ciketa | agniḥ | aṅga | vi-cetāḥ | saḥ | pra-cetāḥ |
yaḥ | asmai | annam | tṛṣu | ā-dadhāti | ājyaiḥ | ghṛtaiḥ | juhoti | puṣyati |
tasmai | sahasram | akṣa-bhiḥ | vi | cakṣe | agne | viśvataḥ | pratyaṅ | asi | tvam |
kim | deveṣu | tyajaḥ | enaḥ | cakartha | agne | pṛcchāmi | nu | tvām | avidvān |
akrīḻan | krīḻan | hariḥ | attave | adan | vi | parva-śaḥ | cakarta | gām-iva | asiḥ |
viṣūcaḥ | aśvān | yuyuje | vane-jāḥ | ṛjīti-bhiḥ | raśanābhiḥ | gṛbhītān |
cakṣade | mitraḥ | vasu-bhiḥ | su-jātaḥ | sam | ānṛdhe | parva-bhiḥ | vavṛdhānaḥ |
agniḥ | saptim | vājam-bharam | dadāti | agniḥ | vīram | śrutyam | karmaniḥ-sthām |
agniḥ | rodasī iti | vi | carat | sam-añjan | agniḥ | nārīm | vīra-kukṣim | puram-dhim |
agneḥ | apnasaḥ | sam-it | astu | bhadrā | agniḥ | mahī iti | rodasī iti | ā | viveśa |
agniḥ | ekam | codayat | samat-su | agniḥ | vṛtrāṇi | dayate | purūṇi |
agniḥ | ha | tyam | jarataḥ | karṇam | āva | agniḥ | at-bhyaḥ | niḥ | adahat | jarūtham |
agniḥ | atrim | gharme | uruṣyat | antaḥ | agniḥ | nṛ-medham | pra-jayā | asṛjat | sam |
agniḥ | dāt | draviṇam | vīra-peśāḥ | agniḥ | ṛṣim | yaḥ | sahasrā | sanoti |
agniḥ | divi | havyam | ā | tatāna | agneḥ | dhāmāni | vi-bhṛtā | puru-trā |
agnim | ukthaiḥ | ṛṣayaḥ | vi | hvayante | agnim | naraḥ | yāmani | bādhitāsaḥ |
agnim | vayaḥ | antarikṣe | patantaḥ | agniḥ | sahasrā | pari | yāti | gonām |
agnim | viśaḥ | īḻate | mānuṣīḥ | yāḥ | agnim | manuṣaḥ | nahuṣaḥ | vi | jātāḥ |
agniḥ | gāndharvīm | pathyām | ṛtasya | agneḥ | gavyūtiḥ | ghṛte | ā | ni-sattā |
agnaye | brahma | ṛbhavaḥ | tatakṣuḥ | agnim | mahām | avocāma | su-vṛktim |
agne | pra | ava | jaritāram | yaviṣṭha | agne | mahi | draviṇam | ā | yajasva |
yaḥ | imā | viśvā | bhuvanāni | juhvat | ṛṣiḥ | hotā | ni | asīdat | pitā | naḥ |
saḥ | ā-śiṣā | draviṇam | icchamānaḥ | prathama-chat | avarān | ā | viveśa |
kim | svit | āsīt | adhi-sthānam | ā-rambhaṇam | katamat | svit | kathā | āsīt |
yataḥ | bhūmim | janayan | viśva-karmā | vi | dyām | aurṇot | mahinā | viśva-cakṣāḥ |
viśvataḥ-cakṣuḥ | uta | viśvataḥ-mukhaḥ | viśvataḥ-bāhuḥ | uta | viśvataḥ-pāt |
sam | bāhu-bhyām | dhamati | sam | patatraiḥ | dyāvābhūmī iti | janayan | devaḥ | ekaḥ |
kim | svit | vanam | kaḥ | ūm̐ iti | saḥ | vṛkṣaḥ | āsa | yataḥ | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | niḥ-tatakṣuḥ |
manīṣiṇaḥ | manasā | pṛcchata | it | ūm̐ iti | tat | yat | adhi-atiṣṭhat | bhuvanāni | dhārayan |
yā | te | dhāmāni | paramāṇi | yā | avamā | yā | madhyamā | viśva-karman | uta | imā |
śikṣa | sakhi-bhyaḥ | haviṣi | svadhā-vaḥ | svayam | yajasva | tanvam | vṛdhānaḥ |
viśva-karman | haviṣā | vavṛdhānaḥ | svayam | yajasva | pṛthivīm | uta | dyām |
muhyantu | anye | abhitaḥ | janāsaḥ | iha | asmākam | magha-vā | sūriḥ | astu |
vācaḥ | patim | viśva-karmāṇam | ūtaye | manaḥ-juvam | vāje | adya | huvema |
saḥ | naḥ | viśvāni | havanāni | joṣat | viśva-śambhūḥ | avase | sādhu-karmā |
cakṣuṣaḥ | pitā | manasā | hi | dhīraḥ | ghṛtam | ene iti | ajanat | namnamāne iti |
yadā | it | antāḥ | adadṛhanta | pūrve | āt | it | dyāvāpṛthivī iti | aprathetām |
viśva-karmā | vi-manāḥ | āt | vi-hāyāḥ | dhātā | vi-dhātā | paramā | uta | sam-dṛk |
teṣām | iṣṭāni | sam | iṣā | madanti | yatra | sapta-ṛṣīn | paraḥ | ekam | āhuḥ |
yaḥ | naḥ | pitā | janitā | yaḥ | vi-dhātā | dhāmāni | veda | bhuvanāni | viśvā |
yaḥ | devānām | nāma-dhāḥ | ekaḥ | eva | tam | sam-praśnam | bhuvanā | yanti | anyā |
te | ā | ayajanta | draviṇam | sam | asmai | ṛṣayaḥ | pūrve | jaritāraḥ | na | bhūnā |
asūrte | sūrte | rajasi | ni-satte | ye | bhūtāni | sam-akṛṇvan | imāni |
paraḥ | divā | paraḥ | enā | pṛthivyā | paraḥ | devebhiḥ | asuraiḥ | yat | asti |
kam | svit | garbham | prathamam | dadhre | āpaḥ | yatra | devāḥ | sam-apaśyanta | viśve |
tam | it | garbham | prathamam | dadhre | āpaḥ | yatra | devāḥ | sam-agacchanta | viśve |
ajasya | nābhau | adhi | ekam | arpitam | yasmin | viśvāni | bhuvanāni | tasthuḥ |
na | tam | vidātha | yaḥ | imā | jajāna | anyat | yuṣmākam | antaram | babhūva |
nīhāreṇa | prāvṛtāḥ | jalpyā | ca | asu-tṛpaḥ | uktha-śasaḥ | caranti |
yaḥ | te | manyo iti | avidhat | vajra | sāyaka | sahaḥ | ojaḥ | puṣyati | viśvam | ānuṣak |
sahyāma | dāsam | āryam | tvayā | yujā | sahaḥ-kṛtena | sahasā | sahasvatā |
manyuḥ | indraḥ | manyuḥ | eva | āsa | devaḥ | manyuḥ | hotā | varuṇaḥ | jāta-vedāḥ |
manyum | viśaḥ | īḻate | mānuṣīḥ | yāḥ | pāhi | naḥ | manyo iti | tapasā | sa-joṣāḥ |
abhi | ihi | manyo iti | tavasaḥ | tavīyān | tapasā | yujā | vi | jahi | śatrūn |
amitra-hā | vṛtra-hā | dasyu-hā | ca | viśvā | vasūni | ā | bhara | tvam | naḥ |
tvam | hi | manyo iti | abhibhūti-ojāḥ | svayam-bhūḥ | bhāmaḥ | abhimāti-sahaḥ |
viśva-carṣaṇiḥ | sahuriḥ | sahāvān | asmāsu | ojaḥ | pṛtanāsu | dhehi |
abhāgaḥ | san | apa | parā-itaḥ | asmi | tava | kratvā | taviṣasya | praceta iti pra-cetaḥ |
tam | tvā | manyo iti | akratuḥ | jihīḻa | aham | svā | tanūḥ | bala-deyāya | mā | ā | ihi |
ayam | te | asmi | upa | mā | ā | ihi | arvāṅ | pratīcīnaḥ | sahure | viśva-dhāyaḥ |
manyo iti | vajrin | abhi | mām | ā | vavṛtsva | hanāva | dasyūn | uta | bodhi | āpeḥ |
abhi | pra | ihi | dakṣiṇataḥ | bhava | me | adha | vṛtrāṇi | jaṅghanāva | bhūri |
juhomi | te | dharuṇam | madhvaḥ | agram | ubhau | upa-aṁśu | prathamā | pibāva |
tvayā | manyo iti | sa-ratham | ā-rujantaḥ | harṣamāṇāsaḥ | dhṛṣitāḥ | marutvaḥ |
tigma-iṣavaḥ | āyudhā | sam-śiśānāḥ | abhi | pra | yantu | naraḥ | agni-rūpāḥ |
agniḥ-iva | manyo iti | tviṣitaḥ | sahasva | senā-nīḥ | naḥ | sahure | hūtaḥ | edhi |
hatvāya | śatrūn | vi | bhajasva | vedaḥ | ojaḥ | mimānaḥ | vi | mṛdhaḥ | nudasva |
sahasva | manyo iti | abhi-mātim | asme iti | rujan | mṛṇan | pra-mṛṇan | pra | ihi | śatrūn |
ugram | te | pājaḥ | nanu | ā | rurudhre | vaśī | vaśam | nayase | eka-ja | tvam |
ekaḥ | bahūnām | asi | manyo iti | īḻitaḥ | viśam-viśam | yudhaye | sam | śiśādhi |
akṛtta-ruk | tvayā | yujā | vayam | dyu-mantam | ghoṣam | vi-jayāya | kṛṇmahe |
vijeṣa-kṛt | indraḥ-iva | anava-bravaḥ | asmākam | manyo iti | adhi-pāḥ | bhava | iha |
priyam | te | nāma | sahure | gṛṇīmasi | vidma | tam | utsam | yataḥ | ā-babhūtha |
ā-bhūtyā | saha-jāḥ | vajra | sāyaka | sahaḥ | bibharṣi | abhi-bhūte | ut-taram |
kratvā | naḥ | manyo iti | saha | medī | edhi | mahā-dhanasya | puru-hūta | sam-sṛji |
sam-sṛṣṭam | dhanam | ubhayam | sam-ākṛtam | asmabhyam | dattām | varuṇaḥ | ca | manyuḥ |
bhiyam | dadhānāḥ | hṛdayeṣu | śatravaḥ | parā-jitāsaḥ | apa | ni | layantām |
satyena | uttabhitā | bhūmiḥ | sūryeṇa | uttabhitā | dyauḥ |
ṛtena | ādityāḥ | tiṣṭhanti | divi | somaḥ | adhi | śritaḥ |
somena | ādityāḥ | balinaḥ | somena | pṛthivī | mahī |
atho iti | nakṣatrāṇām | eṣām | upa-sthe | somaḥ | ā-hitaḥ |
somam | manyate | papi-vān | yat | sam-piṁṣanti | oṣadhim |
somam | yam | brahmāṇaḥ | viduḥ | na | tasya | aśnāti | kaḥ | cana |
ācchat-vidhānaiḥ | gupitaḥ | bārhataiḥ | soma | rakṣitaḥ |
grāvṇām | it | śṛṇvan | tiṣṭhasi | na | te | aśnāti | pārthivaḥ |
yat | tvā | deva | pra-pibanti | tataḥ | ā | pyāyase | punariti |
vāyuḥ | somasya | rakṣitā | samānām | māsaḥ | ā-kṛtiḥ |
raibhī | āsīt | anu-deyī | nārāśaṁsī | ni-ocanī |
sūryāyāḥ | bhadram | it | vāsaḥ | gāthayā | eti | pari-kṛtam |
cittiḥ | āḥ | upa-barhaṇam | cakṣuḥ | āḥ | abhi-añjanam |
dyauḥ | bhūmiḥ | kośaḥ | āsīt | yat | ayāt | sūryā | patim |
stomāḥ | āsan | prati-dhayaḥ | kurīram | chandaḥ | opaśaḥ |
sūryāyāḥ | aśvinā | varā | agniḥ | āsīt | puraḥ-gavaḥ |
somaḥ | vadhū-yuḥ | abhavat | aśvinā | āstām | ubhā | varā |
sūryām | yat | patye | śaṁsantīm | manasā | savitā | adadāt |
manaḥ | asyāḥ | anaḥ | āsīt | dyauḥ | āsīt | uta | chadiḥ |
śukrau | anaḍvāhau | āstām | yat | ayāt | sūryā | gṛham |
ṛk-sāmābhyām | abhi-hitau | gāvau | te | sāmanau | itaḥ |
śrotram | te | cakre iti | āstām | divi | panthāḥ | carācaraḥ |
śucī iti | te | cakre iti | yātyāḥ | vi-ānaḥ | akṣaḥ | ā-hataḥ |
anaḥ | manasmayam | sūryā | ā | arohat | pra-yatī | patim |
sūryāyāḥ | vahatuḥ | pra | agāt | savitā | yam | ava-asṛjat |
aghāsu | hanyante | gāvaḥ | arjunyoḥ | pari | uhyate |
yat | aśvinā | pṛcchamānau | ayātam | tri-cakreṇa | vahatum | sūryāyāḥ |
viśve | devāḥ | anu | tat | vām | ajānan | putraḥ | pitarau | avṛṇīta | pūṣā |
yat | ayātam | śubhaḥ | patī iti | vare-yam | sūryām | upa |
kva | ekam | cakram | vām | āsīt | kva | deṣṭrāya | tasthathuḥ |
dve iti | te | cakre iti | sūrye | brahmāṇaḥ | ṛtu-thā | viduḥ |
atha | ekam | cakram | yat | guhā | tat | addhātayaḥ | it | viduḥ |
sūryāyai | devebhyaḥ | mitrāya | varuṇāya | ca |
ye | bhūtasya | pra-cetasaḥ | idam | tebhyaḥ | akaram | namaḥ |
pūrva-aparam | carataḥ | māyayā | etau | śiśū iti | krīḻantau | pari | yātaḥ | adhvaram |
viśvāni | anyaḥ | bhuvanā | abhi-caṣṭe | ṛtūn | anyaḥ | vi-dadhat | jāyate | punariti |
navaḥ-navaḥ | bhavati | jāyamānaḥ | ahnām | ketuḥ | uṣasām | eti | agram |
bhāgam | devebhyaḥ | vi | dadhāti | ā-yan | pra | candramāḥ | tirate | dīrgham | āyuḥ |
su-kiṁśukam | śalmalim | viśva-rūpam | hiraṇya-varṇam | su-vṛtam | su-cakram |
ā | roha | sūrye | amṛtasya | lokam | syonam | patye | vahatum | kṛṇuṣva |
ut | īrṣva | ataḥ | pati-vatī | hi | eṣā | viśva-vasum | namasā | gīḥ-bhiḥ | īḻe |
anyām | iccha | pitṛ-sadam | vi-aktām | saḥ | te | bhāgaḥ | januṣā | tasya | viddhi |
ut | īrṣva | ataḥ | viśvavaso iti viśva-vaso | namasā | īḻāmahe | tvā |
anyām | iccha | pra-pharvyam | sam | jāyām | patyā | sṛja |
anṛkṣarāḥ | ṛjavaḥ | santu | panthāḥ | yebhiḥ | sakhāyaḥ | yanti | naḥ | vare-yam |
sam | aryamā | sam | bhagaḥ | naḥ | ninīyāt | sam | jāḥpatyam | su-yamam | astu | devāḥ |
pra | tvā | muñcāmi | varuṇasya | pāśāt | yena | tvā | abadhnāt | savitā | su-śevaḥ |
ṛtasya | yonau | su-kṛtasya | loke | ariṣṭām | tvā | saha | patyā | dadhāmi |
pra | itaḥ | muñcāmi | na | amutaḥ | su-baddhām | amutaḥ | karam |
yathā | iyam | indra | mīḍhvaḥ | su-putrā | su-bhagā | asati |
pūṣā | tvā | itaḥ | nayatu | hasta-gṛhya | aśvinā | tvā | pra | vahatām | rathena |
gṛhān | gaccha | gṛha-patnī | yathā | asaḥ | vaśinī | tvam | vidatham | ā | vadāsi |
iha | priyam | pra-jayā | te | sam | ṛdhyatām | asmin | gṛhe | gārha-patyāya | jāgṛhi |
enā | patyā | tanvam | sam | sṛjasva | adha | jivrī iti | vidatham | ā | vadāthaḥ |
nīla-lohitam | bhavati | kṛtyā | āsaktiḥ | vi | ajyate |
edhante | asyāḥ | jñātayaḥ | patiḥ | bandheṣu | badhyate |
parā | dehi | śāmulyam | brahma-bhyaḥ | vi | bhaja | vasu |
kṛtyā | eṣā | pat-vatī | bhūtvī | ā | jāyā | viśate | patim |
aśrīrā | tanūḥ | bhavati | ruśatī | pāpayā | amuyā |
patiḥ | yat | vadhvaḥ | vāsasā | svam | aṅgam | abhi-dhitsate |
ye | vadhvaḥ | candram | vahatum | yakṣmāḥ | yanti | janāt | anu |
punariti | tān | yajñiyāḥ | devāḥ | nayantu | yataḥ | ā-gatāḥ |
mā | vidan | pari-panthinaḥ | ye | ā-sīdanti | daṁpatī iti dam-patī |
su-gebhiḥ | duḥ-gam | ati | itām | apa | drāntu | arātayaḥ |
su-maṅgalīḥ | iyam | vadhūḥ | imām | sam-eta | paśyata |
saubhāgyam | asyai | dattvāya | atha | astam | vi | parā | itana |
tṛṣṭam | etat | kaṭukam | etat | apāṣṭha-vat | viṣa-vat | na | etat | attave |
sūryām | yaḥ | brahmā | vidyāt | saḥ | it | vādhū-yam | arhati |
ā-śasanam | vi-śasanam | atho iti | adhi-vikartanam |
sūryāyāḥ | paśya | rūpāṇi | tāni | brahmā | tu | śundhati |
gṛbhṇāmi | te | saubhaga-tvāya | hastam | mayā | patyā | jarat-aṣṭiḥ | yathā | asaḥ |
bhagaḥ | aryamā | savitā | puram-dhiḥ | mahyam | tvā | aduḥ | gārha-patyāya | devāḥ |
tām | pūṣan | śiva-tamām | ā | īrayasva | yasyām | bījam | manuṣyāḥ | vapanti |
yā | naḥ | ūrū iti | uśatī | vi-śrayāte | yasyām | uśantaḥ | pra-harāma | śepam |
tubhyam | agre | pari | avahan | sūryām | vahatunā | saha |
punariti | pati-bhyaḥ | jāyām | dāḥ | agne | pra-jayā | saha |
punariti | patnīm | agniḥ | adāt | āyuṣā | saha | varcasā |
dīrgha-āyuḥ | asyāḥ | yaḥ | patiḥ | jīvāti | śaradaḥ | śatam |
somaḥ | prathamaḥ | vivide | gandharvaḥ | vivide | ut-taraḥ |
tṛtīyaḥ | agniḥ | te | patiḥ | turīyaḥ | te | manuṣya-jāḥ |
somaḥ | dadat | gandharvāya | gandharvaḥ | dadat | agnaye |
rayim | ca | putrān | ca | adāt | agniḥ | mahyam | atho iti | imām |
iha | eva | stam | mā | vi | yauṣṭam | viśvam | āyuḥ | vi | aśnutam |
krīḻantau | putraiḥ | naptṛ-bhiḥ | modamānau | sve | gṛhe |
ā | naḥ | pra-jām | janayatu | prajā-patiḥ | ā-jarasāya | sam | anaktu | aryamā |
aduḥ-maṅgalīḥ | pati-lokam | ā | viśa | śam | naḥ | bhava | dvi-pade | śam | catuḥ-pade |
aghora-cakṣuḥ | apati-ghnī | edhi | śivā | paśu-bhyaḥ | su-manāḥ | su-varcāḥ |
vīra-sūḥ | deva-kāmā | syonā | śam | naḥ | bhava | dvi-pade | śam | catuḥ-pade |
imām | tvam | indra | mīḍhvaḥ | su-putrām | su-bhagām | kṛṇu |
daśa | asyām | putrān | ā | dhehi | patim | ekādaśam | kṛdhi |
sam-rājñī | śvaśure | bhava | sam-rājñī | śvaśrvām | bhava |
nanāndari | sam-rājñī | bhava | sam-rājñī | adhi | devṛṣu |
sam | añjantu | viśve | devāḥ | sam | āpaḥ | hṛdayāni | nau |
sam | mātariśvā | sam | dhātā | sam | ūm̐ iti | deṣṭrī | dadhātu | nau |
vi | hi | sotoḥ | asṛkṣata | na | indram | devam | amaṁsata |
yatra | amadat | vṛṣākapiḥ | aryaḥ | puṣṭeṣu | mat-sakhā | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
parā | hi | indra | dhāvasi | vṛṣākapeḥ | ati | vyathiḥ |
no iti | aha | pra | vindasi | anyatra | soma-pītaye | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
kim | ayam | tvām | vṛṣākapiḥ | cakāra | haritaḥ | mṛgaḥ |
yasmai | irasyasi | it | ūm̐ iti | nu | aryaḥ | vā | puṣṭi-mat | vasu | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
yam | imam | tvam | vṛṣākapim | priyam | indra | abhi-rakṣasi |
śvā | nu | asya | jambhiṣat | api | karṇe | varāha-yuḥ | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
priyā | taṣṭāni | me | kapiḥ | vi-aktā | vi | adūduṣat |
śiraḥ | nu | asya | rāviṣam | na | su-gam | duḥ-kṛte | bhuvam | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
na | mat | strī | subhasat-tarā | na | suyāśu-tarā | bhuvat |
na | mat | prati-cyavīyasī | na | sakthi | ut-yamīyasī | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
uve | amba | sulābhike | yathā-iva | aṅga | bhaviṣyati |
bhasat | me | amba | sakthi | me | śiraḥ | me | vi-iva | hṛṣyati | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
kim | subāho iti su-bāho | su-aṅgure | pṛthusto iti pṛthu-sto | pṛthu-jaghane |
kim | śūra-patni | naḥ | tvam | abhi | amīṣi | vṛṣākapim | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
avīrām-iva | mām | ayam | śarāruḥ | abhi | manyate |
uta | aham | asmi | vīriṇī | indra-patnī | marut-sakhā | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
sam-hotram | sma | purā | nārī | samanam | vā | ava | gacchati |
vedhāḥ | ṛtasya | vīriṇī | indra-patnī | mahīyate | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
indrāṇīm | āsu | nāriṣu | su-bhagām | aham | aśravam |
nahi | asyāḥ | aparam | cana | jarasā | marate | patiḥ | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
na | aham | indrāṇi | raraṇa | sakhyuḥ | vṛṣākapeḥ | ṛte |
yasya | idam | apyam | haviḥ | priyam | deveṣu | gacchati | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
vṛṣākapāyi | revati | su-putre | āt | ūm̐ iti | su-snuṣe |
ghasat | te | indraḥ | ukṣaṇaḥ | priyam | kācit-karam | haviḥ | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
ukṣṇaḥ | hi | me | pañca-daśa | sākam | pacanti | viṁśatim |
uta | aham | admi | pīvaḥ | it | ubhā | kukṣī iti | pṛṇanti | me | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
vṛṣabhaḥ | na | tigma-śṛṅgaḥ | antaḥ | yūtheṣu | roruvat |
manthaḥ | te | indra | śam | hṛde | yam | te | sunoti | bhāvayuḥ | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
na | saḥ | īśe | yasya | rambate | antarā | sakthyā | kapṛt |
saḥ | it | īśe | yasya | romaśam | ni-seduṣaḥ | vi-jṛmbhate | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
na | saḥ | īśe | yasya | romaśam | ni-seduṣaḥ | vi-jṛmbhate |
saḥ | it | īśe | yasya | rambate | antarā | sakthyā | kapṛt | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
ayam | indra | vṛṣākapiḥ | parasvantam | hatam | vidat |

ayam | emi | vi-cākaśat | vi-cinvan | dāsam | āryam |
pibāmi | pāka-sutvanaḥ | abhi | dhīram | acākaśam | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
dhanva | ca | yat | kṛntatram | ca | kati | svit | tā | vi | yojanā |
nedīyasaḥ | vṛṣākape | astam | ā | ihi | gṛhān | upa | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
punaḥ | ā | ihi | vṛṣākape | suvitā | kalpayāvahai |
yaḥ | eṣaḥ | svapna-naṁśanaḥ | astam | eṣi | pathā | punaḥ | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
yat | udañcaḥ | vṛṣākape | gṛham | indra | ajagantana |
kva | syaḥ | pulvaghaḥ | mṛgaḥ | kam | agan | jana-yopanaḥ | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |

bhadram | bhala | tyasyai | abhūt | yasyāḥ | udaram | āmayat | viśvasmāt | indraḥ | ut-taraḥ |
rakṣaḥ-hanam | vājinam | ā | jigharmi | mitram | prathiṣṭham | upa | yāmi | śarma |
śiśānaḥ | agniḥ | kratu-bhiḥ | sam-iddhaḥ | saḥ | naḥ | divā | saḥ | riṣaḥ | pātu | naktam |
ayaḥ-daṁṣṭraḥ | arciṣā | yātu-dhānān | upa | spṛśa | jāta-vedaḥ | sam-iddhaḥ |
ā | jihvayā | mūra-devān | rabhasva | kravya-adaḥ | vṛktvī | api | dhatsva | āsan |
ubhā | ubhayāvin | upa | dhehi | daṁṣṭrā | hiṁsraḥ | śiśānaḥ | avaram | param | ca |
uta | antarikṣe | pari | yāhi | rājan | jambhaiḥ | sam | dhehi | abhi | yātu-dhānān |
yajñaiḥ | iṣūḥ | sam-namamānaḥ | agne | vācā | śalyān | aśani-bhiḥ | dihānaḥ |
tābhiḥ | vidhya | hṛdaye | yātu-dhānān | pratīcaḥ | bāhūn | prati | bhaṅdhi | eṣām |
agne | tvacam | yātu-dhānasya | bhindhi | hiṁsrā | aśaniḥ | harasā | hantu | enam |
pra | parvāṇi | jāta-vedaḥ | śṛṇīhi | kravya-at | kraviṣṇuḥ | vi | cinotu | vṛkṇam |
yatra | idānīm | paśyasi | jāta-vedaḥ | tiṣṭhantam | agne | uta | vā | carantam |
yat | vā | antarikṣe | pathi-bhiḥ | patantam | tam | astā | vidhya | śarvā | śiśānaḥ |
uta | ā-labdham | spṛṇuhi | jāta-vedaḥ | ā-lebhānāt | ṛṣṭi-bhiḥ | yātu-dhānāt |
agne | pūrvaḥ | ni | jahi | śośucānaḥ | āma-adaḥ | kṣviṅkāḥ | tam | adantu | enīḥ |
iha | pra | brūhi | yatamaḥ | saḥ | agne | yaḥ | yātu-dhānaḥ | yaḥ | idam | kṛṇoti |
tam | ā | rabhasva | sam-idhā | yaviṣṭha | nṛ-cakṣasaḥ | cakṣuṣe | randhaya | enam |
tīkṣṇena | agne | cakṣuṣā | rakṣa | yajñam | prāñcam | vasu-bhyaḥ | pra | naya | pra-cetaḥ |
hiṁsram | rakṣāṁsi | abhi | śośucānam | mā | tvā | dabhan | yātu-dhānāḥ | nṛ-cakṣaḥ |
nṛ-cakṣāḥ | rakṣaḥ | pari | paśya | vikṣu | tasya | trīṇi | prati | śṛṇīhi | agrā |
tasya | agne | pṛṣṭīḥ | harasā | śṛṇīhi | tredhā | mūlam | yātu-dhānasya | vṛśca |
triḥ | yātu-dhānaḥ | pra-sitim | te | etu | ṛtam | yaḥ | agne | anṛtena | hanti |
tam | arciṣā | sphūrjayan | jāta-vedaḥ | sam-akṣam | enam | gṛṇate | ni | vṛṅdhi |
tat | agne | cakṣuḥ | prati | dhehi | rebhe | śapha-ārujam | yena | paśyasi | yātu-dhānam |
atharva-vat | jyotiṣā | daivyena | satyam | dhūrvantam | acitam | ni | oṣa |
yat | agne | adya | mithunā | śapātaḥ | yat | vācaḥ | tṛṣṭam | janayanta | rebhāḥ |
manyoḥ | manasaḥ | śaravyā | jāyate | yā | tayā | vidhya | hṛdaye | yātu-dhānān |
parā | śṛṇīhi | tapasā | yātu-dhānān | parā | agne | rakṣaḥ | harasā | śṛṇīhi |
parā | arciṣā | mūra-devān | śṛṇīhi | parā | asu-tṛpaḥ | abhi | śośucānaḥ |
parā | adya | devāḥ | vṛjinam | śṛṇantu | pratyak | enam | śapathāḥ | yantu | tṛṣṭāḥ |
vācā-stenam | śaravaḥ | ṛcchantu | marman | viśvasya | etu | pra-sitim | yātu-dhānaḥ |
yaḥ | pauruṣeyeṇa | kraviṣā | sam-aṅkte | yaḥ | aśvyena | paśunā | yātu-dhānaḥ |
yaḥ | aghnyāyāḥ | bharati | kṣīram | agne | teṣām | śīrṣāṇi | harasā | api | vṛśca |
saṁvatsarīṇam | payaḥ | usriyāyāḥ | tasya | mā | aśīt | yātu-dhānaḥ | nṛ-cakṣaḥ |

sanāt | agne | mṛṇasi | yātu-dhānān | na | tvā | rakṣāṁsi | pṛtanāsu | jigyuḥ |
anu | daha | saha-mūrān | kravya-adaḥ | mā | te | hetyāḥ | mukṣata | daivyāyāḥ |
tvam | naḥ | agne | adharāt | udaktāt | tvam | paścāt | uta | rakṣa | purastāt |
